She was a consummate professional in every question she ask as well as the way she articulated her concerns for my well being. I saw a very professional interaction between Dr Polesin. Both seemed to work well with each other and I could see the Nurse PA and Dr Polesin have a great working relationship!|I just had a virtual visit the other day with Dr. Rubinfeld.
He is an excellent pain management Doctor Who listens carefully..
Pain management Doctors have to be a a special breed!
They need to have great intuition!
He really knows the art of helping people with chronic pain.
My wife and I are very glad we came across Dr. Rubinfeld.
We've been seeing him probably over 15 years now..
It's hard to believe it's been that long!
The injections he gives are fantastic for nerve pain when it becomes a chronic issue.
If you're unfortunate enough to be a chronic pain suffer don't wait make an appointment to see Dr. Rubinfeld!
Thank you for everything Dr Rubinfeld........

I just went to the surgical center and had an injection done for my lower back pain.
At Dr. Rubinfeld surgical center they truly have it down to a system. You are in and out of there quickly and dare I say painlessly.
And hopefully eventually a lot less pain than you went in with.
The staff is very pleasant and knowledgeable, fast and efficient.
A lot of hospitals could take lessons from this surgical center.

I had lower back pain that has been bothering me for many months.
It aggravated the nerve damage that I have in my left leg which then becomes virtually unbearable. I would wake up in the middle of the night with my heart racing and sweating it hurts so much at times. So much so, my cardiologist had me on a heart monitor to make sure that it was just the pain causing all of the readings she was getting.
Then after that of course sleep would be impossible. I would have to go to another room and sit in a recliner just the right way and watch the sun come up.

Thanks to Dr. Rubinfeld the injection was successful in significantly/dramatically lowering the pain in my lower back.

Now maybe I can get a few decent nights of sleep!
My lower back is no longer aggravating the nerve damage in my leg nearly as much. I've been doing some light yoga and stretching as well.
My left leg I've learned over the last 20+ years is a lost cause but, with the pain being dramatically better in my lower back the leg has returned to the previous level of pain. That is way more tolerable! Now at least I feel like I can deal with this level.

If all you have in life is normal aches and pains you should count your blessings.
I haven't been pain-free since 1999.
I find that my life is divided into two major sections, before Pain and then after Pain became my companion.

Chronic pain takes a huge toll on every aspect of your life. It robs you of being able to make great memories with your children, and being a decent parent at times.
It changes your life, and not for the better.

Dr. Rubinfeld is very cautious and knows his field. I would highly recommend the services to anyone.
He's very personable and reads his patients very well. I am thankful for guidance.
Dr. Rubinfeld is very compassionate and understanding as well.
Thank you Dr. Rubinfeld again thank you for your professionalism!

I added a photo of my wife and I on our 40th wedding anniversary.
This is just 2 1/2 weeks after I had my injection in my back.

I wanted to show that behind these reviews are real people that are trying to live their lives in chronic pain. If you notice I'm standing relatively straight and at that moment I remember not being all that conscious of pain.
That in itself made a great day!
Later that evening I was very thankful for the injection and Dr. Rubenfeld's professional work.
The photos of the things you see me doing I am able to because of Dr Rubinfeld. I'm very thankful to be a patient...

column2: New Jersey Institute for Pain Relief (Cranford) - Dr. Pucciarelli, D.C.
column3:
New Jersey Institute for Pain Relief in Cranford, NJ is a premier pain management facility led by Dr. Pucciarelli, D.C., dedicated to providing comprehensive care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Our state-of-the-art clinic combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment protocols to address a wide range of musculoskeletal issues. With a patient-centered approach, we develop personalized treatment plans that focus on both immediate pain relief and long-term recovery, helping patients return to their normal activities with improved function and quality of life.

At NJ Institute for Pain Relief, we offer advanced treatments that facilitate healing for injuries such as damaged spine or back, injured muscles and joints, and broken or fractured bone - often with remarkable results. Our multidisciplinary approach incorporates cutting-edge technologies and evidence-based practices to ensure optimal outcomes. Dr. Pucciarelli brings extensive expertise in chiropractic care and pain management, utilizing precise adjustments and therapeutic interventions to address the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

Our Commitment to Patient Care

Our priority is to provide the most advanced minimally invasive treatment while treating your pain safely and effectively. We understand that chronic pain can significantly impact every aspect of your life, which is why we take the time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's condition and develop comprehensive treatment strategies. The team at New Jersey Institute for Pain Relief is committed to creating a supportive, compassionate environment where patients feel heard and valued throughout their healing journey.

Mission and Philosophy

Our mission is to relieve pain, help restore function and assist you in enjoying life again! We believe in empowering patients through education about their conditions and treatment options, enabling them to make informed decisions about their care. By combining clinical excellence with genuine compassion, we strive to be the leading pain management center in Cranford and surrounding New Jersey communities.

Have been slowly recovering from multiple issues and each one addressed with care. A bit far for my taste but I prefer the great vibes from this place over any other place|As a healthcare provider who has traveled extensively across the United States and visited some of the most esteemed institutions, I can confidently assert that New Jersey Institute for Pain Relief stands out as a unique facility where high-quality, compassionate care is assured.

From the moment you enter and interact with the staff, it is evident that patient care is the top priority, extending through to the conclusion of your appointment. The convenience of having all your treatment needs addressed within a single facility is truly remarkable. Appointments are scheduled efficiently, ensuring timely service. Even during brief wait times, Laurie, Gabby, and Infiniti prioritize your comfort in the waiting area by engaging in lighthearted conversation and ensuring a welcoming atmosphere, all while efficiently managing multiple tasks.

My previous experiences with physical therapy have often felt impersonal and rushed, resembling a factory-like approach with less than satisfactory care. In contrast, whether you are under the care of Ely, Tai, Daniel, or Dr. Joe, you can expect a personalized approach that prioritizes your overall well-being. They exert an unparalleled effort to enhance your recovery, and I find myself uncertain of how I could ever express my gratitude to them. Experiencing time away from work as a result of my injuries has occasionally left me feeling disheartened. However, the physical therapy sessions I attend have transformed into a form of mental therapy, as the positive energy of the therapists is both uplifting and infectious.

While I recognize the benefits of chiropractic services for my overall care, I still experience some apprehension. However, Dr. Rodriguez's sense of humor and compassionate bedside manner significantly contribute to alleviating my fears, providing an effective distraction during my visits. I must acknowledge Will, who consistently checks in on my well-being and takes care to ensure my comfort.

The physicians at this practice are truly exceptional, demonstrating a remarkable blend of compassion and empathy. A doctor who dedicates time to listen, regardless of their patient load or the demands of the clinic, makes a significant impact on patient care.

Every provider has consistently exceeded expectations. The atmosphere in Dr. Nickel's office is reminiscent of a spa, contributing to a calming environment that alleviates the numerous challenges I have encountered. Her supportive demeanor is unparalleled.

Dr. King took the time to thoroughly explain my condition, clarifying the situation in a way that alleviated my concerns. His reassurance instilled in me a renewed sense of hope.

Gramercy Pain Center in Holmdel, New Jersey offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients throughout Monmouth County and surrounding areas. Our state-of-the-art facility at 2124 NJ-35 combines advanced medical technology with compassionate care to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Led by board-certified pain specialists, our center takes a multidisciplinary approach to diagnosing and treating pain at its source rather than simply masking symptoms.

At Gramercy Pain Center, we provide personalized treatment plans for a wide range of conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, sports injuries, and post-surgical pain. Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine options. Metro Pain Centers serves Clifton, NJ with specialized pain management services designed to help patients regain control of their lives. Our board-certified physicians understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of daily living, which is why we've developed comprehensive treatment protocols for conditions ranging from persistent back pain and neck discomfort to debilitating headaches and complex pain syndromes. Since our founding, we've been committed to providing personalized care that addresses the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

At Metro Pain Centers, we believe in a multidisciplinary approach to pain relief. Our team works collaboratively to develop individualized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and advanced interventional techniques. We specialize in treating:

  • Chronic back and neck pain

  • Headaches and migraines

  • Joint pain and arthritis

  • Neuropathic pain conditions

  • Sports injuries and work-related injuries

  • Post-surgical pain

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that living with chronic pain can be isolating and frustrating. Our compassionate team takes the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and explain treatment options in clear, understandable terms. We partner with you throughout your journey to pain relief, adjusting your treatment plan as needed to achieve optimal results.

Our Clifton Location

Conveniently located at 50 Mt Prospect Ave #203, Clifton, NJ 07013, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology. We've created a welcoming environment where patients feel comfortable and respected throughout their care experience.

Contact Us

If you're struggling with chronic pain, don't wait to seek relief. Contact Metro Pain Centers today at (862) 437-4831 to schedule your consultation, or visit us online at www.metropaincenters.com/locations/clifton-nj/ to learn more about our services and approach to pain management.

Our team of Harvard-trained physicians specializes in minimally invasive treatments for a wide range of conditions, helping thousands of patients return to active, pain-free lives. We pride ourselves on combining advanced medical expertise with compassionate care, ensuring each patient receives personalized treatment plans tailored to their specific needs.

Our board-certified doctors offer cutting-edge treatments for various pain conditions, including:

- Knee Pain: Specialized care for back of knee pain, inner knee discomfort, and comprehensive knee pain relief

- Back Pain: Effective solutions for both lower and upper back pain

- Neck Pain: Advanced treatments for neck discomfort and neck/shoulder pain

- Joint Pain: Innovative approaches to address pain in various joints

Why Choose Pain Treatment Specialists?

Our Ivy League-trained physicians stand apart through their commitment to:

- Minimally invasive procedures that avoid surgery

- Personalized treatment plans for each patient

Mary Basile|Dr. Ramundo was fantastic! He actually listened to my concerns, answered my questions in a manner that a non medical professional like me could understand. Would highly recommend seeing Dr. Ramundo if you are suffering from unmanageable pain. Oh, and did I mention, I am pain free after following the recommended course of action from Dr. Ramundo and my Orthopedic doctor. Thank you!|My name is Scott ... For the last 20+ years I've lived with pain on all levels all the time. The difference between dr ramundo is that he not only listens, but also dives in to find and cure the root cause of it. It's just different with him because he not only relates with his patients, but also has an amazing bedside manner and is compassionate to my needs. He hires the most amazing people around him and his staff works tirelessly to help in any way they can. Although my situation is going to be this way for my remaining years, he helps me to do the best I can as pain free as possible even though in my case pain will always be significant. There aren't enough stars allowed for him and his staff ..... there is nothing worse then being in pain and feeling like no one is there for you. In my opinion they probably didn't give these great people they time and effort it takes to solve the issues needed....|Dr Ramundo really understands the chronic pain I experience, and he treats it appropriately and effectively. I remain grateful to him for his compassion and excellent medical care.|As a healthcare professional, my work involves assisting clients to find appropriate treatment providers for resolution of their medical conditions. At the first visit Dr. Ramundo provided an additional diagnosis that could be the cause of her pain and recommended she bring additional test results to his office. He proceeded with procedures that were helpful for both conditions and after just a few short visits the patient was satisfied with her results and was able to get back to her normal activities. She was so happy with her results that she was giggling like a child at her last visit and thanked the physician and myself for the assistance. It is so gratifying to really be able to make an impact on another individuals life! Thank you Dr. Ramundo and all the wonderful staff at PMP- Stephanie, Lori, Jessica, Denise, etc. that make visits to the office feel like I am bringing clients to visit family and know they will be taken care of with respect and dignity.

column2: NJ Pain Care Specialists - Dr. Harris Bram
column3:
NJ Pain Care Specialists serves Oakhurst, NJ and surrounding communities throughout Monmouth County with comprehensive pain management solutions. Led by Dr. Harris Bram, our practice combines advanced interventional techniques with personalized care plans to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Our state-of-the-art facility at 1806 NJ-35, Suite 305 houses the latest diagnostic and therapeutic equipment, allowing us to provide effective treatment options for patients suffering from back pain, joint disorders, neuropathy, and other debilitating conditions.

At NJ Pain Care Specialists, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to pain management that includes both interventional procedures and medication management. Dr. Bram brings decades of experience in treating complex pain conditions through minimally invasive techniques such as epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and targeted nerve blocks. Our team works diligently to identify the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms, creating sustainable relief for our patients.

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of a patient's life, which is why we take the time to listen and develop individualized treatment plans. Our compassionate staff ensures patients feel supported throughout their pain management journey, from the initial consultation through ongoing care. We coordinate with primary care physicians and other specialists to provide comprehensive care that addresses all factors contributing to a patient's pain experience.

Insurance and Accessibility

NJ Pain Care Specialists works with most major insurance providers and offers flexible scheduling options to accommodate our patients' needs. Our Oakhurst location provides convenient access for residents throughout Monmouth County and beyond. New patients are welcome to contact our office at (732) 720-0247 to schedule a consultation or visit our website at www.njpcs.org for more information about our services and approach to pain management.

Our specialized medical practice focuses on harnessing the body's natural healing capabilities through cutting-edge regenerative treatments. Located conveniently on Highway 34, our clinic has become a trusted destination for patients seeking alternatives to conventional pain management approaches and surgical interventions.

At Comprehensive Pain Management and Regenerative Medicine, we pioneer treatments that utilize your body's own regenerative systems to facilitate healing. Our evidence-based protocols are designed to address the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms. Through personalized treatment plans, we help patients experience meaningful improvements in their quality of life without the risks and recovery time associated with invasive procedures.

Our Regenerative Approach

Our practice specializes in advanced regenerative techniques that can:

  • Repair Injuries - Targeting damaged tissues with precision therapies

  • Restore Function - Improving mobility and returning patients to activities they enjoy

  • Relieve Pain - Providing lasting relief through biological healing mechanisms

  • Avoid Surgery - Offering effective non-surgical alternatives for many conditions

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that each patient's pain experience is unique. Our comprehensive evaluation process ensures we develop tailored treatment strategies addressing your specific needs and health goals. Our medical team stays at the forefront of regenerative medicine advancements, incorporating the latest research and techniques into our practice.

The SamWell team specializes in treating a comprehensive range of spine and orthopedic conditions through novel, non-surgical, and minimally invasive interventional techniques. Their interventional pain specialists employ cutting-edge technologies designed to restore function and maximize quality of life for patients suffering from chronic musculoskeletal pain. Whether addressing degenerative conditions or managing pain from sports-related or traumatic injuries, the practice delivers personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Advanced Treatment Options

At SamWell Institute, patients benefit from the latest advancements in pain management technology. The practice's interventional approach means focusing on treating the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms. This commitment to comprehensive care has established SamWell as a leader in the field of interventional pain medicine throughout New Jersey.

Recommend to anyone looking for pain management and treatment.|Dr. Shah and his staff  is awesome .  It was my first visit and he really took his time to explain to me why I'm having pain mostly on the right side of my body.  I have had intercoastal neuropathy in my rib cage since 2015.  This is the first time anyone has taken me seriously and has a plan to help me with this upward battle.  I'm excited that he has taken me on a a patient.|I made an appointment with this facility, and they were very prompt and articulate with contacting me with my insurance verification. In addition, Jennifer was extremely pleasant and thorough with her delivery on the call.
Upon arrival, I was greeted by the front desk staff, who were also very welcoming. I was seen immediately after the intake process.  Dr. Shah was very pleasant and knowledgeable about what my concerns were. He was very precise with the plan of action, and executed the plans with haste. I had my prescription in motion before I even left the office, and the next steps were related with detail. I am extremely happy with my experience!|Dr. Shah and his staff are the most professional feral office I've been to in a very long time. His recommendations are right on target, my procedure has alleviated my pain 150% if there's such a thing. Go see Dr. Shah he is the best!|The staff at SamWell is fantastic!  I have been the to Colonia location so far, from the moment you arrive until you leave you are safe and comfortable. The building has onsite outside security.  The staff upon entry is so kind and very little paperwork to do, most is online in your own portal.  Dr. Shah is easy to understand, he takes the time to hear you and answer all your questions. He knows what he is doing, he will have all the test needed to give you the answers and get you-your diagnosis. He has a lot of experience and even though he may know what you have going on- he will have the test to prove it done. There are many treatments but he will give you the best one for your situation and diagnosis.  I don't trust many people, nor doctors, but Dr. Shah is different and you will see it when you meet him. I had pain and discomfort in my lower back, knees, shoulders, legs, feet, and neck. All of this did not start at once. It happened slowly over the years and one after the other.  The discomfort and pain got me search and praying for the right doctor to see.  After 3 signs that he was the one, I took the step to meet him and I am so happy I did.  I had my first test for treatment on my spine and I saw the difference.  If there is anything I would like to see change is that my blood pressure is taken manually not by a portable battery blood pressure cuff.   Every office I have gone to that uses one give me the wrong blood pressure reading until I insist on having it taken with an actual plug in machine or manually and the correct reading comes out.  That is the only thing that could be changed.  Dr. Shah at SamWell Institute for Pain Management is the doctor to see and I highly recommend him. I am not being paid for this review it is my honest experience.

Pain Treatment Specialists serves patients throughout New York City and New Jersey with exceptional pain management solutions. Our team of Harvard-trained physicians specializes in minimally invasive treatments for a wide range of conditions, helping thousands of patients return to active, pain-free lives. We combine advanced medical expertise with compassionate care, ensuring each patient receives personalized treatment plans tailored to their specific needs and circumstances.

Our board-certified doctors offer comprehensive treatment options for various pain conditions, including:

- Knee Pain: Specialized care for back of knee pain, inside knee pain, and other knee-related discomfort

- Back Pain: Effective solutions for both lower and upper back pain

- Neck Pain: Advanced treatments for neck discomfort and neck/shoulder pain

- Joint Pain: Cutting-edge interventions for all types of joint-related conditions

Why Choose Pain Treatment Specialists?

Our Ivy League-trained physicians stand apart in the field of pain management by focusing on minimally invasive procedures that avoid unnecessary surgery while providing significant relief. We pride ourselves on staying at the forefront of pain medicine, incorporating the latest evidence-based techniques and technologies into our practice.

Each patient receives a thorough evaluation to determine the root cause of their pain, followed by a customized treatment plan designed to provide both immediate relief and long-term results. Our goal is always to improve quality of life while minimizing recovery time and potential side effects.

Visit our Paramus location at 140 NJ-17 #269, Paramus, NJ 07652, or call us at +1 973-346-9770 to schedule your consultation. Learn more about our services at [paintreatmentspecialists.com](https://www.paintreatmentspecialists.com/locations/new-jersey/paramus/?utmsource=google&utmmedium=gmb&utm_campaign=paramus%20GMB).

Caring Pain Management serves Montclair, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our board-certified specialists combine evidence-based treatments with compassionate care to address chronic pain conditions, helping patients regain mobility and improve their quality of life. Prestige Pain Centers in Hamilton Township, NJ offers residents throughout Mercer County and surrounding areas access to cutting-edge interventional pain management solutions. Our specialized medical facility focuses on identifying and treating the root causes of chronic and acute pain conditions through minimally invasive techniques. The dedicated team at Prestige Pain Centers combines advanced diagnostic capabilities with personalized treatment plans to help patients regain mobility, reduce dependence on pain medications, and improve overall quality of life.

At Prestige Pain Centers, we believe in localizing the exact source of pain before developing targeted treatment strategies. Our board-certified specialists utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to precisely identify pain generators, allowing for more effective interventions. Rather than masking symptoms with medication alone, our comprehensive approach addresses the underlying causes of discomfort through advanced, non-surgical techniques that promote long-term relief and functional improvement.

Specialized Treatment Options

Our facility offers a wide range of minimally invasive procedures designed to treat various pain conditions affecting the spine, joints, nerves, and musculoskeletal system. These include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and other targeted interventions that minimize recovery time while maximizing therapeutic benefits. Each treatment plan is customized to address the patient's specific condition, medical history, and personal goals.

Patient-Centered Care Philosophy

What truly distinguishes Prestige Pain Centers is our unwavering commitment to compassionate, individualized care. We recognize that pain affects each person differently, which is why we take the time to listen to our patients' concerns and develop strong therapeutic relationships. Our team provides thorough education about pain conditions and treatment options, empowering patients to make informed decisions about their care journey.

Contact Information

Location: 2333 Whitehorse Mercerville Rd #J, Hamilton Township, NJ 08619, United States

Phone: +1 732-887-2004

Website: www.prestigepain.com

If you're struggling with chronic pain that limits your daily activities, contact Prestige Pain Centers today to schedule a consultation. Our team is dedicated to helping you find effective solutions for lasting pain relief through our innovative, non-surgical approach to pain management.
column11: Cutting-edge Approach to Comprehensive Pain Relief. Our goal is to localize the source of pain and design a treatment plan that works for you. Complete Pain & Spine Institute serves Ridgewood, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Rehan Ali. As a fellowship-trained Interventional Pain Management Specialist, Dr. Ali brings advanced expertise to patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. The practice combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with personalized care plans to help patients regain mobility, reduce discomfort, and improve their quality of life.

Dr. Rehan Ali holds double board certification from the American Board of Anesthesiology in both Interventional Pain Medicine and Anesthesiology. His extensive training includes completing his residency at New York Medical College, followed by a prestigious one-year accredited fellowship in Interventional Pain Medicine at Mount Sinai Hospital in Manhattan, NY. This exceptional background ensures patients receive care from a physician with the highest level of specialized training in pain management techniques.

Specialized Treatment Approach

At Complete Pain & Spine Institute, Dr. Ali employs minimally invasive solutions to diagnose and treat various pain conditions. He is highly skilled in a comprehensive range of interventional pain procedures as well as non-interventional methods. Dr. Ali takes special interest in treating:

  • Neck pain

  • Low back pain

  • Joint pain

  • Post-surgical pain

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

The practice offers a full spectrum of pain management services designed to address the root cause of discomfort rather than simply masking symptoms. Each treatment plan is customized to the individual patient's needs, medical history, and specific pain condition, ensuring the most effective approach to pain relief and functional improvement.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Ali, patients can visit the Complete Pain & Spine Institute at 1144 E Ridgewood Ave, Floor 2, Ridgewood, NJ 07450. For appointments or inquiries, call +1 201-336-0188 or visit their website at www.njpainandspine.com.

Dr. Ali uses minimally invasive solutions to diagnose and treat acute and chronic pain. column3:
Prestige Pain Centers in Carteret, NJ offers residents throughout central New Jersey access to cutting-edge interventional pain management solutions. Established with a mission to provide personalized care, our medical facility specializes in identifying and treating the root causes of chronic and acute pain conditions. Our team of board-certified pain specialists combines years of clinical expertise with advanced diagnostic techniques to develop customized treatment plans that address each patient's unique needs and circumstances.

At Prestige Pain Centers, we believe effective pain relief begins with precise diagnosis. Our specialists take the time to thoroughly evaluate each patient, utilizing state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to localize the exact source of pain. This meticulous approach allows us to design targeted treatment plans that address the underlying cause rather than merely masking symptoms. We emphasize minimally invasive, non-surgical interventional techniques that promote faster recovery times and reduced risk compared to traditional surgical approaches.

Personalized Patient Care

What truly sets Prestige Pain Centers apart is our individualized, compassionate approach to patient care. We understand that pain affects each person differently, which is why we take the time to listen to our patients' concerns and develop relationships built on trust and understanding. Our team works collaboratively with patients to establish realistic goals and create treatment plans that align with their lifestyle needs and preferences.

Advanced Treatment Options

Our facility offers a comprehensive range of leading-edge pain management solutions, including nerve blocks, epidural steroid injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine therapies. These advanced interventional techniques allow us to effectively treat conditions ranging from back and neck pain to complex regional pain syndrome, without resorting to invasive surgery or long-term opioid medication.

Contact Information

Location: 125 Washington Ave, 3rd floor, Carteret, NJ 07008

Phone: +1 732-887-2004

Website: www.prestigepain.com

If you're struggling with chronic or acute pain, contact Prestige Pain Centers today to schedule a consultation and take the first step toward comprehensive pain relief and improved quality of life.
column11: Cutting-edge Approach to Comprehensive Pain Relief. Our goal is to localize the source of pain and design a treatment plan that works for you. With an individualized, compassionate, and personable approach to care, we diagnose and localize the root of pain and realize pain relief using leading-edge and minimally invasive, non-surgical interventional pain management techniques.

Dr. Yanamadula, MD, FAAPMR, FAAPM, has developed a multidisciplinary approach that tailors treatment to each individual's unique needs. National Spine & Pain Centers - Freehold serves patients throughout Freehold, New Jersey and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. As part of one of the nation's largest pain management practices, our Freehold location combines advanced treatment options with personalized care to help patients find relief from chronic pain conditions. Our dedicated team of specialists employs evidence-based approaches tailored to each individual's unique needs, ensuring the highest quality care in a comfortable, professional environment.

At National Spine & Pain Centers (NSPC), we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our multidisciplinary team utilizes a comprehensive approach that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and innovative treatments to address various pain conditions. We specialize in treating back and neck pain, sciatica, arthritis, neuropathy, and many other chronic pain conditions that impact daily functioning and quality of life.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets NSPC apart is our unwavering commitment to personalized care. Each treatment plan is carefully crafted to address the specific needs and goals of the individual patient. Our team-based approach ensures that patients receive coordinated care from specialists who collaborate to provide the most effective pain management solutions possible.

Comfortable Facility

Our Freehold office is conveniently located in the Pinho Plaza in the back of building A at 55 Schanck Rd, Suite 18. The office environment is designed for patient comfort, though we do recommend bringing a sweater as the temperature can run cool during treatments and consultations.

Contact Information

To schedule an appointment or learn more about our services, please contact us at +1 732-431-9544 or visit our website at www.treatingpain.com/freehold. Our dedicated staff is ready to help you take the first step toward effective pain management and improved quality of life.

column2: Spine & Pain Centers : Anil K Sharma MD
column3:
Spine & Pain Centers serves Wall Township, NJ and surrounding communities with exceptional interventional pain management services under the leadership of Dr. Anil K. Sharma. Established as a premier destination for those suffering from chronic pain conditions, this specialized medical practice combines advanced diagnostic techniques with cutting-edge treatments to help patients regain their quality of life. The center's comprehensive approach addresses various pain disorders affecting the spine, joints, and nervous system through minimally invasive procedures designed to provide lasting relief while minimizing recovery time.

Dr. Anil K. Sharma brings impressive credentials as a triple board-certified interventional pain management specialist with training from the prestigious Cleveland Clinic Foundation. With over 80,000 procedures performed throughout his career, Dr. Sharma's extensive experience has earned him recognition as a top physician by numerous esteemed medical publications. His 18-year tenure as director of pain management at Monmouth Medical Center further demonstrates his commitment to excellence in the field.

Comprehensive Services

The center specializes in diagnosing and treating various pain conditions through minimally invasive techniques. Dr. Sharma's patient-focused approach emphasizes accurate diagnosis before developing personalized treatment plans. This methodology ensures that each patient receives care specifically tailored to their unique condition and circumstances.

Academic Contributions

Beyond his clinical practice, Dr. Sharma has made significant contributions to the field of pain management as an author and educator. His publications in medical literature and presentations at national and international conferences have helped advance pain management techniques and protocols. This commitment to education reflects the center's dedication to implementing the most current and effective treatment options.

Patient Experience

Patients at Spine & Pain Centers can expect exceptional expertise delivered with respect and compassion. The practice prioritizes creating a supportive environment where patients feel heard and understood throughout their treatment journey.

For consultations or appointments, contact Spine & Pain Centers at +1 732-345-1180 or visit their website at www.spineandpain.com. The center is conveniently located at 1967 NJ-34 #102, Wall Township, NJ 07719.

New Jersey Pain, Spine, and Sports Associates serves patients throughout North Brunswick, Hazlet, and Elizabeth, New Jersey with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Faheem Abbasi, MD. As the founder and medical director, Dr. Abbasi has established a practice dedicated to alleviating suffering from various acute and chronic pain conditions. The practice specializes in treating a wide spectrum of painful conditions including carpal tunnel syndrome, neck and back pain, sciatica, joint pain, spinal disorders, musculoskeletal injuries, disc herniations, radiculopathy, arthritis, myofascial pain, and sports-related injuries.

Dr. Abbasi brings impressive credentials to his practice, being board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation and having completed specialized fellowship training in interventional pain management. This combination of expertise allows him to offer patients both conservative treatment approaches and advanced interventional procedures when necessary. His comprehensive understanding of the musculoskeletal system and pain pathways enables him to develop personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

Multiple Convenient Locations

With three strategically located offices across New Jersey, patients can access quality pain management care without extensive travel. The Elizabeth location can be found at BOA Building, 288 N Broad St # 1A, Elizabeth, NJ 07202. New patients and referrals are welcomed at all locations, with appointments available by calling +1 732-800-7246.

Comprehensive Approach to Pain Management

The practice philosophy centers on developing individualized treatment plans that may incorporate various modalities including medication management, physical therapy, interventional procedures, and lifestyle modifications. By addressing pain from multiple angles, Dr. Abbasi and his team help patients achieve lasting relief and improved function. For more information about services offered or to schedule a consultation, patients can visit the practice website at https://nopainnj.com/.

column40:
I was directed to Faheem Abbasi following a hit-and-run incident, where I was not at fault, by a personal injury lawyer at Jacoby & Meyers. Although neither my wife nor I sustained injuries, the lawyer recommended that we both undergo examination, suggesting Faheem Abbasi and Franklin Kumar, a physical therapist whose office is adjacent to Abbasi's, back in December 2022.

Both Abbasi and Kumar are not within my insurance network, which means I am responsible for the expenses. But I should have consulted my health insurance and checked online reviews beforehand, and I hope my experience can be help others.

The good: Convenient local office in Elizabeth, and scheduling appointments was straightforward.

The bad: The practice is small, leading to a lack of privacy as everyone can overhear discussions about medical issues. They conducted only a cursory medical examination, primarily asking questions and guiding through basic movements without a comprehensive evaluation. Additionally, the appointments lasted only about five minutes each. They suggested X-rays and MRI scans for serious issues, while simultaneously engaging in physical therapy sessions with his buddy Franklin Kumar across the hall.

The ugle: Billing was unclear and inconsistent, with charges varying each visit. Recently, I received a bill for a urine drug test from an unfamiliar laboratory, totaling $3,500, without prior notification or estimate.

In summary, I advise steering clear of this practice if you're seeking quality service. It seems they primarily handle patients referred by lawyers for injury claims, which might compromise the level of care provided while being money driven.|The dr has no bedside manner. He was very dismissive towards me and even yell at me when I asked him questions. He needs to be reported.|Well I would like to say that I feel very comfortable with Fahim Abassi who is my mother and brother and Faith and that he was going out his way to help me he hast to make his money that's all we write but he was very concerned about me and that's what's important I recommend all individuals to be a part of this practice as being a patient|Cater to Spanish people , Will not recommend The place is dirty inside and out staff and doctors rude and unprofessional|Very smart  and informative  and highly  recommended|||

column3:
Garden State Pain Management serves Clifton, New Jersey and surrounding areas with exceptional pain management solutions under the direction of Dr. Koppel, an Ivy League trained regenerative and interventional pain medicine specialist with over 25 years of experience. As a board-certified pain medicine physician, Dr. Koppel brings unparalleled expertise to patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. The practice specializes in state-of-the-art minimally invasive modalities designed to both diagnose and treat pain at its source, offering alternatives to surgical interventions that typically carry greater risks and complications.

At Garden State Pain Management, patients receive personalized care for a wide range of pain conditions. The practice emphasizes diagnostic precision followed by targeted treatments that address the root cause of discomfort rather than merely masking symptoms. Most conditions can be effectively managed without resorting to surgery, thanks to the advanced interventional techniques available at the clinic.

Cutting-Edge Regenerative Medicine

Dr. Koppel is at the forefront of the rapidly expanding field of regenerative medicine, which harnesses the body's natural healing capabilities to repair injured tissue and reverse degeneration. The practice offers innovative treatments including Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP) therapy and Stem Cell treatments, which promote healing at the cellular level and provide long-lasting relief for many patients who have not responded to conventional therapies.

Patient-Centered Approach

Every treatment plan at Garden State Pain Management is tailored to the individual patient's needs, medical history, and lifestyle goals. The practice prides itself on taking the time to thoroughly evaluate each case and develop comprehensive strategies that maximize effectiveness while minimizing discomfort and recovery time.

Contact Information

Website: www.gspmweb.com

Phone: +1 973-473-5752

ReclaimAbility Pain Services serves Mt Laurel Township, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized medical practice is dedicated to helping individuals reclaim their lives from the limitations of both acute and chronic pain conditions. With a team of board-certified and fellowship-trained physicians, we bring advanced expertise to every patient interaction, ensuring evidence-based care that addresses the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

At ReclaimAbility Pain Services, we understand that pain is a complex and deeply personal experience. Our physicians have undergone rigorous training beyond standard medical education, completing specialized fellowships in pain management techniques and interventions. This advanced training enables our team to accurately diagnose and effectively treat a wide spectrum of pain conditions, from post-surgical discomfort to complex chronic pain syndromes that have persisted for years.

Individualized Treatment Approaches

We reject the one-size-fits-all approach to pain management. Each patient receives a customized treatment plan developed after thorough evaluation of their medical history, pain patterns, and personal goals. Our comprehensive services may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy coordination, and educational resources—all tailored to your specific needs and designed to maximize function while minimizing pain.

Patient Education and Empowerment

What truly sets ReclaimAbility apart is our commitment to patient education. We believe informed patients achieve better outcomes, which is why we take the time to explain pain mechanisms, treatment options, and self-management strategies. This educational approach empowers our patients to become active participants in their recovery journey.

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, visit www.rapaindocs.com or call 856-531-7047. Our modern facility is conveniently located at 15000 Midlantic Dr #102, Mt Laurel Township, NJ 08054.

CURA Pain Doctors - Pain Management Center in Clifton, NJ stands as a distinguished healthcare facility dedicated to comprehensive pain treatment solutions. Located at 975 Clifton Ave #1, our center brings together a team of renowned pain management specialists committed to addressing chronic pain conditions through evidence-based approaches. We understand that pain is not merely a physical sensation but a complex experience that affects every aspect of our patients' lives.

At CURA Pain Management Center, we excel in treating a wide spectrum of pain conditions, with particular expertise in:

  • Chronic Pain Management

  • Neuropathic Pain Relief

  • Interventional Pain Procedures

  • Non-Opioid Pain Therapies

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets our practice apart is our unwavering commitment to personalized care. Our specialists are attuned to the intricacies and individual concerns of each pain condition, recognizing that no two patients experience pain in the same way. This patient-centered philosophy guides our diagnostic process and treatment planning, ensuring that each individual receives care tailored to their specific needs.

Advanced Treatment Options

Embracing the latest advancements in pain medicine, our facility offers cutting-edge techniques that go beyond conventional pain management. We prioritize minimally invasive interventions and non-opioid approaches whenever possible, focusing on treatments that address the root cause of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

Your Partner in Pain Relief

Whether you're dealing with persistent back pain, joint discomfort, post-surgical pain, or complex regional pain syndrome, CURA Pain Doctors provides the expertise and compassionate care needed to improve your quality of life. We invite you to schedule a consultation with our team and experience the difference that specialized pain management can make.

Garden State Pain & Orthopedics serves patients throughout New Jersey with locations in Edison, Clifton, Hazlet, West Orange, and Jersey City. Founded in 1994, this premier pain management practice began with a singular mission: to provide compassionate and comprehensive care for individuals suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Over nearly three decades, the practice has grown significantly, now employing more than 30 dedicated healthcare professionals across its five convenient locations, making quality pain management accessible to residents throughout the Garden State.

At Garden State Pain & Orthopedics, patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach to pain treatment. The practice has assembled a team of highly-trained physicians with specialized expertise across diverse pain conditions and treatment modalities. Their comprehensive services include interventional pain techniques, minimally-invasive surgeries, medical management, physical therapy, rehabilitation, and behavioral therapy—all designed to address the physical and emotional aspects of pain.

Advanced Technology and Specialized Care

The practice remains at the cutting edge of technology in pain medicine, continuously investing in the latest advancements to provide optimal outcomes for patients. Each treatment plan is individually tailored to address specific pain conditions, with the goal of improving quality of life and restoring function. The team specializes in treating various pain conditions, from back and neck pain to complex regional pain syndrome and beyond.

NJ Pain & Spine in Clifton, NJ offers comprehensive interventional pain management services under the expert guidance of Dr. Ednan Sheikh. Established as a premier pain management clinic in northern New Jersey, our practice combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients overcome chronic pain conditions and improve their quality of life. Our state-of-the-art facility on US-46 is equipped with the latest diagnostic and therapeutic technologies to address a wide spectrum of pain disorders.

Dr. Ednan Sheikh leads our clinical team as a board-certified Anesthesiologist and Interventional Pain Management Specialist. His exceptional medical background includes completing his medical training at the prestigious Thomas Jefferson Hospital in Philadelphia, followed by specialized fellowship training at the Tri-Institute of Pain in New York City. This comprehensive education has equipped Dr. Sheikh with advanced expertise in diagnosing and treating complex pain conditions using minimally invasive techniques.

Specialized Care

At NJ Pain & Spine, we provide targeted treatment for a diverse range of pain disorders, including:

  • Orthopedic pain conditions affecting joints, muscles, and bones

  • Cancer-related pain management for improved comfort during treatment

  • Spinal disorders including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, and sciatica

  • Neurological pain such as neuropathy and complex regional pain syndrome

Our Commitment

Dr. Sheikh and the entire team at NJ Pain & Spine are dedicated to upholding the highest standards of medical care. We believe in developing personalized treatment plans that address each patient's unique pain profile, medical history, and lifestyle needs. Our patient-centered approach ensures that individuals receive appropriate interventions with the goal of maximizing function and minimizing discomfort.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us:

Phone: +1 888-233-3415

Website: www.njpainspine.com

Address: 1037 US-46 #103, Clifton, NJ 07013, United States

Back Pain Specialist East Brunswick serves the East Brunswick, NJ community with comprehensive spine care and pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians specializes in treating various spinal conditions using both conservative and interventional approaches. Located conveniently on Route 18, we've established ourselves as a trusted healthcare provider for patients seeking relief from chronic back pain, herniated discs, sciatica, and other spine-related disorders.

At Back Pain Specialist East Brunswick, we understand how debilitating back pain can be. Our multidisciplinary approach combines advanced diagnostic techniques with personalized treatment plans to address the root cause of your discomfort. Whether you're suffering from work-related injuries, sports trauma, or degenerative conditions, our specialists employ evidence-based methodologies to restore your mobility and improve your quality of life.

Our Services

We offer a wide range of treatments including physical therapy, chiropractic care, pain management injections, regenerative medicine, and minimally invasive procedures. Each patient receives a thorough evaluation to determine the most effective intervention strategy. Patient-Centered Approach

We take the time to explain your condition, discuss treatment options, and address any concerns you might have. Our goal is not just to alleviate pain but to empower you with the knowledge and tools needed for long-term spine health.

I'm very happy with the progress that we are making and I have a lot of faith in her decisions. I hope she's with your office for the hole time I need any kind of treatment because I'll be with her getting whatever I need done.|All of the doctors and staff are extremely nice! I usually see Dr Caitlin Innerfield and she is AMAZING!!! You can just feel she truly cares about you in general, not just what is wrong with you! One of the best "bedside manners" I've ever experienced. She is ALWAYS on time and actually listens, she doesn't just let you say what's wrong and 1/2 listen, she lets you describe what's going on and tries to figure out why what's wrong has changed or isn't changing when it should or shouldn't. She is super knowledgeable, happy and sweet! You don't feel like you're on a conveyor belt like you do with some other specialists, you can tell she got into this field because she genuinely cares. When I started I told her I would try whatever she wanted me to, as long as it helped take away the pain, we experimented with some changes, nothing major and not a bunch all at once, and she told me, if it's not helping in a few days call us and we can change whatever we need too. I am broken, from literally my head to me toes and I don't feel as bad as I used to. My pain will never fully go away, but she does her best to take away as much as possible. A true professional, he's very efficient, doesn't waste time, but never rushes me, either. Even though I'm in pain, his pleasant smile makes the day, and the pain, easier to handle. SamWell Institute for Pain Management serves patients throughout Colonia and Livingston, New Jersey with comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by board-certified specialists, this premier medical practice delivers personalized care for those suffering from chronic pain conditions. The institute's multidisciplinary approach combines cutting-edge interventional procedures with rehabilitative therapies to address the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

Under the direction of Jay M. Shah, MD, FAAPMR and Jeffery Deygoo, MD, SamWell Institute has established itself as a leader in non-opioid pain management. Dr. Shah, a Fellow of the American Academy of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, brings specialized expertise in interventional pain techniques, while the entire medical team remains committed to evidence-based treatments that promote long-term relief and improved functionality.

Comprehensive Services

The practice specializes in treating a wide spectrum of pain conditions including:

  • Neck and back pain

  • Knee pain and arthritis

  • Painful vein conditions

  • Car accident injuries

  • Work-related injuries

  • Various forms of chronic pain

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes SamWell Institute is their commitment to developing individualized treatment plans that minimize reliance on opioid medications. Their interventional techniques target pain at its source, offering patients sustainable relief and improved quality of life. The practice combines advanced diagnostic capabilities with therapeutic interventions to ensure accurate treatment of complex pain conditions.

For consultations or appointments, patients can contact SamWell Institute at +1 732-276-2494 or visit their Colonia office located at 1503 St Georges Ave, Suite 205, Colonia, NJ 07067. Additional information about their services and approach to pain management is available on their website at www.samwellpain.com.
column11: SamWell Institute for Pain Management is a premier pain medicine, physical medicine, and rehabilitation practice led by Jay Shah, MD, Jeffery Deygoo, MD, and their highly trained team. With offices in Colonia and Livingston, New Jersey, they offer long-term, interventional pain-relieving solutions that focus on non-opioid treatments. People experiencing neck pain, back pain, knee pain, arthritis, painful veins, car accident or work-related injuries, and other types of chronic pain can turn to SamWell Institute for Pain Management for up-to-date, effective pain-relieving solutions.

NJHS Princeton Pain Management serves Princeton, New Jersey and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our board-certified physicians specialize in diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions using a multidisciplinary approach that prioritizes patient comfort and long-term wellness. With decades of combined experience, our medical team utilizes evidence-based practices to address pain at its source rather than simply masking symptoms.

At Princeton Pain Management, we employ cutting-edge diagnostic tools and therapeutic interventions to identify and treat the underlying causes of pain. Our specialists utilize advanced techniques including nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and minimally invasive procedures to alleviate suffering. When clinically appropriate, we selectively incorporate medication management as part of a comprehensive treatment plan, always focusing on functional improvement and quality of life enhancement.

Conditions We Treat

Our practice specializes in addressing a wide spectrum of pain conditions, including but not limited to:

  • Back and neck pain

  • Joint pain and arthritis

  • Neuropathic pain

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Cancer-related pain

  • Fibromyalgia and myofascial pain

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in developing individualized treatment plans that address each patient's unique pain profile. Our team takes the time to listen, thoroughly evaluate, and collaborate with patients to establish realistic goals for pain reduction and improved functionality. This personalized approach ensures that treatments align with patients' lifestyles, preferences, and overall health objectives.

Visit Our Practice

Princeton Pain Management is conveniently located at 5 Plainsboro Rd, Suite 390, Plainsboro Township, NJ 08536. Our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to provide the highest standard of care in a comfortable, supportive environment.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please call us at (609) 497-4371 or visit our website at www.princetonpainmanagement.com. Our dedicated staff is ready to assist you on your journey toward effective pain management and improved quality of life.
column11: Princeton Pain Management physicians utilize advanced techniques to alleviate pain, and, when indicated, selectively use medication to control pain.

Center For Pain Management serves Hackensack, NJ and surrounding communities with specialized pain treatment services. Founded on the principle that pain should be addressed comprehensively, our facility has established itself as a trusted resource for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Our team of board-certified physicians and pain specialists work collaboratively to develop personalized treatment plans that address the unique needs of each patient.

At Center For Pain Management, we utilize a multi-disciplinary approach that combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment options. Our specialists are trained in identifying the root causes of pain rather than simply treating symptoms. This preventative philosophy helps patients avoid the progression of pain into chronic, debilitating conditions that can significantly impact quality of life.

Our Treatment Approach

We offer a wide range of interventional procedures, medication management protocols, and rehabilitative therapies designed to provide effective pain relief. Our comprehensive services include nerve blocks, epidural injections, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and various minimally invasive techniques that target specific pain generators. Each treatment plan is carefully monitored and adjusted to ensure optimal outcomes.

Patient-Centered Care

What distinguishes our practice is our unwavering commitment to compassionate, personalized care. We understand that pain affects not only physical well-being but also emotional and psychological health. Our team takes the time to listen to patients' concerns, thoroughly explain treatment options, and involve patients in the decision-making process. This collaborative approach fosters trust and leads to better treatment adherence and outcomes.

Contact Information

We welcome new patients at our conveniently located facility in Hackensack. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us:

Address: 294 State St Suite 1, Hackensack, NJ 07601, United States

Phone: +1 201-488-7246

Center For Pain Management is developing a center of excellence in pain management, dedicated to helping patients reclaim their lives from the limitations of pain through advanced, evidence-based treatments delivered with compassion and expertise.

column2: New Jersey Spine and Pain Institute, LLC - Jersey City
column3:
New Jersey Spine and Pain Institute, LLC in Jersey City, NJ is a premier pain management center dedicated to helping patients find relief from chronic pain conditions. Led by Dr. Joseph Ibrahim, a highly qualified pain management physician, the institute offers comprehensive treatment options tailored to each patient's unique needs. With a focus on identifying and addressing the root causes of pain, the team at New Jersey Spine and Pain Institute combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to improve patients' quality of life.

The institute provides a wide range of specialized treatments for various pain conditions, including:

  • Back and neck pain management

  • Treatment for spinal stenosis

  • Solutions for knee and shoulder pain

  • Advanced neuromodulation techniques including spinal cord stimulators

  • Therapies for neuropathic pain and headaches

  • Specialized care for Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (formerly called RSD)

  • Innovative regenerative medicine options such as PRP (Platelets Rich Plasma) injections

  • Effective treatments for carpal tunnel syndrome

About Dr. Joseph Ibrahim

As the founder of New Jersey Spine and Pain Institute, Dr. Ibrahim brings extensive training and experience to his practice. A graduate of SUNY-HSC in Brooklyn, he completed his residency in physical medicine and rehabilitation, developing specialized expertise in pain management. Dr. Ibrahim's comprehensive approach focuses on identifying underlying causes of pain rather than simply treating symptoms, allowing him to develop effective treatment plans that restore patients to health and improve their overall function.

Integrated Treatment Approach

What sets New Jersey Spine and Pain Institute apart is their integrated approach to pain management. The institute combines medical interventions with physical therapy and regenerative medicine techniques to provide holistic care. This multidisciplinary strategy ensures that patients receive the most effective treatments for their specific conditions, with the goal of minimizing medication dependence and improving long-term outcomes.

Contact Information

Address: 2520 John F. Kennedy Blvd Unit C2, Jersey City, NJ 07304, United States

Phone: +1 201-436-0033

Website: https://www.njspineandpain.com/pain-management-doctor-jersey-city/

He is a graduate of SUNY-HSC in Brooklyn, where he served his residency in physical medicine and rehabilitation.

column3:
Performance Pain and Sports Medicine in Lawrence Township, NJ serves patients seeking non-surgical solutions for chronic pain conditions. Our state-of-the-art facility at 4056 Quakerbridge Rd combines advanced medical technology with compassionate care to address a wide range of pain issues affecting the back, neck, legs, nerves, joints, and muscles. We take pride in our patient-centered approach that focuses on identifying the root cause of pain rather than merely treating symptoms.

Our practice is led by quadruple board-certified physicians Dr. Matthias Wiederholz and Dr. Suzanne Manzi, who bring exceptional expertise to every patient consultation. Dr. Wiederholz holds the distinguished position as one of only three Discseel® Master Instructors in the entire United States. This rare qualification comes from his direct training with Dr. Kevin Pauza, the inventor of the revolutionary Discseel® procedure, which offers groundbreaking treatment for disc-related pain without invasive surgery.

Comprehensive Treatment Options

At Performance Pain and Sports Medicine, we offer a comprehensive range of non-surgical interventions designed to address pain at its source. Our treatment protocols incorporate the latest advancements in regenerative medicine, interventional procedures, and physical rehabilitation. Each treatment plan is customized to the individual patient's condition, medical history, and lifestyle needs.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our expert team, please call us at +1 609-588-8600 or visit our website at www.performancepain.com. Our office is conveniently located at 4056 Quakerbridge Rd, Suite 112, Lawrence Township, NJ 08648, with accessible parking and a comfortable waiting area designed with our patients' needs in mind.
column11:
At Performance Pain and Sports Medicine, we are proud to offer advanced, non-surgical treatments for chronic pain. Dr. Matthias Wiederholz is one of only three Discseel(r) Master Instructors in the United States, personally trained by Dr. Kevin Pauza, the inventor of the Discseel(r) procedure. Dr.

column38: Mark Klausner|Sandra Chen|Jackie Bendorf|kinsey Alfaro|Adrienne Marchioni|Rachel M|Ray Isola|BradnTroy Athome
column40:
I am a retired physician and have been seeing Dr Wiederholz  in the Lawrenceville office as well as by telehealth for several years. He is an excellent listener and engages in a very low key session where the patient has time to ask their questions and receive their answers. He offers an array of interventional and non- interventional options, discusses them with you, and gives you the opportunity to do or not do them, without any type of pressure. Thus far I have avoided intervention and gone the medication route. The Lawrenceville office staff of Brittany and Dalila are absolutely amazing. They follow up on things very quickly and are always eager to help, being very oriented to the comfort and convenience of the patients.|I've had an amazing experience at Performance Spine since day one!  The front desk staff; Andrea, Gianna, Casey, and Brittany, are friendly and helpful.  They work hard to schedule my appointments around my crazy life and make changes with a smile.  Dr. Guy really listened to my symptoms, ordered testing, and made and adjusted my course of treatment as needed without hesitation.  Sondra always has a smile on her face and made my visits enjoyable.

My treatment included visiting with the Chiropractor, Ashley, who made the process of healing relaxing.  I also had the opportunity to work with PT Gary who monitored my program and ensured that each stretch helped vs hurt.  The aides working in the PT/Chiropractic area; Carol, Mark, and Bryan made giving up my lunch each day enjoyable.  They were fun and energetic and always willing to help.

I'm beyond pleased with my experience and thrilled at the progress I have made.  The entire staff has helped me get back on track for the active life I enjoy living!

Thank you!!
Sandy|PSSM is the best practice for healing your injury without surgery. You are always greeted with a warm welcome and a nice smile from the girls in the front. (Erika, Dalila, Jasmine, Monet & Kim are all awesome!) The clinical staff not only gets you out of your immediate condition, they continue to work with you and get you feeling better than ever.  I have been a patient with them for several years through different injuries and I was always 110% better when I finished with my PT.  Dr Susie is an exceptional Chiropractor and I always feel amazing after my appointment. Chris is very knowledgeable and his PT plan for me worked phenomenally. Gary was also very effective with my treatment plan.  The staff is warm, kind, friendly and just amazing. I actually enjoyed my exercise time with Bri, Monique, Kristen, Tim, Tom & Ryan. They have a way of making it fun!|I would not recommend this office. I showed up once for a first visit bc my wrist hurt and he wanted me to do weekly acupuncture, get all manner of scans, and start hormone therapy.... I was like bro I have fibromyalgia the pain is essentially made up. Let me get some strong Advil or a cortisone shot. (I run marathons I just neeeded som support not anything wild) he refused until I got scans to check for crazy things like a bone spur? I'm like bro I just have fibromyalgia it's nothing.

Anyway decided he wasn't for me. But the billing saga, my god, I've never met a doctor who would call my emergency contact over and over and over again looking for me? Like what is this the mafia?!?! They were very unclear that I would be billed so much for a conversation about my wrist... and yes I have good coverage. This dude is literally WILD calling my family members about like 100$. Shaking me down for a penny.

TLDR
the best support for pain is someone who's gonna be honest enough to tell u Advil and some rest if that's the real answer. Red flags when someone shoves hormones not covered by ins. Down ur throat. Idk about this guy and I try to not leave negative reviews but he harassed my emergency contact. For a month. Weirdo.|I am eternally grateful to everyone at Performance Spine and Sports.  They are a 'one-stop service shop'.  They provide coordinated care and treatment all in one place.  No more running around to numerous doctors!  I love the convenience and the staff is so caring and helpful. The nurse Beth is full of knowledge and compassion and she will drop anything to help you.  Dr. Guy is extremely thorough and determined to find the right treatment to get you feeling like yourself again.  Dr. Susie is by far the best chiropractor I have seen in a very long time.  After just one appointment with her I was already starting to feel better the next day! Chris squeezed me in that day to get me evaluated and start planning my PT regimen.  I was extremely happy and feeling very optimistic when I left that day.  I instantly felt like I was being treated like family.  You couldn't ask for more experienced, more thorough or nicer treatment.  I highly recommend Performance Spine and Sports!|I have been a going to Performance Spine and Sports Medicine for over a year and I would not go anywhere else!  I have been to other physical therapist as well as orthopedists and none compare to the staff here.

Nicole is my main Physical Therapist, but I have also worked with Gary and Katrina.  Each are knowledgeable and caring.  They take their time with you and really listen to you.  When they ask how you are feeling, they mean it.

Their aides are fantastic!  Carol, Mark, and Brian are there to help get everything set up and give you any assistance that you may need.  They also treat you with care and a smile, always willing to get you whatever you need.

Ashley is the Chiropractor and she is great!  She is gentle yet knows exactly where to push and pull to get things in perfect alignment.  I am always so relaxed after an adjustment.

The reception staff (Andrea, Gianna, Casey, and Brittany) greets you with a smile when they check you in.  They work with you and your day when scheduling appointments and are always pleasant! I usually deal with Gianna and Andrea.  They are very professional and make sure to greet me on the way in and out.  Their customer service is tops!   I look forward to each visit.

Dr. Guy and Sondra take very good care of me.  Sondra sets me up when I get to the office.  She is kind, gentle, and thorough.  She never has a harsh word whether taking my blood pressure or making sure I have approval for a procedure.

Dr. Guy has helped me immensely.  I have decreased my opioid intake and still decreased pain through his guidance.  I have also had alternate therapy such as acupuncture and others.  I have been able to avoid surgery, where as other physicians have guided me towards going under the knife.  I am beyond happy with the results!

I have improved a great deal since coming to Performance Spine and I see nothing but more healing to come.  I cannot say enough wonderful things about the facility and staff.|My experience working with Dr. Wiederholz has been top notch every step of the way.  He's a master at diagnosing and identifying the possible sources of pain and has an extensive tool kit of treatment options that he can draw from to provide pain relief.  From cutting edge techniques like Discseel and stem cells, to the more mainstream treatments like Intracept for basivertebral nerve ablation, rhizotomy, and more, Dr. W can do it all.  The knowledge, expertise and responsiveness of this dedicated pain management professional is impressive.  I would be remiss if I failed to mention how all of his medical prowess is ably facilitated by Dalila and Brittany, his NJ office staff. They're both super-helpful, cordial, and accommodating.

Over the past year we've made a ton of progress to address my multiple sources of pain stemming from a variety of old injuries and bodily wear & tear from decades of a highly active lifestyle.  Most notably, he's done a great job of helping me to eliminate and/or reduce my low back pain with a combination of treatments.  It's nice to once again awaken each morning and not be in a world of pain and discomfort.  With my improved mobility, I can once again pursue my many recreational activities with little to no hesitation.  For that I'm exceedingly grateful.  All in all, a very positive experience!|I have been seeing Dr. Manzi since before Performance Pain was founded. I cannot say enough good things about her. Using alternative treatments she got me off of the majority of my pain meds. This has made my pain more manageable. I can't say I have no pain, but it is better than it was and I have more awareness of things. I have also seen and had procedures with Dr. Wiederholz. He has the same views on alternate treatments as Dr. Manzi. They both have a great bedside manner and do not try to rush. All of the staff is very professional and willing to help. This especially applies to Pura.

Bloomfield Pain Management serves Bloomfield, NJ and surrounding Essex County communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by Dr. Caruthers, our specialized clinic focuses on treating chronic pain conditions through integrative approaches that address the root causes rather than merely masking symptoms. Our team of board-certified specialists combines traditional medical interventions with innovative therapies to develop personalized treatment plans for each patient's unique needs.

At Bloomfield Pain Management, we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our multidisciplinary approach includes interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and behavioral health support. Dr. Caruthers and his experienced team specialize in treating conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint disorders, neuropathy, fibromyalgia, and post-surgical pain syndromes.

Our Patient-Centered Approach

Don't depend on short-term relief any longer. We believe in creating sustainable pain management strategies that improve quality of life and restore function. Each treatment plan is carefully crafted after thorough evaluation and consultation, ensuring we address your specific pain concerns with evidence-based solutions.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our modern clinic at 323 Belleville Ave in Bloomfield features advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies in a comfortable, welcoming environment. We've designed our space to make your visits as stress-free as possible, recognizing that a positive clinical experience contributes to better outcomes.

Contact Information

Let Dr. Caruthers and his team help you open the door to a pain-free life. Schedule your consultation today:

Phone: +1 862-358-8659

Address: 323 Belleville Ave, Bloomfield, NJ 07003, United States

Website: www.paintresting.com

column2: Epic Pain Management: Dr. Amit Goswami, MD
column3:
Epic Pain Management serves Wayne, NJ and surrounding communities with specialized interventional pain management services. Under the expert guidance of Dr. Amit Goswami, MD, our Ivy League-trained medical team delivers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. We've established ourselves as a trusted healthcare provider in Northern New Jersey, combining advanced medical techniques with compassionate patient care to help restore quality of life without resorting to invasive surgical procedures.

At Epic Pain Management, we offer the most current and state-of-the-art treatments specifically designed for neck pain, back pain, and knee pain. Our approach focuses on minimally invasive procedures that allow patients to avoid surgery and unnecessary downtime. Each treatment plan is customized to address the unique needs of the individual, targeting the root cause of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

Our Medical Expertise

Our practice is led by highly qualified physicians with extensive training from prestigious Ivy League institutions. Dr. Goswami and his team bring years of specialized experience in pain management, utilizing evidence-based approaches that have demonstrated excellent outcomes for our patients. We stay at the forefront of pain medicine advancements to ensure our patients receive the most effective care available.

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. That's why we take the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and develop a comprehensive treatment strategy that addresses your specific needs. Our goal is not just pain reduction but helping you return to the activities you enjoy with improved function and mobility.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, please contact us at +1 973-866-0336. Our modern facility is conveniently located at 516 Hamburg Turnpike, Suite 102, Wayne, NJ 07470. For more information about our services and treatment options, visit our website at www.epicpain.com.
