column40:
Dr. Goswami is an outstanding doctor. He is thorough, explores all treatment options, and answers questions patiently and clearly. He has treated my pain successfully and follows up on my progress. I recommend him highly.|I was a patient of Dr. Goswami when I had a car accident. My treatments were paid for via no fault car insurance. While I was on the surgery table right before my procedure, he confronts me about payment issues. He was paid eventually after all the insurance troubles but totally thought it was inappropriate he brought this up as I was about to be put under rather than when I was in the office. He is very personable until it's about money. I get that it's a business but years later I still remember this very bad experience.

Response:

I was 100% a patient here. In fact, multiple times.  Please see other reviews and see that other patients were confronted rudely as well. I understand medicine is a business, however there's a way to keep it professional. Maybe have your staff discuss these issues while I am at the office and not on the procedure table. Unfortunately, my experience was right before my procedure as I was about to be put under anesthesia.|He is an excellent doctor. I have been treating FACET joint syndrome for a long time.  My first treatment lasted 7 1/2 years and I've just completed my second treatment and I'm pain-free in my back. Great person & skilled physician.|I was suffering from severe pain radiating down my leg and could barely walk. Dr. Goswami was the ONLY pain management doctor that would not only speak with me directly but most importantly was available to see me right away where other doctors could not.  I needed an epideral injection and he was able to schedule it the following day. I am forever grateful for his care and attentiveness.|Dr. Amit is extremely professional and always takes the time to listen to your ailments. He is good at problem solving, and identifying the source of the pain. He is extremely knowledgeable and kind.|I have no idea who Linda is in your practice, but let me tell you she is very unprofessional
To leave me a voicemail and tell me my insurance isn't good and just cancel. My appointment was extremely rude. First of all I made a mistake by even trying to reach the doctor to make an appointment and I spoke with him directly and he was absolutely nice, but whoever Linda is wow she shouldn't even be working if she doesn't like her job she shouldn't treat people that way, especially if they're going through a hard time. Shame on you. 
By the way, I got the best insurance from Horizon Blue Shield Blue Cross so don't go telling me my insurance isn't good. Thanks for nothing lady.|I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Goswami, and I can't say enough positive things about their compassionate and attentive approach to medicine. From the moment I walked into their office, I felt heard and valued as a patient.

Dr. Goswami took the time to thoroughly explain my diagnosis and treatment options, making sure I fully understood every aspect of my healthcare journey. His genuine concern for my well-being was evident in every interaction, and I always felt like I was in the best hands.

What truly sets Dr. Goswami apart is his unwavering dedication to their patients' health and comfort. They went above and beyond to accommodate my needs and ensure that I received the best care po

ssible. It's not just about treating the illness with Dr. Goswami; it's about treating the whole person.

I couldn't be more grateful for the compassionate care I received from Dr. Goswami. He is a shining example of what a caring and dedicated healthcare professional should be, and I would highly recommend him to anyone in search of a doctor who genuinely cares about their patients' well-being.|Dr Goswami is fantastic! He immediately addressed my concerns and gave me treatment options.

column2: Edward Shen MD, Spine and Pain Specialty Care
column3:
Edward Shen MD, Spine and Pain Specialty Care serves Elizabeth, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized practice focuses on diagnosing and treating various spinal conditions and chronic pain disorders using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. Dr. Shen brings extensive expertise in interventional pain management techniques, helping patients find relief when traditional treatments have failed.

At Spine and Pain Specialty Care, we offer a wide range of treatments including epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and medication management. Our approach emphasizes minimally invasive procedures that target the source of pain while minimizing recovery time and discomfort. We treat conditions including herniated discs, sciatica, spinal stenosis, arthritis, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain.

Patient-Centered Approach

Dr. Shen and our dedicated team prioritize creating individualized treatment plans that address both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. We take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors to develop the most effective pain management strategy. Our goal is not just to mask symptoms but to improve functionality and quality of life for our patients.

Visit Our Practice

Located at 219 S Broad St, Elizabeth, NJ 07202, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology. We welcome new patients and accept most major insurance plans. To schedule a consultation with Dr. Edward Shen, please call +1 908-818-1600 or visit our website at spscpaincare.com for more information about our services and to access patient resources.

column40:
Not sure where to begin. Dr. Shen and his team have been remarkable on many different levels. Their attentiveness towards patients is beyond compare. They are are compassionate, understanding, and treat everyone individually as if they were the only patient. Not like many doctors offices who rush between everyone. They have helped my journey on healing tremendously, and I would recommend them to anyone over and over again.|Have to say I have been seeing Dr. Shen for the past 8 years when I have an issue that requires pain management. The staff is extremely friendly and I have to say that Dr. Shen is very knowledgeable and listens carefully to the issues explained and brings solutions to help resolve the issues going on. Highly recommend to anyone who is having severe pain issues.|I just want to say, I'm very grateful for Dr.Shen and his staff, I've had the greatest experience in an environment where they actually care about you, I'm appreciative of that because I've had some not so good experiences the last few years with my knee problems and not only have i been treated where i have actually found relief from the pain, it was very prompt and easy|Dr. Shen HAS been working for me for the last 3 years and HAS been able to help my quality of life immensely. His staff also have been very attentive and truly one of a kind!|Dr Shen and the staff at Spine and Pain Specialty Care are amongst the best medical practitioners I've encountered.

Dr Shen is attentive, astute, caring, compassionate, friendly, highly efficient, takes the time needed with each patient and is always up to date with the latest information regarding treatments, medications and conditions. I am the type of person that has been lucky to have found some amazing doctors in my life. Therefore the bar is set high when it comes to my assessment of doctors that treat me. He has all the qualities shared by doctors I have kept in my life for decades due to their excellent work ethic, attention to the patient, and my confidence in their treatment plan. He is now amongst just a handful of doctors that I plan to keep seeing in the future when his specific speciality is needed for my care.

The staff in this office is extremely friendly, on top of their game, and a pleasure to deal with! Especially the one person I have dealt with the most, Anna, who is always so friendly, so very helpful, and gives you confidence that she knows all the ins and outs of every aspect of her job and the office. I know that if I have questions, need information given to the doctor, or assistance with details regarding my treatment plan, that she is someone I can always count on to get things done and get them done properly.

The same can be said for every member of the medical team at Spine and Pain Specialty Care. I am so very grateful to them all for their service!|Dr Edward Shen & staff have been amazing at helping me feel better from my neck & shoulder. He listen and take the time to explain everything he does.This facility is so far the best ,they really care about the patient and go out of their way to accommodate you specifically getting you well promptly . Also when booking appointments they are very flexible they truly care about their patients. I never feel like I'm just a number. Ana is such a great and sweet person ,very polite, professional, caring, attentive and friendly. Thank you all!|I was referred to Dr. Shen's practice after a failed attempt at another pain management office..... Therefore I was a bit hesitant at first. But I must say, everything from the moment you walk in and speak to their staff (Ana) in my case, all the way to seeing Dr. Shen is professionalism and the upmost care. The Doctor and his staff take the time to listen,  properly explain any and all steps to procedures related to your treatment, review and discuss exams, results and suggest different options of treatment taking in consideration your opinion.
Everyone is friendly and professional.!!!|I talked to Dr. Shen and he recommended RFA procedure for my reoccurring pain in my lower lumbar. I put my faith and trust in Dr. Shen and he resolved my issues to a point where I can do the Labor things I live to do. I would never switch to another Dr. after the treatment and service I received from him and his staff. He's a great Dr. that truly cares and goes above and beyond to make you understand what's going on. If your looking for a new doctor or tired of being in pain I would suggest making an appointment to see him, you won't be disappointed!

Back Pain Doctor East Brunswick serves the East Brunswick, NJ community with specialized spine care and pain management solutions. Our board-certified physicians combine decades of experience with cutting-edge techniques to address chronic back pain, herniated discs, sciatica, and other spinal conditions. Located conveniently on Route 18, our state-of-the-art facility offers comprehensive diagnostic services and personalized treatment plans designed to restore mobility and improve quality of life without unnecessary surgical intervention.

At The Spine & Rehab Group, we provide a multidisciplinary approach to back pain management. Our treatments range from conservative therapies like physical rehabilitation and chiropractic care to advanced interventional procedures including epidural injections, radiofrequency ablation, and minimally invasive spine procedures. Each treatment plan is tailored to address the specific needs and conditions of our patients, focusing on both immediate pain relief and long-term recovery.

Expert Medical Team

Our practice features fellowship-trained pain management specialists and spine experts who stay at the forefront of medical advancements. The team collaborates closely with each patient, taking time to explain conditions, treatment options, and expected outcomes. This patient-centered approach ensures that individuals feel informed and comfortable throughout their healing journey.

Patient Information

We welcome new patients at our East Brunswick location. For appointments or consultations, please contact us at +1 732-743-9219. Our office is located at 605 NJ-18, East Brunswick, NJ 08816, with convenient parking available. Visit our website at http://thespineandrehabgroup.com/ for more information about our services, physician profiles, and patient resources.

Why Choose Our Back Pain Specialists

What distinguishes our practice is our commitment to non-surgical solutions whenever possible. We believe in addressing the root cause of pain rather than merely treating symptoms. Our diagnostic capabilities include advanced imaging and electrodiagnostic testing performed on-site, allowing for prompt and accurate assessment of spinal conditions. Most insurance plans are accepted, and our administrative team works diligently to maximize coverage for necessary treatments.

column2: The Painless Center: Jason Chiu, MD

The Painless Center in Tenafly, New Jersey provides specialized pain management services under the expert guidance of Dr. Jason Chiu, MD. Established to address the diverse needs of patients suffering from chronic pain conditions, this premier medical facility combines innovative treatment approaches with compassionate care. Dr. Chiu and his dedicated team work diligently to develop personalized treatment plans that target the root causes of pain rather than merely addressing symptoms, helping patients regain mobility and improve their quality of life.

Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute serves patients throughout Plainsboro Township, Freehold, Hamilton, and surrounding New Jersey communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by Dr. Ronak D. Patel, the institute has established itself as a premier destination for patients seeking relief from chronic pain conditions without surgical intervention. With conveniently located offices in both Plainsboro Township and Freehold, the practice extends its specialized care to residents across central New Jersey who struggle with persistent pain issues.

At the helm of Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute is Dr. Ronak D. Patel, a distinguished physician who holds double board certifications in anesthesiology and pain management. This specialized training enables Dr. Patel and his team to address complex pain conditions with precision and expertise. The institute's approach combines evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans tailored to each patient's unique circumstances and health goals.

Comprehensive Treatment Approach

The institute offers head-to-toe pain management services for adult patients, addressing everything from chronic back and neck pain to joint discomfort, neuropathic conditions, and sports injuries. Patients benefit from an extensive range of non-surgical interventions designed to target the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms. This comprehensive approach helps patients achieve lasting relief while improving their overall quality of life and functional capacity.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

Located at 666 Plainsboro Rd Building 100, Suite D in Plainsboro Township, the institute's main facility features advanced diagnostic and treatment technologies. Patients can schedule consultations and learn more about available treatment options by calling +1 609-269-4451 or visiting the practice website at www.njpaindoc.com. The team at Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute remains committed to providing compassionate care while helping patients reclaim pain-free, active lifestyles.
column11:
About Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute

Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute provides head to toe pain management for adult patients in Plainsboro, Freehold, Hamilton, and surrounding New Jersey communities, from its offices in Plainsboro Township and Freehold. Founder and medical director Ronak D. Patel, MD, is a double board-certified in anesthesiology and pain management. He leads a team of medical professionals dedicated to resolving chronic pain in all its forms.
The practice offers an extensive range of non-surgical treatments for a broad spectrum of musculoskeletal disorders.

column40:
I went to their clinic in Plainsboro. They are a wonderful group of professionals. Dr. Patel and his nurse practitioner Avani were wonderful. It's a one stop clinic that has everything you could ask for. I'm saying this as my previous experience with another pain management group offered nothing like this group does. I highly recommend them.|Dr. Patel and his team are wonderful. The staff working there make you feel comfortable and very knowledgeable. Highly recommended.|I had suffered from chronic cervical and thoracic pain for more than 25 years when I met Dr Patel at Regenerative Spine and Pain Institute. Despite several surgeries and trying many different therapies, the pain had been increasingly negatively impacting my quality of life and necessitated a lot of medication. Dr Patel used a combination of radiofrequency ablation and trigger point injections, supplemented by weekly physical therapy, to manage my pain. With his guidance and as a result of his treatment over the past 2 years, I have been able to halve my pain medication and today, my health and fitness is the best it has been in over a decade. I have even been able to start playing a sport!  If you are experiencing chronic neck or back pain, I recommend you talk to Dr Patel.|The staff was very friendly and professional, I enjoyed my visits, I would recommend Dr. Patel for any orthopedic care!|By far Dr. Ronak Patel M.D. is the worst Dr. we have been to. My husband was being treated due to a car accident therefore it was the car insurance paying for the treatments. They did a procedure on my husband and when the follow up came they would not see him because his car insurance had ran out of money. How can you possibly deny a follow up visit on a patient that you did a procedure on. This was not a new procedure, it was a follow up. They did not call him to tell him they would not be see him, they waited until he went to deny service. What kind of dr has a procedure done on a patient and does not follow up to see if what he recommended worked. And now we are trying to get his records and they are giving us a hard time. Are they hiding something? This dr is very unprofessional and unethical. A follow up visit to review your work is a must and is included in initial payment. Also, when we tried giving them our personal medical insurance to at least see if the procedure worked they denied it.|I am a 49 year old active male/business owner that finds himself in the gym five to seven days a week. My spinal pain impeded my ability to stay healthy mentally and physically and on my terms. It was a huge distraction. Quite frankly it made me miserable, and I was withdrawn from social activities as well as work. There was no pep in my step because the pain was so overwhelming that all my energy went to combating that feeling. I do not wish it on anyone-well, maybe one or two people....
Fortunately, I was referred to Doctor Patel (via an MD/DO) approximately one year ago and that was the game changer. The first point of contact is the Office staff and the office staff is pretty much like hanging with friends. Down to earth wonderful people that guide everyone fluidly.
After my second visit with Dr. Patel, we had a plan of attack. I understood the problem and the plan on how to correct it medically. Dr. Patel was spot on at every turn in terms of treatment and time frames, and of course as treatment progressed, my health improved and my confidence in him grew. He is not aggressive or passive just logical and understands how to speak to his audience. When you look forward to going to the doctor you know you are in the right place. Thank you Dr. Patel!|Dr. Patel is one of the most professional and kind physicians I have gone to for treatment.  He is kind, compassionate, and thorough.  Dr. Patel takes his time to actually listen to his patients.  I never felt rushed and I appreciated him taking comprehensive notes on my injuries.  Dr. Patel is a top notch doctor, and I would recommend him to anyone needing pain management treatment.  Do not seek out another physician, go to Dr. Patel.  I should also add that you will be heard, get an appointment, and encounter a welcoming staff when visiting his office.  Thank you, Dr. Patel!|I have been suffering for many years with pain throughout my spine. I have been treated by numerous doctors for this and have never had any relief. I was recommended to Dr.Patel by another physician, I could not be anymore satisfied and happier.  My pain is no where near the way it was before I started here. Dr. Patel is by far the most kindest, knowledgeable, and personable physician I have ever met. He takes time with you, listens to you and helps you to feel better. His office staff is very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend Dr. Patel and his staff to anyone.

column3:
Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center in Clifton, New Jersey offers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. Our specialized medical facility focuses on identifying and treating a wide range of pain issues, including back pain, neck discomfort, shoulder problems, joint pain, and other persistent pain conditions that impact quality of life. With a team of board-certified physicians and pain management specialists, we've established ourselves as a trusted healthcare provider in the Clifton area, delivering evidence-based treatments that address not just symptoms but the underlying causes of pain.

At IPMC, we believe effective pain management requires looking at the complete picture of a patient's health. Our practitioners take time to understand each patient's unique circumstances, conducting thorough evaluations that consider physical symptoms alongside lifestyle factors, medical history, and personal goals. This comprehensive assessment allows us to develop individualized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, regenerative medicine options, and complementary therapies. By addressing pain from multiple angles, we help patients achieve lasting relief rather than temporary fixes.

Specialized Treatment Options

Our center offers advanced interventional procedures including epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and joint injections. These targeted treatments can provide significant relief while avoiding the risks associated with major surgery or long-term opioid use. For spine-related conditions, our ortho-spine specialists utilize the latest diagnostic imaging and treatment technologies to address herniated discs, spinal stenosis, sciatica, and degenerative disc disease with precision and care.

Patient-Centered Care Philosophy

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of life, from work performance to family relationships and emotional wellbeing. Our compassionate team works closely with each patient, providing education about their condition and involving them in treatment decisions. This collaborative approach empowers patients to take an active role in their recovery journey. As our motto states: "Stop Hurting and Start Living!" – we're committed to helping you reclaim the active, fulfilling lifestyle pain has taken from you.

Visit Our Clifton Location

Our modern, comfortable facility is conveniently located at 1001 Clifton Ave, Suite 2A, Clifton, NJ 07013. We welcome new patients and accept most major insurance plans. To schedule your comprehensive pain evaluation, call us today at (862) 505-2610 or visit our website at www.ipmchealth.com/locations/clifton to learn more about our services and treatment options. Don't let pain control your life any longer – take the first step toward lasting relief with Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center.

Garden State Pain & Orthopedics serves patients throughout New Jersey with locations in Edison, Clifton, Hazlet, West Orange, and Jersey City. Since its founding in 1994, the practice has been dedicated to providing compassionate and comprehensive pain management solutions for individuals struggling with both acute and chronic pain conditions. What began as a small specialized practice has grown into a robust healthcare organization with over 30 employees across multiple convenient locations, making quality pain management accessible to residents throughout the Garden State.

At Garden State Pain & Orthopedics, patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach to pain treatment. The practice has assembled a team of highly-trained physicians with expertise across diverse pain conditions and treatment modalities. Their comprehensive services include:

- Interventional pain techniques

- Minimally-invasive surgical procedures

- Medical management

- Physical therapy

- Rehabilitation programs

- Behavioral therapy

Cutting-Edge Technology and Expertise

The practice prides itself on staying at the forefront of pain medicine technology. By combining advanced diagnostic tools with innovative treatment options, Garden State Pain & Orthopedics delivers personalized care plans tailored to each patient's specific needs. Their specialists work collaboratively to address the physical, emotional, and psychological aspects of pain, recognizing that effective pain management requires a holistic approach.

I recently had ankle surgery and very grateful for Dr. Scott Hanauer and his team. He walked me through the entire process with knowledge, care, and delivered a perfect surgery. I was active with a small limp at 3 weeks, running at 4. Couldn't have asked for a better experience and recovery. Thank you!|Dr. Hanauer is amazing. He is extremely thorough. He is knowledgeable and very kind. He also does everything non-invasive before recommendations anything surgical.  I highly recommend him.|I had good experience with Dr Levy's consult. However the billing handled by this office was very incorrect. They told me that it's in network provider and however after my visit was done they charged me $195 which was supposed to be for out of network. When I asked them, they said, "your plan is good and regardless for in-network or out-of network this is your copay". After I called my insurance I found out they were not in network. The office staff (and even Dr Levy) was very dishonest about how they handled this.|I found Dr. Patel summer of 2023 after experiencing some pain in my hip. During my first visit he did an amazing job validating my concerns and sending me on my way with a cortisone shot and a follow up to talk about next steps on treatment.

Not even a few weeks later we discussed the possibility of surgery and that my symptoms were probably leading to something that had to be fixed beyond external measures.

I was moving in a few months and was getting married a few months after that, so unfortunately I was on a fixed timeline toying with my health and a few life events.

Dr. Patel and his team prioritized pushing up my surgery, which unfortunately uncovered something more major than the MRI unveiled, but he assured me that collegiate football players bounce back in mere months after this procedure. Through his ultra detailed post op recovery plan, combined with weekly then monthly check ins, I was back on my feet and dancing for my wedding 5 months after my surgery.|Be aware they do not take Aetna. Used Zocdoc to book my appointment with Dr. Patel. Both Zocdoc and front desk staff indicated I was in-network, get my EOB back and find out my 2 appointments were not in network & I'm being charged full amount for both visits.

Additionally Dr. Patel indicated I would need surgery for my condition. I went to get a 2nd opinion and was told there was no need for surgery. This surgeon saw no indication of an injury that would require surgery & my condition fully healed in the next month.

Garden state pain & orthopedics need to resolve this with Zocdoc and train front desk personnel properly as they are misleading their patients.|Dr. Saurabh Dang and the staff at Garden State Pain & Orthopedics are amazing.  Dr. Dang is extremely knowledgeable and personable.  He answered all of my questions and put me at ease.  He took so much time really getting to know my issues.  I have never experienced this level of care with any other office. I would recommend him to any of my friends and family.|I never never never ever never write reviews! But he did a great job and it didn't hurt too much. The assistant that was in the room was also very attentive and kind. They really made me feel welcomed and eased my nerves. When I left I felt some relief right away. A good friend of mine recommended this office. I highly recommend.

University Pain and Spine Center serves Monroe Township, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized medical team focuses on diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions with personalized care plans designed to improve quality of life and restore function. With state-of-the-art facilities and evidence-based approaches, we've established ourselves as a trusted resource for patients throughout New Jersey seeking relief from persistent pain conditions.

At University Pain and Spine Center, we offer expert treatment for a range of pain conditions, including:

  • Low back pain - Comprehensive treatment for herniated discs, spinal stenosis, sciatica, and other lumbar spine conditions

  • Neck pain - Specialized care for cervical spine disorders, whiplash injuries, and degenerative conditions

  • Extremity pain - Targeted therapies for shoulder, knee, hip, and other joint and limb pain

Advanced Treatment Approaches

Our practice specializes in minimally invasive procedures that provide effective pain relief while minimizing recovery time. These innovative techniques allow many patients to avoid major surgery while still achieving significant pain reduction. Our multidisciplinary approach combines interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modifications tailored to each patient's specific needs.

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of life, which is why we take the time to listen to our patients and develop individualized treatment plans. Our compassionate team works closely with each patient to set realistic goals and monitor progress throughout the treatment journey.

NJ Spine and Pain Center in Flemington, New Jersey offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients throughout Hunterdon County and surrounding areas. Our specialized medical practice focuses on diagnosing and treating various spinal conditions and chronic pain disorders using evidence-based approaches. Led by board-certified physicians, our center combines advanced diagnostic technology with personalized treatment plans to address each patient's unique needs.

At NJ Spine and Pain Center, we provide a wide range of interventional procedures and non-surgical treatments designed to alleviate pain and improve quality of life. Our services include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and medication management. We specialize in treating conditions such as herniated discs, sciatica, spinal stenosis, arthritis, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain.

Patient-Centered Approach

Our multidisciplinary team works collaboratively to develop customized treatment plans that address both the symptoms and underlying causes of pain. The first visit with Dr Batt I was in a wheelchair. I could not walk without support and then it was painful and frightening. My quality of life has improved significantly. Now I walk alone or with slight cane assistance, It is like being with family for me now The nurses and staff are so friendly. They know me and we chat and smile. Thank you for making such an improvement in my life!  Dr. Bhat  and his staff  make me feel I am in a congenial family atmosphere and I feel trusting and comfortable even when attending a procedure that may have once been frightening or at least apprehensive. Please trust this crew and you will find it rewarding.
.
Bruce Assante|Dr. Bhatt is amazing. I have been under his care for almost two years after being injured in a vehicle accident. He is always concerned about what is best for the patient's health and well-being. I couldn't ask for a better doctor.|Dr Bhatt is not only a brilliant doctor, he is also a compassionate caring man.  His staff are very cheerful and welcoming|Dr. Bhatt and his stuff have been wonderful. His diagnostics have helped resolve issues that were creating unbearable pain and I am now so much more comfortable. He is thorough in his testing and innovative in his treatment approaches. Great place for pain management!|How do you thank someone who improves your quality of life so significantly??
I have never written an online review before but I feel compelled to share my experience hoping someone living with pain will reach out to Dr. Bhatt. He is sympathetic, caring and truly wants to help you. My only regret is being reluctant to try pain management sooner, and feeling I was destined to learn to live in pain. Call him, you will be incredibly impressed and thankful you found him.

column40:
I haven't been able to make an appt with my original cooper PM doctor in over a year. I was injured at work in 2023 and as a result my lower spine became an absolute mess and continues to get worse. I have had 2 out of 4 procedures carried out by cooper pain management that did not go well, the last one (medial lumbar branch block) leaving me maimed.
Immediately after the procedure my pain increased past the point I thought pain could go-,it was indescribable. The morning after I got up and fell to the floor. I couldn't walk normally for over a month, my legs sporadically gave out and would fall several times a day needing a crutch to get around. I NEVER needed one before that specific procedure was botched. Any and all phone calls made regarding these concerns are not  "on the record" so they "never happened". I still have nerve damage in my legs and am in a state of excruciating pain 24/7. Unfortunately, the impression I have accumulated over the last year and a half is that Cooper pain management does not care about my pain or the permanent physical and emotional damage they have inflicted on me in the slightest regard.
They tried to gaslight me at my follow up over a month later to convince me that it's in my head and that I'm making up my symptoms to avoid any liability.  Do not go to Cooper for ANY procedure if you want humane and reasonable treatment without being treated like a psychosomatic drug seeker. If you're lucky they'll glance at your imaging- though in my experience they just read a 3 sentence report and schedule procedures MONTHS in advance with no pain management in between the several months you're waiting to be seen.
I feel that it is my moral obligation to warn other patients who may be experiencing similar issues. I know what it's like when you are so desperate to not live with all consuming, life ruining pain.

This is not a place for pain relief, this is a place that inflicts more physical and emotional pain than before you walked through their doors.|Jesse is phenomenal! Cooper Pain has been a lifesaver for my pain. All the doctors are amazing!|Great Doctors, but I have to wait 4 months to get another appointment, and my injections only last 2 weeks. I've tried everything except spine surgery and pain meds.  Anyone have any suggestions I'm desperate to have a little quality in my life back.|Dr Sabia is in a class of exceptional doctors all by himself.
He is warm, pleasant, and very approachable.
You never feel rushed and he's great with educating his patient on care and treatment.
He's simply the best and so is his staff|My experience with Linda McGrane is wonderful. She is the best to treat you and talk to you as if you were part of her family. I could have not been able to control my chronic pain without her and Dr.Sabia. If anyone one has problems with chronic pain she is the person to treat you.|I've been a patient with CPM for over 10 yrs and for 10 years I've been treated with respect, kindness and most importantly compassion. Dr. Michael Sabia is one of THE nicest, most kind-hearted doctors I have ever met and he has a gentle, compassionate bedside manner. He is always trying to help figure how best to treat my complex pain and he has never once given up on me and said "Well sorry, I've done all I can do." He is always trying to figure out a better way to treat my pain and be always has an upbeat attitude. I moved out of the area to Bucks County PA 5 years ago and I still come back and see them. I couldn't bare the thought of starting over with someone new after u dergojng 6 (YES SIX!) back surgeries between Feb.2012-Aug.2015. They're the ONLY ones I will see!|I have bn a patient at Cooper Pain for over 18 yrs. I  have so much confidence in Dr. Sabia. and Jessie Dotson.  It is a great relief when you have  total professionals handling your health  and  you feel totally confident  w the procedures that are recommended and performed.|Pt coordinators were extremely rude. Doctors maybe good if you can get through the ignorance of the front desk.  It was the worst interaction I have EVER had now I remember why I don't go to Cooper

column40:
I've seen five Pain Management doctors already. The worst two we're from Columbia Presbyterian no less.  I got nothing bad to say about Dr. Shah with the exception of waitiing time, which isn't the worst I've seen.

He's proactive and reactive .I consider him a friend this point on.  A fellow New Yorker.  Hit me the second we started chatting.

No preconceptions about the patient;; listens intently. His staff is excellent.  Outstanding. Never met a better individual so far in his field.  Go with confidence. Knows his stuff.|Dr. Shah is a wonderful physician who really cares for his patients' well being. In the past two years I've gone to him several times to less the pain of sports injuries and I have received nothing but excellent bedside manner from his as well as his staff.|I have been to many pain management doctors over the years due to having thoracic spinal fusion, lower lumbar surgery and herniated discs with little success and living my life in misery and pain. About two years ago I switched to Dr. Shah under the recommendation from many people who said he was such a great doctor he changed their lives. It was one of the best decisions I have ever made in my entire life. Dr Shah has literally saved me from a life of pain and has given me my life back. He explains everything, he actually takes the time out to really listen to you and you can tell he cares and has sympathy. I've had many epidurals, facet injections and about three months ago I underwent surgery to have the spinal cord stimulation machine put in. It WORKS unbelievablely well. It has reduced my pain by 50%. Because it was so successful I have been able to reduce my pain pills significantly.( Which was one of my goals) Thanks to Dr. Shah I can play with my kids again, do yard work, sleep laying down in a bed again. I have slept in a recliner for the past 5 years. With his help my relationship with my wife and kids has improved significantly. The surgery center he uses is top notch. I hope if you read this and have had enough of living in hell you will call and make a appointment and let him change your life like he has done for me. I am so grateful for what he has done for me I spread the word about him to everyone I can, he is the best doctor I have ever been to. Enough said.|Dr Shah was highly recommended to me after several attempts to address my back problems, he offered modern and least surgical approach that solved my medical issues. He has been nothing but professional with great bed manners and personal care, treating patients respectfully and compassionately!!!|Dr. Shah is the best! Bergen Pain Management serves Paramus, NJ and surrounding Bergen County communities with specialized pain management solutions. For over 20 years, Dr. Ragukonis and his dedicated team have transformed Bergen Pain Management into a premier destination for patients seeking minimally invasive pain relief treatments. Their practice stands out for its commitment to cutting-edge spinal interventions and comprehensive approach to chronic pain conditions affecting all areas of the body.

The practice excels in advanced minimally invasive spinal techniques including:

  • Endoscopic discectomy procedures

  • Minimally invasive spinal fusion

  • Implantable spinal devices such as SCS and DRG stimulators

  • Intrathecal pump implementation and management

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Bergen Pain Management is their dedication to patient education. By thoroughly explaining conditions to patients and their families, the team empowers individuals to participate actively in selecting the most effective treatment options for their specific needs. This collaborative approach has established them as trusted pain management specialists in the region.

Expertise in Chronic Conditions

The medical team specializes in addressing persistent pain issues throughout the body, utilizing the latest advancements in pain management technology while maintaining their commitment to minimally invasive solutions that promote faster recovery and improved quality of life.

Magaziner Center for Wellness and Anti-Aging Medicine in North Brunswick Township, NJ offers comprehensive integrative healthcare services under the direction of renowned physician Dr. Edward Magaziner, MD. Serving patients throughout central New Jersey since 1999, the center combines conventional medical approaches with evidence-based complementary therapies to address both acute conditions and chronic health challenges. Their patient-centered philosophy emphasizes identifying and treating root causes rather than simply managing symptoms.

The Magaziner Center specializes in regenerative medicine, pain management, and functional medicine approaches. Dr. Magaziner is particularly recognized for his expertise in non-surgical orthopedic treatments including PRP therapy, stem cell treatments, and prolotherapy for joint pain and sports injuries. The center also offers comprehensive programs for autoimmune conditions, hormone optimization, and detoxification protocols.

Personalized Care Approach

Each patient receives a thorough evaluation that may include advanced diagnostic testing to identify nutritional deficiencies, environmental toxicities, and metabolic imbalances. Treatment plans are individually tailored and may incorporate nutritional counseling, targeted supplementation, bioidentical hormone therapy, and innovative pain management techniques depending on patient needs.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Edward Magaziner, MD, patients can call +1 732-297-2600. The center is conveniently located at 2186 NJ-27, North Brunswick Township, NJ 08902, with accessible parking available. New patients are welcome, and most major insurance plans are accepted for covered services.

Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center in East Brunswick, NJ offers comprehensive care for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. Our specialized medical facility focuses on identifying and treating the root causes of back, neck, and joint pain through advanced diagnostic techniques and personalized treatment plans. With a team of board-certified physicians and pain management specialists, we provide evidence-based interventions designed to improve mobility, reduce pain, and enhance overall quality of life for our patients throughout central New Jersey.

At IPMC Health, we understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our holistic approach begins with thorough evaluations to determine the underlying causes of your discomfort. Rather than simply masking symptoms, we develop individualized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, physical therapy, medication management, and regenerative medicine techniques. Our specialists are experts in treating conditions including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, arthritis, sciatica, and complex regional pain syndrome.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets our practice apart is our commitment to treating the whole person, not just the pain. We take time to listen to your concerns, understand your lifestyle needs, and work collaboratively to develop solutions that align with your goals. Our multidisciplinary team coordinates care across specialties to ensure comprehensive treatment that addresses all aspects of your condition. We believe in empowering patients through education about their conditions and treatment options.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our East Brunswick location features advanced diagnostic and treatment technology in a comfortable, welcoming environment. From fluoroscopy-guided injections to ultrasound-assisted procedures, we utilize the latest innovations in pain management to provide precise, effective care with minimal discomfort and recovery time.

Contact Information

Stop hurting and start living! Make your appointment today by visiting our website at https://www.ipmchealth.com/locations/east-brunswick or calling us at +1 201-731-4055. Our East Brunswick office is conveniently located at 3 Cornwall Dr, East Brunswick, NJ 08816, with accessible parking and a patient-friendly facility designed for your comfort.

column2: Omega Joint & Spine Centers - Sachin K. Shah, MD (Parsippany and Somerset)
column3:
Omega Joint & Spine Centers serves patients throughout Parsippany and Somerset, New Jersey with comprehensive musculoskeletal and neurological care. Under the expert leadership of Dr. Sachin K. Shah, MD, our multi-specialty medical practice has established itself as a premier destination for patients seeking effective pain management and rehabilitation services. We take pride in our integrated approach to treatment, combining various medical disciplines to address each patient's unique needs and develop personalized recovery plans.

At Omega Joint & Spine Centers, we offer a diverse range of medical services designed to address pain and mobility issues without necessarily resorting to surgical intervention. Our team specializes in:

  • Orthopedic Care (Non-Surgical) - Conservative management of joint, bone, and muscle conditions

  • Pain Management - Advanced techniques for chronic and acute pain relief

  • Neurology - Diagnosis and treatment of neurological disorders affecting the spine and peripheral nervous system

  • Chiropractic Treatment - Spinal adjustments and manipulations to improve alignment and function

Two Convenient Locations

We maintain two fully-equipped facilities to better serve our patients across New Jersey. Our Somerset location at 1527 NJ-27, Suite 2800, Somerset, NJ 08873 provides easy access for patients in the central New Jersey region, while our Parsippany office accommodates those in the northern part of the state.

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes Omega Joint & Spine Centers is our commitment to patient education and collaborative care. Dr. Shah and our clinical team work closely with each patient to explain their condition, discuss treatment options, and involve them in the decision-making process. This approach has helped countless patients find relief from chronic pain and improve their quality of life without resorting to invasive procedures.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, visit our website at www.omegapaindoc.com or call us directly at +1 732-234-9750. Our friendly staff is ready to assist you on your journey to better health and improved mobility.

At National Spine & Pain Centers (NSPC), we understand that pain affects each person differently. Every time I've interacted with her she is grumpy gives off a vibe that you are bothering her.  I had to have an ablation I decided to change from doing it in the office to a surgicenter. When I called this woman she yelled at me "well you have to fill out forms, have you had an EKG lately???, the forms will be in the office". Basically hung up on me.  I never went back. She should not be dealing the public|They absolutely saved my life, I could not walk and needed a cortisone shot, for two months prior I was using another doctor, I was told  by the office  people a new girl there wrote  the wrong wording on the submission paper that goes to the insurance company for approval, for that reason I was denied. I stressed to them I had a vacation  and big job that took me out of state for a month and needed to have the shot they promised me it would be done, I had to go back for them to assess me and for Dr. To expedite approval number so he can do the procedure, to no avail, I was devastated. Thanks.|I could not be happier that I found this office!! I have had trouble finding someone who is willing to take the time to actually find out why I have the pain I have. This did not happen here from the onset of speaking with someone when I called there was true concern of the pain I was in I was given an appointment as quick as possible and when I went to the office I was treated the same way everyone there is friendly it doesn't seem like it's an issue for them to see patients which is exactly what you want when you're in pain you want someone that understands this office understands from the receptionist to the nurses to the doctors if I could give 10 Stars I would and I will update my review after all of my procedures are done and hopefully walking normally again but I've put my face and my health in their hands and I don't do that easily so I highly recommend this office as I said if I could give them 10 stores I would thank you guys so much for everything I really appreciate it!!

I have to say "THANK YOU"  it has been two weeks since my initial review & visit. As part of the Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital network, the institute combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients regain control of their lives. Their team of board-certified pain specialists develops personalized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and complementary therapies.

The New Jersey Pain Institute specializes in treating a wide range of pain conditions, including back and neck pain, arthritis, neuropathic pain, cancer-related pain, and complex regional pain syndrome. Their physicians utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to identify the root causes of pain, allowing for targeted interventions that address not just symptoms but underlying conditions. The institute's affiliation with an academic medical center ensures patients benefit from the latest research and evidence-based practices in pain medicine.

Patient-Centered Approach

What distinguishes the New Jersey Pain Institute is their commitment to patient education and involvement in the treatment process. Each patient receives a thorough evaluation before a customized treatment plan is developed. The institute's specialists take time to explain pain mechanisms and treatment options, empowering patients to make informed decisions about their care. This collaborative approach has helped countless individuals throughout New Jersey find relief from debilitating pain conditions.

column38: Gail Eisen|Debra Sorensen|Catherine Aulet|Christina Robinson|Remi Ingram|Christina J M Ventricelli
column40:
I had left a review previously that was very positive. I am now in the process of leaving this horrible practice. The office staff and nurses are horrible. Never pick up the phone. Needed a peer to peer for a medicine, still haven't received it. I would think (and I had thought) that a pain mgmt Dr /office would be caring. Boy was I wrong!  This office and the head of the unit should be ashamed of themselves. They've had me in tears due to their lack of caring.|I was a patient at the New Jersy Pain Institute since my car accident in 2012.  During that time I was seen about once a month.  Dr. Sakr was ALWAYS  kind and compassionate.  He was willing to work with me using physical therapy, spinal injections  (13 in 5 years) and caring to avoid the ultimately necessary spinal surgery.  Complicating my spinal injury was my active rheumatoid arthritis.   With great care we were constantly adjusting my medications using the lowest dosage needed for my pain level at that time.  He was so kind, took as much time as you needed, spoke directly to you using understandable terms ( and re-explaining words I didn't understand).
Then Governor Christie got involved trying to stem the tide of opiate addiction.  Dr Sakr left but no one told me - until I specifically asked for an appointment with Dr. Sakr after 3 months with another doctor.  When those 3 appointments were scheduled I was only told Dr Sakr was 'away'.  When I pushed for an appointment with him they quietly admitted he had left the Pain Institute.  Everyone claimed they had no other info regarding his whereabouts or even if he was still practicing!  Wonderful thing about the Internet is I  located his current practice within 10 minutes.
So what about Christie?  He has deemed that any government supported facility (the Pain Institute is affiliated with RWJUH) must reduce or eliminate the amount of opiates prescribed.  I took too many and they couldn't afford my "opiate level".
I was given 2 one month scripts and unceremoniously 'KICKED OUT' of NJ Pain Institute  Do you have any idea how hard it is to find another pain management  provider after you have been KICKED OUT of another program?
Fortunately I found Dr Sakr's new practice and we had a good report.
Without Dr Sakr the NJ Pain Institute became rigid, secretive and uncaring - even the nurses and receptionists.
This is why I have lowered my rating of 5 stars in 2013 to 3 stars in 2018.|They never pick up their phone. My mother is in pain and I cant get in contact with anyone no matter what number i press on the automated phone system. I called 6 times in 2 days. Left my number when prompted. Jersey Rehab & Pain Management in Belleville, New Jersey is a premier healthcare facility dedicated to helping patients overcome pain and mobility challenges. Established as a cornerstone of rehabilitation services in Essex County, our practice combines evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans to address a wide spectrum of conditions affecting quality of life. Our multidisciplinary team works collaboratively to restore function, reduce pain, and help patients return to their active lifestyles.

At Jersey Rehab, we specialize in treating various musculoskeletal and neurological conditions through both conservative and interventional approaches. Our facility is equipped with state-of-the-art technology that enables precise diagnosis and effective treatment protocols. From sports injuries and workplace accidents to chronic pain conditions and post-surgical rehabilitation, our experts develop customized recovery pathways tailored to each patient's unique circumstances and goals.

Our Treatment Approach

We believe in a holistic approach to pain management that addresses not just symptoms but underlying causes. Our treatments may include physical therapy, chiropractic care, massage therapy, acupuncture, and advanced pain management techniques. For patients with more complex needs, we offer interventional procedures performed by our board-certified specialists who stay at the forefront of medical advancements in rehabilitation medicine.

Patient-Centered Philosophy

Jersey Rehab & Pain Management distinguishes itself through its unwavering commitment to patient education and involvement in the healing process. We understand that recovery extends beyond our clinic walls, which is why we emphasize home exercise programs and lifestyle modifications that support long-term wellness. Our dynamic, responsive healthcare team is dedicated to helping individuals live high-functioning, active lives free from the limitations of painful ailments.

Visit our comprehensive website at jerseyrehab.com to learn more about our services or call us at +1 973-844-9220 to schedule your consultation. Our facility is conveniently located at 15 Newark Ave, Belleville, NJ 07109, with accessible parking and a welcoming environment designed for your comfort and recovery.

column2: Advocare Pain Institute of South Jersey
column3:
Advocare Pain Institute of South Jersey serves Voorhees Township, NJ and surrounding South Jersey communities with comprehensive interventional pain management solutions. As a respected medical practice in the region, they specialize in providing integrative care approaches that minimize or eliminate the need for narcotic medications. Their board-certified specialists develop personalized treatment plans addressing a wide spectrum of pain conditions, combining evidence-based medical interventions with complementary therapies to achieve optimal patient outcomes.

The institute offers a multidisciplinary approach to pain relief, utilizing advanced diagnostic and therapeutic techniques. Their services include precise joint and spinal injections, targeted rehabilitation programs, traditional acupuncture, and innovative homeopathic treatments. The practice excels in addressing musculoskeletal disorders, neurologic conditions, and complex chronic pain syndromes through minimally invasive procedures designed to improve function and quality of life.

Regenerative Medicine Options

Patients benefit from cutting-edge regenerative treatment modalities that promote natural healing and tissue repair. These advanced therapies harness the body's own healing mechanisms to address the underlying causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms, offering long-term relief for many patients who haven't responded to conventional treatments.

Wellness and Aesthetic Services

Beyond pain management, Advocare Pain Institute provides comprehensive wellness packages including aesthetic injections, PDO thread lifts, platelet-rich plasma (PRP) therapy, medically supervised weight loss programs, hair restoration treatments, and therapeutic vitamin infusions and injections. These services complement their pain management approach by addressing overall health and well-being.

Insurance and Accessibility

The practice accepts Medicare, major medical insurance plans, and workman's compensation claims, making their specialized care accessible to a broad patient population. Their convenient location at 705 White Horse Rd, Voorhees Township, NJ 08043 serves patients throughout South Jersey with state-of-the-art facilities and compassionate care.

For consultations or to learn more about their innovative approach to pain management and wellness, patients can visit www.advocarepaininstitute.com or call +1 856-751-7799 to schedule an appointment with their expert team.

I was introduced to Dr. Jennifer Gyi by a friend of mine who underwent acupuncture to relieve neck and back pain.

I was recently involved in a car accident where I sustained spinal disc dislocation. Moving caused me so much pain. I can barely get up from bed to urinate.

I went to Dr. Gyi at Centers for Integrated Pain to get myself assessed. After checking the intensity of my pain, she started pain treatment on the very same day.

I went back a couple of days a week for treatment and after about 3 weeks, I was able to get up in bed unassisted.

I felt such extreme pain before I went to Dr. Gyi, and in just 3 weeks, the pain has become dull, allowing me to go back to work.

I thank Integrated Pain Centers, especially Dr. Gyi for providing me amazing pain treatment.|

Led by Dr. Koppel, a board-certified interventional pain specialist with over 20 years of experience, the center specializes in minimally invasive treatments for diverse pain conditions. Patients benefit from a comprehensive approach that combines both regenerative and conventional therapies, carefully selected to optimize results and provide personalized care for each individual's unique needs.

The center offers cutting-edge regenerative therapies including Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP), Regenerative Cell Therapy, and Exosomes. These advanced treatments harness the body's natural healing mechanisms to regenerate tissue in affected joints and spine areas. By reducing inflammation, promoting healthy tissue growth, and improving functionality, these therapies provide effective alternatives to more invasive procedures for many patients suffering from chronic pain conditions.

Expert Credentials

Dr. Koppel completed his prestigious fellowship training at The New York Hospital and The Hospital for Special Surgery, institutions renowned for excellence in orthopedic and pain management care. This exceptional training foundation, combined with decades of clinical experience, has enabled Dr. Koppel to successfully treat thousands of patients suffering from various pain conditions.

Patient-Centered Approach

column3:
Gramercy Pain Center in Montclair, New Jersey offers specialized interventional pain management services to patients throughout Essex County and surrounding areas. Our state-of-the-art facility at 292 Bloomfield Avenue provides comprehensive care focused on diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions through minimally invasive techniques. Led by board-certified physicians with extensive training in both interventional pain medicine and sports medicine, our center combines advanced medical expertise with compassionate patient care to deliver effective pain relief solutions.

At Gramercy Pain Center, we utilize the latest evidence-based approaches to address a wide spectrum of pain conditions. Our interventional techniques include precision-guided injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, and minimally invasive spine procedures. We specialize in treating back and neck pain, joint pain, sports injuries, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome, offering personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs.

Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery

Our expertise in minimally invasive spine surgery provides patients with alternatives to traditional open surgical procedures. These advanced techniques typically result in smaller incisions, reduced tissue damage, faster recovery times, and decreased post-operative pain. Our physicians are highly skilled in procedures such as endoscopic discectomy, spinal cord stimulation, and vertebroplasty for patients with spine-related pain conditions.

Sports Medicine Excellence

The sports medicine division at Gramercy Pain Center offers specialized care for athletes of all levels. From weekend warriors to professional competitors, our team provides comprehensive evaluation and treatment of sports-related injuries. We focus on both rehabilitation and performance optimization, helping patients return to their active lifestyles with customized recovery programs and preventative strategies.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in a multidisciplinary approach to pain management that addresses both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. Our physicians work collaboratively with physical therapists, psychologists, and other specialists to develop comprehensive treatment strategies that improve quality of life and functional outcomes for our patients.

Visit our website at www.gramercypaincenter.com or call us at +1 732-788-0349 to schedule a consultation. Our office is conveniently located at 292 Bloomfield Ave, 2nd floor, Montclair, NJ 07042.

column3:
Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center in Old Bridge, New Jersey offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. Our specialized medical team focuses on identifying and treating various pain sources including back, neck, shoulder, joint, and other persistent pain issues that affect your quality of life. With our state-of-the-art facility at 42 Throckmorton Lane, we serve the Old Bridge community and surrounding areas with personalized care plans designed to address the root causes of pain rather than just masking symptoms.

At IPMC, we believe in taking a holistic approach to pain management. Our board-certified specialists conduct thorough evaluations to understand the underlying causes of your pain. This comprehensive assessment allows us to develop individualized treatment plans tailored to your specific condition, lifestyle, and goals. We combine advanced interventional techniques with traditional therapies to provide effective pain relief without excessive reliance on medication.

Our Specialized Services

Our center offers a wide range of treatments including:

  • Spinal injections and nerve blocks

  • Radiofrequency ablation

  • Joint injections

  • Regenerative medicine options

  • Physical therapy coordination

  • Minimally invasive spine procedures

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our compassionate team works closely with each patient, providing education about their condition and involving them in treatment decisions. Our goal is simple: help you Stop Hurting and Start Living! We're committed to improving your functionality and restoring your quality of life through effective pain management strategies.

Ready to address your pain? Contact us today at +1 201-731-4063 to schedule your appointment at our Old Bridge location. You can also learn more about our services and other locations by visiting our website at https://www.ipmchealth.com/locations/old-bridge/.

column3:
Back Pain Union serves residents throughout Union, New Jersey with specialized non-surgical treatments for chronic and acute back pain conditions. Our dedicated team of board-certified specialists combines decades of experience with cutting-edge techniques to address the root causes of back pain rather than merely masking symptoms. We pride ourselves on developing personalized treatment plans that consider each patient's unique medical history, lifestyle factors, and recovery goals.

At Back Pain Union, we offer a wide range of non-invasive and minimally invasive treatments including epidural steroid injections, facet joint injections, spinal cord stimulation, physical therapy, and regenerative medicine options. Our multidisciplinary approach ensures that patients receive the most appropriate care for their specific condition, whether it's herniated discs, sciatica, spinal stenosis, or degenerative disc disease.

Patient-Centered Care Philosophy

We understand how debilitating back pain can be, affecting every aspect of your daily life. That's why our practice focuses on compassionate care that addresses both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. Our goal is simple: to help you return to a pain-free life and resume the activities you love without surgical intervention whenever possible.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

Located at 2500 Morris Ave, Suite 220LM in Union, NJ, our modern facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. We've created a comfortable, welcoming environment where patients can receive the highest standard of care in one convenient location.

Why Choose Back Pain Union

What sets us apart is our commitment to redefining healthcare through comprehensive, patient-focused treatment plans. We take the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and develop strategies that address your specific needs. Our success is measured by your improved quality of life and ability to return to normal activities.

Contact Redefine Healthcare at (908) 772-8293 or visit https://redefinehealthcare.com/back-pain/ today to schedule a consultation and learn how we're changing healthcare by providing the highest quality, comprehensive care for back pain sufferers throughout Union and surrounding communities.

column2: Dr. George Hanna, MD - NJ Pain Specialist
column3:
Dr. George Hanna, MD - NJ Pain Specialist serves patients throughout New Jersey and New York with exceptional pain management care. A Harvard-trained, board-certified pain doctor and spine specialist, Dr. Hanna has established himself as a leading expert in non-surgical approaches to chronic pain conditions. His practice focuses on providing personalized treatment plans for patients suffering from back pain, neck pain, knee pain, and various joint conditions. With convenient locations in both Clifton, NJ and Manhattan, NYC, Dr. Hanna brings his elite medical training and compassionate approach to a wide patient population seeking relief from debilitating pain.

Dr. Hanna's impressive academic background includes an undergraduate degree from Cornell University and a medical degree from the prestigious University of Pennsylvania. His specialized training continued with an anesthesiology residency at Massachusetts General Hospital - Harvard Medical School, followed by a comprehensive pain management fellowship at Brigham and Women's Hospital - Harvard Medical School. This extensive education at world-renowned institutions has equipped Dr. Hanna with advanced knowledge of pain pathways and innovative treatment techniques.

Treatment Philosophy

At the core of Dr. Hanna's practice is a commitment to non-surgical interventions that address the root causes of pain. Rather than simply masking symptoms, he develops comprehensive treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, targeted injections, physical therapy recommendations, and appropriate medication management. This multidisciplinary approach helps patients achieve lasting relief while avoiding the risks and recovery time associated with surgery.

Conditions Treated

Dr. Hanna specializes in treating a wide range of painful conditions, including:

  • Chronic back and neck pain

  • Sciatica and nerve pain

  • Arthritis and joint pain

  • Sports injuries

  • Work-related injuries

  • Complex regional pain syndrome

Clifton Office Location

The Clifton, NJ office is conveniently located at 1117 US-46, Suite 205, Clifton, NJ 07013. Patients can schedule consultations by calling +1 973-346-9433 or visiting the practice website at paintreatmentspecialists.com. The office features state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment equipment in a comfortable, patient-centered environment.

Dr. Hanna's commitment to patient education, combined with his expertise in advanced pain management techniques, makes him a sought-after specialist for those seeking effective, non-surgical solutions to chronic pain conditions.
column11:
Dr. George Hanna is a Harvard-trained, board certified pain doctor and spine specialist, focusing on non-surgical approaches to help patients suffering with back pain, neck pain, knee pain and joint pain.

Dr. Hanna received his undergraduate degree from Cornell University and his medical degree from the University of Pennsylvania. He completed anesthesiology residency at Massachusetts General Hospital - Harvard Medical School and a pain management fellowship at Brigham and Women's Hospital - Harvard Medical School.

Looking for a pain doctor in NY or NJ? Dr. Hanna is currently available in Manhattan, NYC and Clifton, NJ.

I had a lot of issues with my knee and thanks to Dr. Hanna my knee feels so much better.  I'm able to continue alot of my daily routine activities. He's very kind knowledgeable and professional also his work environment is very neat and clean.  His staff is friendly and kind too!   Excellent  experience.   I would highly recommend him to family and friends.|I cannot thank him enough. Involved in a car accident, I was completely lost among all these money-pursuing medical providers. I visited his nj office for a 2nd opinion with a hope. Thank God, I did!! He was so prompt giving me accurate diagnosis, proper treatments. Unlike other doctors, he wanted me to try passive approaches first (PT & stretches) before he suggests me injections or any further treatments. He always checks on me if I am following my routine stretching exercise, first. His injections worked very very good. I was wondering why other doctors injections did not work like his. His insurance team is above excellence. Office staff is so very friendly. No complaints. 10 out of 10. Highly recommend to anyone in search for a reliable doctor. I truly appreciate Dr. Hanna and his staff!|As per me a good doctor is one who listens, understands and explains. Dr Hanna is one such guy. It's blessed to have a healthy life and lifestyle. But it's more blessed to right kind of doctors when in need. It's been a breeze to deal with his front desk either to set up or reschedule or discuss insurance.
Best part of their insurance division, who gives you a clear idea on how much will be charged and other details. All in all he has a great team.

I would highly recommend anyone in pain to see Dr. Hanna.|If I could give Dr. Hanna and his staff 100 stars, I (Mrs. C) would. Dr. Hanna is exceptional. First of all,  I would like to say thank you to Dr. Hanna and his staff for the amazing office he runs. His office is well organized. He is on top of what is going on with all his staff, medical issues and his patients. His staff is very respectful, welcoming, attentive and treats me with courtesy. The receptionists are very helpful and remind me of all my appts- thank you Maria for always calling me- I always look forward to you calls. His medical assistants are also very efficient.  Sydney has been AMAZING, attentive, efficient, comforting before my procedure. She listens to my concerns/worries, provides the information to the doctor in detail, helps out with referrals (like physical therapists or any other specialists) given by Dr. Hanna. The courtesy and generosity made me feel so safe. Dr. Hanna is incredibly knowledgeable with amazing beside manner. He answers any questions that I have and puts me at ease. I am so glad I found such a wonderful doctor. Dr. Hanna explains things in a way that are easy to understand. He listens carefully to any of my concerns. The wait time is less than 15 minutes in the waiting area. I am always able to talk to Dr. Hanna about any health questions and concerns. Dr. Hanna remembers and is familiar with my medical history. He talks to me about the proposed treatment, options, risks, benefits. He also shows concerns for my questions and worries. HE ALWAYS SHOWS RESPECT FOR WHAT I HAVE TO SAY and he will spend enough time to make sure all my questions are asked. When considering a rating scale from 0 (worse provider) to 10 (best provider), I will give Dr. Hanna above 10. I have already recommended Dr. Hanna to my family and friends. I have no reservations in recommending Dr. Hanna.  Can't recommend enough!!!,     Mrs. C.|Dr. Hanna,

Thank you for giving me my life back!!!!!!!!!! I was completely out of commission for 2 weeks due to severe lower back pain. I could not move and was in agony! No one could help me- ER and primary doctor. With one visit to Dr. Hanna I am so much better! I got trigger point cortisone shots on Thursday which kicked in by Friday. I was out of the house all weekend and back to myself!! Getting better and better! I will be getting an MRI to confirm the actual issue however it might just be pulled muscle(s). Even if this isn't the permanent fix, it was enough to get me almost back to normal and able to live my life! My primary doctor recommended someone else because it's not in the same area- however, I could not be happier that I found Dr. Hanna! I never ever write reviews but this thank you is absolutely needed! Thank you Dr. Hanna!!!!  --All the best, Andrea|Very friendly atmosphere, nice and inviting place. Dr. Hanna is very accommodating, listens to patient's concerns, answerers question clearly and not rushing out to his next patient. it is a modern facility with friendly stuff.|I saw Dr. Hanna in NY and NJ. column2: Penn Princeton Pain Medicine Center Plainsboro
column3:
Penn Princeton Pain Medicine Center Plainsboro serves patients throughout Plainsboro, New Jersey and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized medical team combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment approaches to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. As part of the renowned Penn Medicine network, we bring academic medical excellence to our community-based practice, ensuring patients receive the highest standard of evidence-based care.

At Penn Princeton Pain Medicine Center, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to pain management, treating conditions including back and neck pain, arthritis, neuropathic pain, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain. Our board-certified physicians develop personalized treatment plans that may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and integrative medicine techniques.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Located in the Medical Arts Pavilion at 5 Plainsboro Road, Suite 390 in Plainsboro Township, our modern facility is equipped with advanced diagnostic and treatment technology. The center's comfortable environment is designed to provide a healing atmosphere for patients seeking relief from pain conditions that affect their quality of life.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in collaborative care that puts patients at the center of the decision-making process. Our team takes time to understand each patient's unique pain experience, medical history, and treatment goals before developing comprehensive management strategies. This personalized approach helps maximize treatment effectiveness while minimizing side effects.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, please call +1 609-497-4371. Our practice is conveniently located at Medical Arts Pavilion, 5 Plainsboro Rd Suite 390, Plainsboro Township, NJ 08536. For more information about our services and providers, visit our website at www.pennmedicine.org/practices/princeton-pain-management.

I've been a patient since 2012.|I have been a patient with Princeton Pain Management for treatment of Trigeminal Neuralgia one the most difficult conditions to treat since 2005 (18 years ).
