I consider myself blessed and lucky to have found this practice many years ago .. I highly recommend anyone dealing with serious chronic pain to Princeton Pain Management, Dr A and the team ....
Donald M.|I have been happily seeing this practice since 2013.

Everyone in the office is cheerful, helpful, and really listens... from boss lady Loraine at the front desk, to Deani and Oxana the nurses (Oxana also wrangles tough insurance prior authorizations, et.), to Kristen their PA and newest member, to doctors Abramov and Kanter. I will always miss Dr. Chen, who has recently retired and was my doctor for 7 of 9 years here. All 3 doctors are very skilled with epidurals and other procedures and have excellent bedside manners.

In my opinion, this is the best pain management practice in the area!
Strongly recommend. You'll be treated as a person here... and soon feel like family.|A word to the wise: this place takes no responsibility for ensuring they have your insurance information prior to treatment when they are your anesthesia team.  It shouldn't be the patients responsibility to make sure things are billed properly when having emergency surgery; however, this place didn't bill insurance and then sent us to collection 2 years after treatment.  And when you call to discuss it with them, find out why you were sent to collection, the customer service rep is rude.  I asked to speak to a manager 3 different times because she was so rude to me (I was rude back but that's besides the point she started it and I am the customer you want $1000s from).  Thankfully the manager was helpful and able to resolve the issue and remove it from the creditor, but unfortunately too much damage had been done by them.  One star review is kind, the billing department is horrendous.|I was in severe pain after knee replacement surgery. Lorraine, the office manager, was kind and compassionate. She squeezed me in for an appointment the next day. Then I met nurse Viani(sp?) another great experience.
To top it all..
Dr. Aronov! Listened with patience to my complaint, asked many questions to get to the bottom of this and came up with a comprehensive plan to alleviate my pain. While prescribing the medications he was even sensitive to the cost of the medications.
I felt I'm in good hands. I highly recommend Dr. Abramov and his office staff.|Excellent Service:  Dr. Abramov is terrific at pinpointing not only your back/neck issues, but he also refers you to other specialists, if needed.

Kristin Fields, PA
She is compassionate and that is important I believe; She listens well
and responds with terrific help!
She is knowledgeable and treats the whole patient...I had a thorough visit and she gives 100% to you to solve your pain mgmt issues!!
I highly recommend a visit w Kristin, PA!!

He treats the whole patient. Princeton Pain's office works as a Team ( Lorraine, Dioni, Iksana) to bring the patient *top notch service for your every need!  Princeton Pain is an outstanding choice for you!  I can evaluate this  because I am a patient there for about 5 years.|If I could give a 0 I would. Years ago I called Dr Chen to advise him his over prescribing of narcotics created a substance abuse with my daughter that landed her in the hospital. Here we are 10 years later and my daughter is still fighting for her life thanks to the over and I mean over prescribing of narcotics to my daughter. I would not wish this hell on anyone. My daughter has attempted suicide and yes Dr Chen you started the ball Rolling. For anyone true pain management find a doctor who does not use narcotics for long term pain. He always takes his time to answer all of my questions and explains things very well. Today I had a procedure 'cervical epidural steroid injection (CESI)' for chronic nerve pain. Dr Chen and entire staff at Princeton Pain Management are the best!

New Jersey Spine & Pain Institute in Kearny, NJ is a premier medical facility dedicated to providing comprehensive pain management solutions for patients throughout Northern New Jersey. Established with a mission to improve quality of life through innovative and personalized care, our team of board-certified physicians specializes in treating various chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches. We combine cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to address the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

At New Jersey Spine & Pain Institute, we offer a wide range of treatments for conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and sports injuries. Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and minimally invasive spine procedures. Each treatment plan is tailored to the individual patient's needs following thorough evaluation and diagnosis.

Our Expert Medical Team

Our practice is led by fellowship-trained pain management specialists who stay at the forefront of advancements in pain medicine. Patient-Centered Approach

We pride ourselves on creating a welcoming environment where patients feel heard and valued. Our staff takes the time to educate patients about their conditions and treatment options, empowering them to make informed decisions about their care. We emphasize non-opioid and minimally invasive approaches whenever possible to promote long-term pain relief with minimal side effects.

Visit Our Kearny Location

Our modern facility is conveniently located at 59 Seeley Ave, Kearny, NJ 07032. We welcome new patients and accept most major insurance plans. To schedule a consultation, please call us at (201) 436-0033 or visit our website at www.njspineandpain.com for more information about our services and to access patient resources.

column2: New Jersey Pain, Spine, and Sports Associates: Faheem Abbasi, MD
column3:
New Jersey Pain, Spine, and Sports Associates serves patients throughout North Brunswick, Hazlet, and Elizabeth, New Jersey with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Faheem Abbasi, MD. As the founder and medical director, Dr. Abbasi has established a practice dedicated to alleviating acute and chronic pain through personalized treatment plans. The practice specializes in addressing a wide spectrum of conditions including carpal tunnel syndrome, neck and back pain, sciatica, joint pain, spinal disorders, disc herniations, radiculopathy, arthritis, myofascial pain, and sports-related injuries.

Dr. Abbasi brings impressive credentials to his practice, being board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation and having completed specialized fellowship training in interventional pain management. This advanced training enables him to offer both conservative treatment approaches and minimally invasive procedures tailored to each patient's unique needs. The practice emphasizes comprehensive evaluations to identify the root causes of pain rather than simply masking symptoms.

Multiple Convenient Locations

With three strategically located offices across New Jersey, patients can access quality care close to home. The Hazlet location at 100 Village Court, Suite 102, serves as one of the primary facilities where patients receive state-of-the-art treatments in a comfortable, patient-centered environment. New patients and referrals are welcomed at all locations, with appointments available by calling +1 732-800-7246.

Comprehensive Approach to Pain Management

The practice utilizes advanced diagnostic techniques and innovative treatment protocols to address pain at its source. Patients benefit from individualized care plans that may include interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modification guidance. For more information about services or to schedule a consultation, patients can visit https://nopainnj.com/ to learn about treatment options and patient resources.
column11: Faheem Abbasi, MD, is the medical director and founder of New Jersey Pain, Spine & Sports Associates. At the pain management practice's office locations in North Brunswick, Hazlet, and Elizabeth, New Jersey, Dr. Abbasi has dedicated his career to providing people relief from various forms of acute and chronic pain syndromes. He treats people with different types of problems, including but not limited to carpal tunnel syndrome, neck pain, back pain, sciatica, joint pain, spinal pain, musculoskeletal injuries, disc herniations and radiculopathy, arthritis, myofascial pain, and sports injuries. Dr. Abbasi is board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation and fellowship-trained in interventional pain management.

Pain Management NJ serves patients throughout New Jersey with comprehensive pain relief solutions. Disruptions caused by pain can affect individuals of any age, impacting daily activities and quality of life. Our team of board-certified physicians specializes in diagnosing and treating both acute and chronic pain conditions using the latest evidence-based approaches. With multiple convenient locations across the Garden State, we're committed to helping New Jersey residents find relief and return to their active lifestyles.

Our physicians are here to guide you through challenging times, whether you're a runner facing issues like runner's knee or a senior experiencing recurring hip pain after a fall. We understand that pain doesn't discriminate by age or activity level, which is why our treatment plans are individually tailored to each patient's specific needs and circumstances. Beyond treatment, our experts provide valuable guidance on preventing future injuries through proper techniques, exercises, and lifestyle modifications.

Who We Serve

Our pain specialists cater to a diverse range of individuals, from athletes dealing with acute injuries to older adults managing chronic conditions. We regularly treat patients suffering from:

  • Sports-related injuries

  • Arthritis and joint pain

  • Back and neck pain

  • Neuropathic pain

  • Post-surgical pain

  • Work-related injuries

Don't Live with Pain

Don't endure discomfort when relief is possible. Our multidisciplinary approach combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatments to address the root cause of your pain. As leading pain management specialists in New Jersey, we're dedicated to improving your mobility, functionality, and overall quality of life.

Contact us today at +1 862-335-4008 or visit redefinehealthcare.com/pain-management to schedule a consultation at one of our convenient locations throughout New Jersey.

column3:
Pain Management Doctors Edison serves patients throughout Edison, New Jersey with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our specialized team of board-certified physicians combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment approaches to address both acute and chronic pain conditions. We understand that pain affects every aspect of your life, which is why we're committed to developing personalized care plans that target the root cause of your discomfort rather than just masking symptoms.

When pain is acute, it comes on suddenly, often following a sports injury or other trauma. That makes it fairly easy to diagnose and treat. But the source of your pain isn't always so recognizable. In these cases, you require the experienced detection skills of a trained pain management specialist who can identify complex pain patterns and develop effective treatment strategies.

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

Our Edison pain management center offers a wide range of treatments including medication management, minimally invasive procedures, physical therapy recommendations, and integrative approaches. We specialize in treating conditions such as back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, sports injuries, and post-surgical pain.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets our practice apart is our commitment to listening carefully to each patient's experience. We take the time to understand how pain is affecting your daily activities, sleep patterns, and overall quality of life before creating a customized treatment plan.

If you're struggling with persistent or complex pain, contact Pain Management Doctors Edison by calling (732) 645-3794 to schedule a consultation. Learn more about our services at https://redefinehealthcare.com/pain-management/.

column3:
Pain Management Clinic in Morganville, NJ offers comprehensive pain relief solutions for residents throughout Monmouth County and surrounding areas. Our specialized medical facility focuses on diagnosing and treating chronic pain conditions using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs. With a team of board-certified physicians and pain specialists, we provide personalized treatment plans that combine interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy, and alternative therapies to address the root causes of pain rather than just masking symptoms.

At our state-of-the-art facility located at 25 Kilmer Dr #109 in Morganville, we treat a wide range of pain conditions including back and neck pain, arthritis, neuropathic pain, sports injuries, and post-surgical pain. Our multidisciplinary approach ensures that patients receive holistic care that addresses both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. We utilize advanced diagnostic tools and innovative treatment modalities to develop effective pain management strategies that improve quality of life and restore functionality.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in establishing long-term relationships with our patients based on trust, compassion, and open communication. Our team takes the time to listen to each patient's concerns, thoroughly evaluate their condition, and explain all available treatment options. This collaborative approach empowers patients to actively participate in their pain management journey and make informed decisions about their care.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please visit our website at www.freeofpain.org or call us at +1 718-336-5123. Our clinic is conveniently located at 25 Kilmer Dr #109, Morganville, NJ 07751, with accessible parking and a comfortable, welcoming environment designed to put patients at ease from the moment they arrive.

column40: Dr Petrychenko of Pain Management Clinic treated my mother with a lumbar sympathetic block which gave her relief for her chronic leg pains caused by damage to her hip joints. She has her life back thanks to the doctor and the wonderful staff of technicians at Pain Management clinic. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who has chronic pain.|My friend in Brooklyn went to a pain management clinic for chronic back pain. She said the Dr. was the best. I was so happy when I found that they had an office in New Jersey in Marlboro Township. I went there and met Dr. Petrovskya and was very impressed by him. He prescribed a discectomy for my back. After three short weeks of treatments my back pain was almost gone. I think in another week it will be gone forever.|I had been experiencing pain in my sacroiliac for years. I had an MRI which was inconclusive. After trying several different pain management clinics, I discovered found this clinic. It was the end of my pain and suffering. My condition was confirmed and treated with a series of injections. Today I can perform tasks and motions that I had not been able to do for years without excruciating pain. I am so thankful to have found this wonderful Pain Management Clinic.|Doctor is very thorough. column3:
Meenal K. Patil, M.D. serves Moorestown, New Jersey and surrounding communities as a distinguished interventional spine and pain management specialist. With her double board certification in anesthesiology and pain medicine, Dr. Patil brings exceptional expertise to patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. Her dedicated practice focuses exclusively on pain management, a specialty she has committed to since completing her medical training. Dr. Patil's comprehensive approach combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with personalized treatment plans to address each patient's unique needs.

Before establishing her practice in New Jersey, Dr. Patil held prestigious positions at Vanderbilt University Medical School, where she served as the associate fellowship director and rotation director for the pain management fellowship program. Her academic contributions included teaching medical students, helping to shape the next generation of pain management specialists. This blend of clinical expertise and educational leadership reflects Dr. Patil's commitment to advancing the field of pain medicine.

Specialized Care

Dr. Patil specializes in interventional spine procedures and comprehensive pain management solutions. Her practice addresses a wide range of conditions, utilizing evidence-based approaches to provide relief and improve quality of life for patients with chronic pain. By staying at the forefront of pain management techniques, Dr. Patil offers patients access to the most current and effective treatment options available.

Patient Services

Patients can schedule consultations with Dr. Patil at two convenient locations: Medford and the main office in Moorestown. The Moorestown facility is located at 300 NJ-38, Moorestown, NJ 08057. As part of the Virtua Health network, Dr. Patil maintains the highest standards of orthopedic care while ensuring accessibility for patients throughout the region.

Contact Information

To schedule an appointment with Dr. Meenal K. Patil, patients can call +1 609-267-9400. Additional information about Dr. Patil's practice and services is available through the Virtua Health physician directory at doctors.virtua.org.
column11: Dr. Meenal Patil is a practicing interventional spine and pain management specialist. She is double-board-certified in anesthesiology and pain medicine and has been working in pain management exclusively since finishing her training. She served as the associate fellowship director and rotation director for the pain management fellowship and also taught students at Vanderbilt University Medical School. Since moving to New Jersey, she has continued to work in chronic and interventional pain management. Dedicated to providing exceptional orthopedic care, Dr. Patil is available to see patients at our offices in Medford and Moorestown.

Innovative Spine and Pain - Hamilton serves the Hamilton Township, New Jersey area with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Located in Mercer County, our practice combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients overcome chronic pain conditions and improve their quality of life. Our integrated healthcare team believes that successfully treating pain requires not just medical expertise, but also patience, empathy, and a commitment to staying current with the latest developments in pain management.

At Innovative Spine and Pain, we understand that pain affects every aspect of your life. Our physicians, physician assistants, nurse practitioners, and medical assistants work collaboratively to develop personalized treatment plans addressing the root causes of your discomfort. We treat an array of conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome.

Comprehensive Care Services

Our treatment options include:

- Interventional pain procedures

- Medication management

- Physical therapy recommendations

- Minimally invasive techniques

- Advanced diagnostic services

Patient-Centered Philosophy

What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to patient care. We take the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly evaluate your condition, and develop treatment strategies that align with your lifestyle and goals. Our team regularly pursues continuing education to ensure we offer the most current and effective pain management solutions available.

Visit our state-of-the-art facility at 2271 NJ-33 #103, Hamilton Township, NJ 08690, or call us at +1 609-981-8125 to schedule your consultation. Learn more about our services at [www.treatingpain.com/hamilton/](https://www.treatingpain.com/hamilton/).

The staff at this office have been so wonderful, I now send my patients to them! I only hear glowing reviews! I almost lost hope when my insurance denied a much needed surgery multiple times. However, through the profound effort of one Ms. Delya Anderson, I can happily say I will be receiving my surgery in two weeks! I have yet to find a pain management center with as many staff members willing to go above and beyond, you will not go home disappointed.|Ive been seeing Dr. Damien for slmost two years and feel very fortunate to be under his care.  He takes the time to listen and has been very helpful in managing my back pain.  His staff is also excellent and very courtious.|If you're looking for a practice to just get pain meds, go elsewhere. Dr Demian is an outstanding, conservative physician. I had been to 2 other pain Dr's with very minimal results. I was referred to the practice  by a friend after they had gotten great results. I met with Dr Demian, he evaluated me and came up with a plan which included physical therapy and injections. I, now basically live a normal life pain free. Don't get me wrong I have my bad days but by far more great days then bad. I have been with Dr Demian for over a year now and I can't think of one negative thing to say. The office staff and medical assistants are top notch. The office is very accommodating when it comes to scheduling appointments. I am very grateful I found Dr Demian. Living pain free 95% of the time beats being in pain anytime.|I have been suffering with back and foot pain for over 30 years.  I have been to many pain management centers, undergone many procedures(shots in different areas).  Dr Meenal Patil is the first doctor to get it right the first time.  I went in for a lumbar epidural and she did it right!. My hip and back pain were gone. I could sleep at night again for the first time in ages.   The foot pain however stayed.  The Doctor made sure I was able to get my second injection.   I went in for my second injection yesterday and this morning I got up and took my first steps without pain.  I feel like a new woman.  Dr. Patil is so sweet, she spends the time to listen to you and treat you like a friend.  I have never had a doctor get the shot right the first time.  She did. I highly recommend her to anyone that has chronic pain.  The staff is so nice and takes care of all the preserts for procedures efficiently and effectively.  I have never had to wait more than 5 minutes to meet with the doctor.  I also went to the Hamilton Surgery Center , which is one of the surgery centers Dr. Patil office is affiliated  with , and they are just as cordial and nice.  I highly recommend this office and Dr. Meenal Patil.  Thanks Doc!|I was going to The Pain Management Center for over 10 years, following the Nurse Practitioner - Bill (who by the way is AWESOME) from his previous practice .  I suffer from multiple chronic pain issues and was compliant in their Medication Management program.  I did EVERYTHING I was asked to do by this practice, My urine screens were always spot on, etc... yet, when I showed up for my December 2017 appointment, I was told that this would be my last appointment with their practice and was given a 30 day supply of medication and a list of other area Pain Management Doctors.  I was told there was no guarantee that another doctor would take me as a new patient.  I was offered no assistance in finding a new physician.  Their reason?  It was too difficult and time consuming to keep all the DEA records and such on MM patients.  In my opinion?  They didn't want to get sued for the recent overdose death of another one of their MM patients.  It has been nearly 6 months since I was discharged from their practice and I am back to where I was 15 years ago - In pain and unable to live a semi normal life.  This is BS.  You dont take on long term patients and then suddenly discharge them when the heat is on.  Dr. Sackstein is so unethical.  They lost over 400 patients from their 2 main offices.  We are still seriously considering legal action regarding the overdose death of a family member, who was also a patient.  It just seemed so funny that, the month after I shared the CONFIDENTIAL autopsy report with the NP, is when Sackstein decided to stop treating all Medication Management patients.  These PM doctors need to stand up for their patients and stop being so scared of losing their medical licenses.  Don't even get me started on this place.  The ONLY good thing about the place is the NP - Bill Biskup.  I truly hope he finds employment at another PM practice, where he is appreciated.

Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center in Springfield, NJ serves patients throughout northern New Jersey with specialized care for chronic pain conditions. Our comprehensive medical facility focuses on identifying and treating the root causes of discomfort rather than merely addressing symptoms. With a team of board-certified physicians and state-of-the-art technology, we've established ourselves as leaders in minimally invasive pain management solutions.

At Interventional Pain Management and Ortho-Spine Center, we specialize in the identification and treatment of Back Pain, Neck Pain, and Joint Pain. Our approach begins with thorough diagnostics to understand the underlying mechanisms causing your discomfort. Each patient receives an individualized treatment plan designed to address their specific condition, with options ranging from conservative therapies to advanced interventional procedures.

Comprehensive Orthopedic Care

We offer the latest in minimally invasive surgical techniques for faster recovery from both minor joint injuries and major impairments. Our surgical approaches prioritize tissue preservation, reduced scarring, and accelerated rehabilitation timelines. Each year, we treat thousands of patients with complex skeletal injuries, helping them return to their daily activities with improved function and reduced pain.

Our Medical Approach

We take a holistic approach to find the underlying cause of pain issues, and then put together an individualized plan of action to resolve the issue. This may include physical therapy, medication management, interventional procedures, regenerative medicine, or surgical intervention when necessary. Our board-certified doctors provide highly skilled, state-of-the-art services that get our patients back to a normal lifestyle.

Visit Our Springfield Location

Our Springfield Township facility is conveniently located at 105 Morris Ave, Springfield, NJ 07081. To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, call us at (201) 977-6337 or visit our website at www.ipmchealth.com/locations/springfield-township. Our team is ready to help you take the first step toward a pain-free life.

Liberty Pain Care, located in Red Bank, NJ, is a premier pain management clinic led by board-certified physician Dr. Shruti A. Shah, MD. Serving patients throughout Monmouth County and central New Jersey, our practice specializes in comprehensive interventional pain management solutions tailored to each individual's needs. Dr. Shah combines evidence-based medical approaches with cutting-edge treatments to address chronic and acute pain conditions, helping patients regain mobility and improve their quality of life without excessive reliance on medication.

At Liberty Pain Care, we offer a wide range of specialized treatments for various pain conditions. Our expertise in treating low back and neck pain includes advanced diagnostic procedures and targeted interventions that address the root cause of discomfort. For patients suffering from joint pain, we provide customized care plans that may incorporate minimally invasive procedures, therapeutic exercises, and innovative treatments to restore function and reduce inflammation.

Advanced Treatment Options

Our practice features state-of-the-art treatments including therapeutic Botox injections for chronic migraines and certain pain conditions. We also offer regenerative medicine options such as PRP (Platelet-Rich Plasma) therapy and Prolotherapy, which harness the body's natural healing abilities to repair damaged tissues and reduce pain without surgery. These cutting-edge treatments represent our commitment to providing alternatives to traditional pain management approaches.

Patient-Centered Approach

Dr. Shah and the Liberty Pain Care team prioritize personalized care, taking time to understand each patient's unique pain experience and developing comprehensive treatment plans that address both symptoms and underlying causes. Our comfortable, modern facility at 225 NJ-35 in Red Bank is designed to provide a healing environment where patients feel supported throughout their pain management journey.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, visit www.libertypaincare.com or call us at +1 732-665-6492. Liberty Pain Care is committed to helping you overcome pain and return to the activities you love.

column3:
Allied Neurology Interventional Pain Practice, PC in Englewood, NJ offers specialized care for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. Under the expert guidance of Dr. Dariusz Nasiek, MD, this premier pain management center has established itself as a trusted resource for residents throughout Bergen County seeking relief from debilitating pain. The practice combines advanced diagnostic techniques with a patient-centered approach to develop customized treatment plans that address the root cause of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

At Allied Neurology, patients receive thorough neurological evaluations before any treatment begins. The practice adheres to a philosophy that prioritizes conservative care approaches initially, only progressing to minimally invasive interventional procedures when necessary. This methodical approach helps patients avoid unnecessary surgeries while still achieving significant pain relief and improved functionality.

The clinic specializes in treating various pain conditions, including:

  • Neck and back pain

  • Shoulder pain

  • Knee pain

  • Pain resulting from injuries

  • Degenerative conditions

Expert Care from Dr. Nasiek

Dr. Dariusz Nasiek brings extensive experience in neurology and pain management to each patient consultation. His comprehensive approach ensures that patients receive accurate diagnoses followed by evidence-based treatments tailored to their specific conditions. By combining his neurological expertise with interventional pain techniques, Dr. Nasiek helps patients regain mobility and return to their daily activities with minimal discomfort.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets Allied Neurology apart is their commitment to compassionate care. The team takes time to listen to patients' concerns, thoroughly explain diagnoses, and discuss all available treatment options. This collaborative approach empowers patients to make informed decisions about their healthcare journey.

The practice is conveniently located at 185 Grand Ave, Englewood, NJ 07631. Patients seeking relief from chronic or acute pain can schedule a consultation by calling +1 551-733-2260 or visiting their website at https://alliedspineinstitute.com/locations/englewood-nj/.
column11: At Allied Neurology Interventional Pain Practice in Englewood, NJ we provide compassionate and comprehensive care for patient suffering from pain from injury or degeneration. We achieve tremendous results from our philosophy that detailed neurological evaluation should be followed by conservative care first and invasive but non-surgical care later. Whether you are experiencing neck pain, back pain, shoulder pain or knee pain let our experts diagnose the sources of pain and restore health and function.

column3:
Interventional Pain Management & Ortho-Spine Center serves Toms River, NJ and surrounding communities with specialized care for chronic pain conditions. Our board-certified physicians bring decades of combined experience in treating complex pain disorders through minimally invasive techniques and comprehensive treatment plans. We've established ourselves as a trusted healthcare provider in Ocean County, helping thousands of patients reclaim their quality of life through personalized pain management solutions.

At IPMC, we specialize in the identification and treatment of back, neck, shoulder, joint and other chronic pains. Our team utilizes advanced diagnostic tools and techniques to accurately pinpoint the source of discomfort, allowing for targeted interventions that address the root cause rather than merely masking symptoms. From spinal conditions to arthritis and sports injuries, our expertise covers the full spectrum of pain-related disorders.

Our Holistic Approach

We take a holistic approach to find the underlying cause of pain issues, and then put together an individualized plan of action to resolve the issue. This may include interventional procedures, physical therapy, medication management, regenerative medicine, and lifestyle modifications. By addressing pain from multiple angles, we provide more effective and sustainable relief than single-modality approaches.

Patient-Centered Care

Our philosophy centers on empowering patients to participate actively in their recovery journey. We believe in educating our patients about their conditions and treatment options, ensuring they can make informed decisions about their care. Our compassionate staff creates a supportive environment where patients feel heard, respected, and valued throughout their treatment process.

Stop Hurting and Start Living!

Don't let chronic pain control your life any longer. Our Toms River facility offers state-of-the-art equipment and comfortable treatment spaces designed with your comfort in mind. We accept most major insurance plans and work diligently to ensure accessible care for all our patients.

Contact Information

Call Us for Your Appointment Today at +1 732-387-6812. Our Toms River office is conveniently located at 452 Lakehurst Rd, Toms River, NJ 08755. For more information about our services and other locations, visit our website at https://www.ipmchealth.com/locations/toms-river.

Expert Medical Leadership

Elizabeth A. Baker, MD serves Englewood, NJ and surrounding Bergen County communities with exceptional orthopedic care. As a board-certified orthopedic surgeon specializing in sports medicine and joint preservation, Dr. Baker brings over 15 years of clinical expertise to her practice. Patients benefit from her comprehensive approach to musculoskeletal health, combining cutting-edge surgical techniques with personalized rehabilitation plans.

At her Englewood office, Dr. Baker offers a wide range of orthopedic treatments including arthroscopic surgery, joint replacement, fracture care, and non-surgical interventions. Her practice emphasizes minimally invasive procedures that promote faster recovery times and optimal outcomes. Dr. Baker is particularly renowned for her work with athletes of all levels, helping them return to their sports safely and effectively.

Patient-Centered Care

Dr. Baker's philosophy centers on building collaborative relationships with her patients. She takes time to thoroughly explain diagnoses, treatment options, and recovery expectations. The comfortable, modern facility at 106 Grand Ave, Suite 220 in Englewood is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology to provide comprehensive care under one roof.

column3:
Revive Pain Center serves East Brunswick, NJ and surrounding communities with comprehensive interventional pain management solutions. Our state-of-the-art facility combines advanced diagnostic techniques with innovative treatment options to address chronic pain conditions affecting the spine, joints, and musculoskeletal system. We pride ourselves on delivering personalized care plans that focus on minimizing pain while maximizing function and quality of life for our patients.

Mahmud Ibrahim, MD leads our clinical team with extensive expertise in interventional pain management. Dr. Ibrahim completed specialized training in a comprehensive range of fluoroscopic guided procedures that target the root causes of pain. His approach integrates cutting-edge technology with evidence-based practices to deliver optimal outcomes for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions.

Specialized Procedures

Dr. Ibrahim performs numerous advanced interventional procedures including:

  • Cervical, thoracic, and lumbar epidural injections

  • Facet joint injections

  • Sacroiliac joint injections

  • Radiofrequency ablation

  • Spinal cord stimulation

  • Ultrasound-guided diagnostic and therapeutic interventions for tendon, ligament, and nerve conditions

Clinical Focus Areas

Our practice specializes in multiple disciplines of pain management including:

  • Musculoskeletal medicine

  • Non-operative spine procedures

  • Orthopedic pain management

  • Sports medicine

  • Electrodiagnostic medicine

  • Regenerative therapy options

Contact Information

Visit our modern facility conveniently located at 555 NJ-18, Suite 202, East Brunswick, NJ 08816. For appointments or inquiries, call us at +1 732-955-9139 or visit our website at www.revivepaincenter.com to learn more about our services and treatment options.
column11: Dr. Ibrahim was trained to perform a number of different fluoroscopic guided interventional pain management procedures. These include, but are not limited to: cervical, thoracic, lumbar epidurals, facet joint injections, sacroiliac joint injections, radiofrequency ablation, and spinal cord stimulation. He also uses ultrasound in order to diagnose and treat many common tendon, ligament, and nerve problems. His clinical interests include: musculoskeletal medicine, non-operative spine procedures, orthopedics, sports medicine, electrodiagnostic medicine, and regenerative therapy.

I used to wake up in the morning and the pain in my neck was so bad I had to count down from 10 to get myself ready to move. I then started setting my alarm 20 minutes early to take Advil so I could move, 20 minutes later when I had to get up for work. This went on for a few years. I tried PT but it was too painful. When my doctor told me about Dr. Ibrahim I made an appointment immediately. Dr. Ibrahim did an ablation which has something to do with the nerves. I remember waking up after a minor and painless procedure and I when I turned my head, I had no pain. After that I didn't have to set my alarm clock early. I was able to go back to the gym and do everything I used to do because of the procedure. About a year later, I started to have pain in my arm when I was lifting. I spoke to Dr. Ibrahim about it and he said it was tendinitis. He performed a procedure where he injected steroids in my elbow and upper thumb. The day after the procedure I tested my arm out with light weight and was amazed because I had no pain. I'm back at the gym lifting again and my trainer is amazed at how quickly I responded to the steroids. I wouldn't go to any other doctor. I tell  him where the pain is and he knows what is wrong and knows how to fix it. I'm so grateful that I have Dr. Ibrahim to fix whatever is wrong with my movement. Southwest Pain Center serves Las Cruces, NM with specialized pain management services designed to address the unique needs of each patient. Located at 3005 Hillrise Dr, this dedicated medical facility has established itself as a trusted resource for individuals suffering from chronic pain conditions throughout the region. The center's comprehensive approach combines advanced interventional procedures with personalized care plans to help patients regain their quality of life.

Southwest Pain Center specializes in treating a wide range of painful conditions, including:

  • Neck and lower back pain
  • Spinal conditions
  • Neurological disorders
  • Musculoskeletal issues

    • The center's philosophy recognizes that each patient's pain experience is unique, requiring individualized treatment strategies. Their team of specialists employs leading-edge interventional procedures designed to provide safe, effective relief while addressing the root causes of pain.

    Comprehensive Diagnostic Process

    When patients visit Southwest Pain Center, they undergo a thorough pain management consultation that may include:

  • A comprehensive medical and medication history review
  • Laboratory and/or diagnostic imaging tests
  • Patient question, education and review sessions

    • This detailed assessment allows the medical team to develop a complete understanding of each patient's condition before recommending treatment options.

    Treatment Options

    Based on diagnostic findings, Southwest Pain Center offers various treatment approaches, including:

  • Medication management tailored to each patient's needs
  • Exercise and spine health recommendations for long-term wellness
  • Specialized injections including epidural injections, nerve blocks, and trigger point injections

    • The center's staff is committed to providing custom, safe, and trustworthy care plans while ensuring patients understand their treatment options through thorough education.

    For more information or to schedule an appointment, patients can visit [southwestpaincenter.net](https://southwestpaincenter.net/) or call +1 575-525-3980.
column11: Southwest Pain Center specializes in treating painful neck/lower back pain, spinal, neurological and musculoskeletal conditions with leading edge interventional procedures. Pain Management consultation may include the diagnostic tools or evaluations: * A thorough medical and medication history review * Laboratory and/or diagnostic imaging tests * Patient question, education and review sessions Treatments and recommendations may include: * Medications * Exercise and spine health * Injections (epidural, nerve blocks, trigger point)

column40:
The staff here is always very friendly and professional.  The nurse that took me to room very professional and I asked question about procedure today, what was difference between this and last injection and he immediately checked and came back and came me easy to understand information, very thorough.  Much appreciated.  The nurses very friendly in procedure room and explained what they were doing.  The doctor or nurse practitioner friendly and explained what he was doing.   This staff is outstanding!!|My recent experience with the staff here at Southwest Pain Center are very professional and caring. They take the time to listen to you whatever your needs are and really understand your anxiety. Dr Ramirez went out of his way to come and meet me before my procedure. He listened to my fears and he calmed my anxiety. During the procedure he took the time to talk me through everything that was going to happen. Everyone in that room was very compassionate and caring. I came in very overwhelmed and I leave with the breath of fresh air. I highly recommend anyone who is living with pain to come and visit Southwest Pain CENTER.|Your reply was very polite. And your practice has probably changed since I went there. But you don't seem to understand that to your patients wait time is lobby plus exam room time. Your staff promised me a quick appointment, which I didn't receive. Then after being moved to your exam room I was again abandoned after a couple of cursory questions.
I don't know how big your lobby is so I don't know if half full is 3 people or 15. But my experience got the rating it deserved and I won't change it|My personal experience at Southwest Pain Center was smooth. Mr. Jose Luis Ramirez the anesthetist was extremely gentle with a warm bedside manner that kept me at ease and gave me comfort as I went the other lower back procedure. The crew Mr. Ramirez served as his assistants were calm and their affect was embracing as was Mr. Ramirez's.   Greatly appreciate their professionalism and their implicit respect and affect for me the patient. In gratitude, Rudolfo

This second review is provided after two vollies that served as "test" procedures. During this appointment , Dr. Ramirez preformed an RFA (Radio Frequency Ablation) on my lower back. I must say, Dr. Ramirez's has a healing hand when the needles began entering my lower back. Gentle. Soft and sure in touch. Always reassuring. His voice is strong but calm with a caring tone that provided me with comfort and a vision of healing. Because of Dr. Ramirez and his most able assistants they were consistent and unconditional worthy helpers. His medical assistants  Sonya (Radiologist), as well as Angelica and Erica were respectful and helpful to Dr. Ramirez and Sonya as well as my person. In between visit/check ins with Dina Rico out conversations were most helpful as I prepared for each treatment.

Southwest Pain Center is place for healing, for giving me the opportunity to take better of me as I in my later years traverse my life pain free.

My unconditional thanks to all at Southwest Pain Center.|2.5+ hours after our appointment, provider no-call / no-show.   We called in after waiting an hour and we were told there was 1 person ahead of us.  An hour later we called back, waited on hold for 20 minutes only to be told the provider left for the day.  No call, no show.   We didn't expect immediate service, but we didn't expect to be ignored and skipped for 2.5 hours in total.   Even with telehealth, people take time off work to deal with this stuff.   This provider is the least professional in terms of communication that I've dealt with so far.|Staff is very considerate and friendly. Helpful for your needs before and after your procedure. I would definitely recommend them to anyone that is looking for a new pain doctor. When you have a phone appointment they listen to all your needs and they take their time to figure out the best solution for you. I'm very satisfied with Southwest Pain Center.|Dr Ramirez and his staff are super amazing. They are very professional and truly care about you as a person. I have been in situations where I have received shots in my back and I had the doctor laughing and joking with their staff and talking about the weekend or the night before. Not very professional and not very comforting to the person laying face down on the table. I have always received the best care and the best consideration with this team. Choosing them you will not go wrong.|Hello everyone, since going in to the facility to my appointment everyone was so attentive. From the receptionist to the people in the back. When it was time for my procedure the ladies that do the prepping they were very attentive to my needs and when ready the doctor does his magic.

I am grateful, thank you Dr. Ramirez and your staff.

Sandia Pain Center in Albuquerque, New Mexico offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients suffering from chronic pain conditions. Established with a mission to improve quality of life, our specialized medical team provides personalized treatment plans tailored to each patient's unique needs. We combine evidence-based approaches with compassionate care to help patients regain function and reduce suffering.

At Sandia Pain Center, we understand that chronic pain requires a multifaceted approach. Our treatment options include:

  • Medication Management - Carefully prescribed and monitored pain medications

  • Interventional Procedures - Including nerve blocks, epidural injections, and radiofrequency ablation

  • Ketamine Infusions - Advanced therapy for treatment-resistant pain conditions

Comprehensive Care Approach

Our board-certified pain specialists work closely with patients to develop individualized treatment plans that address both the physical and emotional aspects of chronic pain. We utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools and techniques to identify the root causes of pain and implement effective management strategies.

Facility and Location

Our modern facility is conveniently located at 8501 Candelaria Rd NE in Albuquerque, providing a comfortable and welcoming environment for patients throughout New Mexico. The center features advanced medical equipment and private treatment rooms designed with patient comfort in mind.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us:

Phone: +1 505-420-4971

Website: www.sandiapaincenter.com

Address: 8501 Candelaria Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87111, United States

column40:
I had an epidural for back pain.
Dr. Bergsten talked me through the entire procedure. I was scared but he made me feel at ease and it went smoothly without much pain. I was glad to have his care and experience in doing a semi-invasive procedure. I would recommend going to him for pain management to anyone seeking relief. The facility is clean and the staff are awesome!|I can't Speak more highly of Dr. Bergsten and his staff. Not only are they friendly and enjoyable to deal with but.....

I have been in pain for over a year. No one hearing me. Offering Pain meds that just caused more issues than helped. I resorted to just living with it. I was referred to Sandia Pain Center and in my head just dreaded going. Assuming it would be a the same as all the rest.
Dr Bergsten sat down and really heard me . Within a couple weeks I had an additional appointment with him that, not to sound cliche, but changed everything. One procedure took away 95% of my pain. So much so that I didn't even realize how much pain I was in before. I am shocked every time I go to do a normal thing like standing up, emptying the dryer, taking my dog for a walk, etc. and I'm not in pain. It really brings tears to my eyes sometimes.
I cannot thank them enough. I will sing their praises to everyone.|Dr. Bergsten is an anomaly and a one of a kind doctor!! He is kind, compassionate and he truly cares about how you are feeling! I have seen several doctors in Albuquerque and they have given up on helping me. It has been an arduous and painful journey and without Dr. Bergsten's help I would have lost all hope.|Dr. Bergsten is so amazing. He truly cares about his patients. His staff is so helpful and amazing. I highly recommend coming to Sandia Pain center you will not be disappointed!|Dr. Bergsten is simply fantastic! His knowledge, compassion, and thoroughness make every visit a reassuring experience. He and his staff, take the time to listen attentively and explain things in a way that's easy to understand, which I really appreciate. I trust their expertise completely and wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone seeking top-notch medical care. My experience with Dr. Bergsten was amazing. He treated my husband and I with the utmost respect and kindness.|Was seen by Dr. Bergsten last week when I urgently needed to find a pain specialist to treat a sports injury.  He is competent, caring, thorough and easy to build a rapport with and trust.  His MA, Roy and Janet are both responsive.  His new office is easy to get to.|Dr bergsten is a great doctor, and very good at what he does! I'm glad I found him, I've been seeing him for years for my pain and he has been an absolute joy to deal with.|Dr. Bergsten and the staff at Sandia Pain Center are simply amazing. I have been Dr. Bergsten's patient for many years now because he has always taken my pain management seriously. He truly cares about the pain I go through and helped me to create a perfect pain management plan when other doctors simply could not. I highly recommend Sandia Pain Center to every one in Albuquerque because of the 5-star treatment I have always received from Dr. Bergsten and his wonderful staff!!!

Modern Pain & Spine serves Albuquerque, New Mexico with exceptional interventional pain management services focused on treating people, not just pain. This state-of-the-art practice extends its comprehensive care to adults throughout Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, and Santa Fe regions, offering cutting-edge treatments tailored to each patient's unique needs. Under the leadership of Dr. Athanasios Manole, who brings impressive credentials with board certifications in pain management, occupational medicine, and preventive medicine, the clinic has established itself as a premier destination for those seeking effective pain relief solutions.

The expert team at Modern Pain & Spine specializes in both preventive and regenerative approaches to pain management. Their comprehensive treatment options address a wide spectrum of conditions including:

  • Neck and back pain

  • Knee and hip pain

  • Joint pain

  • Hand and wrist pain

Personalized Treatment Approach

What sets Modern Pain & Spine apart is their commitment to individualized care. Rather than applying one-size-fits-all solutions, Dr. Manole and his team carefully assess each patient's condition, medical history, and lifestyle factors to develop customized treatment plans designed to achieve optimal outcomes. This patient-centered philosophy ensures that every person receives the specific care they need to improve their quality of life.

Contact Information

Modern Pain & Spine welcomes new patients at their conveniently located facility at 1540 Juan Tabo Blvd NE, Suite A, Albuquerque, NM 87112. To schedule a consultation or learn more about their innovative pain management solutions, patients can call (505) 800-7246 or visit their website at www.modernpainspine.com.

column40:
Dr. Manoli is incredibly knowledgeable, kind, truly listens to all of your concerns & very patient with questions. On top of that--his protocols & treatments are so successful. The staff is amazing-helpful, not so busy that they can't look up & make eye contact or help you. A great experience!!!|I have been going to Modern Pain and Spine with Dr. Manole for two years now.  As a 69 year old with moderate disk issues in my lower spine, as well as SI joint complications, the care , diagnosis and assistance have been outstanding.  Dr. Manole is extremely professional, yet surprisingly friendly and outgoing.  He honestly knows me, and takes the time to make me feel understood and cared for. This is the best thing I could have done for myself. Thanks to the entire team !!|Dr. Manole is nothing short of amazing! From the moment I walked into his office, it was clear how deeply he cares about his patients. He takes the time to listen, asks thoughtful questions, and ensures every concern is addressed with patience and expertise. His genuine compassion and dedication shine through in every interaction.

What truly sets Dr. Manole apart is his thoroughness. He leaves no stone unturned, meticulously reviewing details and explaining diagnoses or treatment plans in a way that's easy to understand. Whether it's a routine check-up or a complex issue, you can trust he'll go the extra mile to provide the best care possible.

I've never felt more confident in a healthcare provider. Dr. Manole's combination of skill, empathy, and attention to detail is rare and deeply appreciated. If you're looking for a doctor who truly puts patients first, look no further. I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking outstanding medical care.

Thank you, Dr. Manole, for your unwavering commitment to your patients' well-being. You're a true gem in the medical field!|Dr Manole is a rare breed.  He is technically at the top of the Neurological field while at the same time possessing and demonstrating keen insight into his patients experiences and relationships.  My wife and I recommend him to any and everyone experiencing pain and/or spine problems.|Mixed messages and unsound clinical decision making by a provider who is known to staff to have poor rapport with patients. This provider suggested re-prescribing to me a medication that has caused nausea, vomiting, and an allergic rash that is currently spread across my trunk.

I expressed serious concern about continuing a medication that makes me sick, especially when I'm already sick. We go to specialists to benefit from their expertise and education, not to have more harm done to our bodies, not to sit in front of burnt out and unfeeling providers who make us fight for dignity.

I'm a healthcare provider, too. One who experiences chronic pain and has difficulty caring for her own patients. Rather than partnering with me in my care, Modern Pain and Spine had me sit in a waiting room to get a second opinion about the rash by a physician who never showed up, and instead sent a staff member to deliver the message, "We're not prescribing you anything else, you should go home.'

This is not a place of healing or empowerment-- it's a place where desperate people go to ask for help and instead receive shame and suspicion of addiction. I worry that the clinicians here are doing active harm.|My husband had his first visit today for a pinched nerve and all of the staff were excellent--extremely knowledgeable, professional, friendly and efficient.  They completed a thorough exam and explained what would be needed going forward. They worked us in for a pain intervention the same day which was greatly appreciated because we live out of town. This is an excellent clinic and I would highly recommend it for back pain.|The practice is well organized and well staffed. Dr. Manole is very knowledgeable and works closely with his people to make sure things are done right. This is not my first time at this practice and I can tell it got better over time. They ard enthusiastic to make people feel better. I have a problematic right knee, and when I left the clinic it already felt a great deal better.
Thank you Dr. Manole and staff!|Never have I been so upset with healthcare workers. My father, who is disabled and suffers from severe pain, has been seeing doctors at Modern Pain and Spine for a while now. Today, as his daughter, I've never been more frustrated. I took him to his appointment for his routine knee injections, which are essential for managing his pain. But after waiting over three hours, he finally came out and shared his awful experience. Not only had they scheduled him with the wrong person for the injections, but they made him wait for far too long and ignored him while he was in pain. To make matters worse, he told me that a bald man got in his face and said, "my shit level is high today," before aggressively giving him the injections and walking out without saying anything else. This is unacceptable treatment!

New Mexico Pain Management serves Santa Fe, NM and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians specializes in treating chronic pain conditions through innovative, evidence-based approaches. Since our founding, we've been committed to improving quality of life for patients throughout northern New Mexico who struggle with persistent pain issues.

At New Mexico Pain Management, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to pain relief, combining interventional procedures, medication management, and rehabilitative therapies. Our specialists are experts in treating conditions including back and neck pain, arthritis, neuropathy, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain. We pride ourselves on developing personalized treatment plans that address each patient's unique needs and circumstances.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our modern clinic at 460 St Michaels Dr, Building 200 in Santa Fe features advanced diagnostic and treatment technology in a comfortable, patient-centered environment. We've designed our space to ensure accessibility and convenience for all patients, particularly those with mobility challenges related to their pain conditions.

Patient-Centered Approach

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of life, which is why we take time to listen to our patients' concerns and goals. New patients can expect comprehensive evaluations and clear communication about treatment options and expected outcomes.

column38: john Fullbright|Rosemary Edwards|Johnny Ibarra|Steve Jones|Claire Dishman|Sarah Japa Wrenn Weaver|Andrew Click|Dr Jonas Skardis
column40:
Dr Skardis is incredibly talented and experienced. I had a 3/4 full thickness tear of my rotator cuff, as well as many other painful issues. Surgery was not advised(and I didn't want it) After the very first series of injections I was able to sleep on my shoulder comfortably. As I see it, Dr Skardis saved me months of anguish and thousands of dollars. He may be more expensive than some, yet his accuracy with guiding the needle to the injury sites was prophetic!! He's my go to for all my complex injuries and pain recovery! Highly recommend!!!|Yep! I'm a one star person! Too many patients! There's a main operations you get sent to but it's not the office. No one knows what's going on till you complain. Made 2 telehealth appts. Never got called. When I inquired they said "oh you need to come into the office" after make 2 appointments! Then no one got back to me! Try elsewhere!|Dr. Watkins and his staff at this office are always very pleasant and friendly and helpful. They show true concern , empathy, compassion, and care for the patients that they treat. They always make my visit easy and pleasant and meaningful. I truly appreciate the care they provide, and I definitely don't mind driving three hours to see them.|Talk about incompetent...so bad its scary! Maybe they do better doling out meds but if you actually need a procedure, this is NOT the place to go! Besides they will take the appointment and then send you to Albuquerque anyway. No one there has any clue what they are doing and the doctor, who seemed half awake told me and my wife I needed one procedure then after 3 weeks waiting to have the procedure, he backtracks on everything he told us. It looks like a pill mill and perhaps that's what it is! Big clue was when we went there for a spinal injection and they made me pee in a cup. Should have run for the door then and there. We live we learn.|Dr. Skardis and his team provide excellent detailed care. He is also dedicated to
patient education providing detailed videos so one can better understand their condition. A beautiful office with excellent care for those needing or wanting the very finest in pain management and PRP injections.|I went to this clinic for two years and they helped me through a health crisis. The staff is always knowledgeable and very helpful and Dr. Skardis is an incredible physician. My neck, back, knees and toes have had years added to their flexibility and I have less pain all over. Thank you New Mexico Pain Management.|$975/per injection & no insurance coverage...

When I spoke the receptionist, she was rude, unhelpful & didn't formally answer the phone, instead just with a simple "hello" -- quite unprofessional for what these people bill...

What has happened to American healthcare?
Shame on this clinic -- being elitist about pain management is morally wrong!!

You took an oath to help people -- not only the rich...

There are likely many other people that have suffered because of your greed & lack of proper access.|Sam, I'm sorry that you found your call with our receptionist confusing. I apologize. Apparently, you were looking for pain management in the form of oral prescription pain medication. We do not prescribe oral pain drugs. We specialize in interventional pain management - injection procedures to help with pain, particularly PRP Stem Cell injections to repair structures in joints. Perhaps our office manager mentioned that we suggest various supplements or natural medicines for oral administration instead of pain drugs. Sorry that this didn't work for you and that you chose to give us such a terrible rating simply because we did not offer prescription pain drugs. I hope your pain improves.

Interventional Pain Associates serves Albuquerque, New Mexico with specialized pain management solutions for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions. Our interventional pain clinic focuses on delivering quality care to injured athletes and individuals experiencing severe pain that impacts their daily lives. With a comprehensive approach to pain management, our team of specialists develops personalized treatment plans designed to help patients regain functionality and return to the activities they enjoy.

At Interventional Pain Associates, we utilize multiple therapeutic tools and cutting-edge techniques to address various pain conditions. Our approach combines innovative interventional procedures with evidence-based treatments to provide effective pain relief. We understand that each patient's pain experience is unique, which is why we create customized treatment plans tailored to individual needs and circumstances.

Our Approach to Patient Care

Patient-centered treatment is at the core of our practice philosophy. We treat our patients the way we would want to be treated—with compassion, respect, and thorough attention to their concerns. Our highly skilled pain relief doctors work collaboratively to:

- Identify the source of your pain through comprehensive evaluation

- Develop effective custom treatment strategies

- Implement cutting-edge interventional techniques

- Monitor progress and adjust treatments as needed

Specialized Services

Our interventional pain specialists offer a range of advanced procedures and treatments designed to address both acute injuries and chronic pain conditions. We focus on helping patients reduce their reliance on medication while improving function and quality of life.

Contact Information

column40:
Dr. Raitan is amazing. He takes the time to assess you and then provides clinic support treatments that really work. He is kind and listens. The clinic is efficient and everyone working there is knowledgeable and understanding. We are so lucky to have this doctor and the IPA clinic in New Mexico!|WOW, at first I had a great impression about my first visit with Dr.  Raiten and my follow up injection. Today I had a follow up video appointment to assess the  results of my procedure, and I was surprised to find out that it was with his PA named Maria. She seemed credible and polite until I mentioned that for the future I would like to keep my care with Dr.  Raiten just for the fact that I don't feel comfortable of having a third person involved in my care. Maria politely yet assertively told me that I did not have that option and if this did not work for me, she'd be more than happy to refer me to another group.
A few minutes later I called the office to verify the information I had just received, was transferred to the office manager named Katie whose level of unprofessionalism and rudeness was surreal. She actually sounded unwell when she brought up that by "not trusting Maria's competency as a PA, I was breaking a contract I signed with the office to be COURTEOUS with the staff, and for that I was being rude". Not for a second did I challenge Maria's qualifications as a physician's assistant, instead I stressed my preference of  seeing Dr Raiten primarily.
I was NEVER told beforehand that there was another doctor in the office who I was going to be switched to. Katie also told me that this was HER office, since she was the doctor's wife, and that she would suggest for me to find another pain medical group.
The treatment I received from this office's gatekeepers today lacks professionalism, respect and definitely class from the "doctor's wife" who sounded more like an unbalanced disgruntled employee. Not the kind of bedside manners I expect from a professional clinic.
I'll definitely share my experience with others and with my primary care physician who sent me to Dr. Raiten and spoke so highly of him.|Excellent experience.  Welcoming and accommodating staff were professional as well as accomodating. Each communicated Cogently.  Dr.R was excellent as well. demonstrating positive regard while performing a skilled exam. His applied knowledge of neuro issues is remarkable.|Dr. Raiten and his staff are giving me the greatest care. He and his staff are professional, kind, courteous, compassionate and empathetic. Dr. Raiten is addressing my pain on my paralyzed side from a stroke I suffered. He explained everything in detail about the recommended procedures and a plan going forward. I am sure glad we engaged the services of Interventional Pain Associates.|I am so frustrated with this facility. I have left messages and they have gone unanswered, calls have not been returned. And in my initial message I shared that my matter had been ongoing for some time and that I would like an appointment scheduled as soon as possible. Had I required immediate attention, I would have sought it out, I merely asked for their attention as quickly as possible. In return, I haven't heard from them in over 2 weeks. For the sake of future patients, I hope they can get their act together.|Went in for evaluation today for a spinal stimulator and everyone from the front office to seeing the doctor I  was very impressed with the excellent care and communication that they provided. I definitely feel I'm in great care with them taking care of my problems.|All staff, including the Doctor, assistants, nurses and front office, have ALL been extremely supportive, polite, open to help during several challenges, both medical and scheduling. I believe this has been the BEST medical experience I have had in my life. And that is more than half a century!!!|This was my first Nice clean, friendly office and staff. Doctor was patient and listened. Will see how it goes.

column40:
There are not enough wonderful things I can say about Dr. Berti and his staff. They are absolutely amazing. They answered all my questions and explained my procedures in detail and what I should expect and for how long.  The compassion and care they show their patients is truly remarkable.
I was in a car accident and had horrible neck and back pain. After a few months with Dr. Berti and his team my pain is gone. I can't thank him enough for his outstanding job he did. Im truly greatful I was sent to him for my pain. I highly recommend Dr Berti for any pain management you may need.|Dr. Berti and his staff are amazing! I was always kept informed by him and his staff about everything. They are great with reminder calls, and when I needed injections on my back and neck they told me what to expect and for how long to expect it for.
I have been to doctors offices before and it was a unfortunate turn of events that brought me to Dr. Berti, but I've never felt so well cared for or been shown such consideration as I did with him and his staff.
I will let everyone know about him, if they ever have need of him and if I ever need someone again in the future there is no doubt as to where I'll be going. Thank you so so much to all of you and for making my worse experience more bearable.|I appreciate Dr. Berti and  his staff. They were extremely nice and after the injection I definitely feel like I'm closer recovery than ever before. Thank you for your care!!|Twice I have called there to set up a new patient appt. Twice they have transferred me to their intake line. Twice I've left vm's to call me back to set it up and I have never received a call. Guess I'm going to have to find another doctor. This place doesn't care.|Great place! Went there with neck and back pain, got my injections done and now I am pain free. Staff is really nice, especially, Ms. Veronica, she really goes out of her way to help you. I would recommend this place highly! Respectfully. Ms. Agnes.|Dr. Berti was very informative and patient explaining my needed procedure to alleviate my back pain as a direct result from my motor vehicle accident. I am grateful for his knowledge and measured approach to my healthcare.|I have been receiving  treatment here for a personal injury case and these people are amazing. The staff is so friendly and educated. They have helped me tremendously with my pain. Highly recommended, the atmosphere is also very calming and relaxing. Super clean too. Don't go anywhere else, you won't regret it.|I was in a car accident the beginning of June. I had a concussion and whiplash. My back, neck, right shoulder and my head hurt so much I couldn't function.  My head hurt so badly that I couldn't stand sound, movement, or light. I couldn't open my eyes unless lighting was dim.  Couldn't rest, sit, stand, work, drive. NOTHING!  I'm a highly active person and I never get sick. That accident flipped my world completely up side down. I was referred to ALB Pain management and spine care soon after I was hurt. They got me in quickly. I don't remember my first couple appointments with them other then how caring , gentle and professional they all were.  I received injections in my spine from the Dr. at ALB.  Before that appointment I was so scared. I had so many fears about it, I almost didn't do it.but I did.  This staff really cares and it shows.  They explained everything step by step .I felt well informed and comforted. I received the injection in my spine about 2 months after the accident.The 12th of August. After getting the injections, slowly I get up from the bed and was asked if I was OK.  I kinda started to cry, I just realized that I hadn't, up until this moment, ever made eye contact with any of them. I only new them by there shoes.  Now for the first time I was making eye contact with them.  Amazing!  It's now the end of September, 3 1/2 months after the accident.  My life is getting back to normal quickly.  I owe my quick recovery to the wonderful staff and Dr.'s at ALB Pain management and spine care.  Without them, my recovery would have taken YEARS!
Gratefully thankful,  Karla F.

column3:
Dr. Athanasios Manole Modern Pain & Spine serves Albuquerque, New Mexico with a revolutionary approach to pain management that focuses on treating the whole person, not just their symptoms. Located at 1540 Juan Tabo Blvd NE Suite A, this state-of-the-art practice delivers cutting-edge treatments and comprehensive care for adults of all ages throughout Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, and Santa Fe. The clinic's patient-centered philosophy ensures that each individual receives personalized attention and customized treatment plans designed to achieve optimal outcomes and improved quality of life.

The practice is led by Dr. Athanasios Manole, a distinguished physician holding triple board certifications in pain management, occupational medicine, and preventive medicine. This unique combination of specialties allows Dr. Manole and his team to approach pain from multiple perspectives, addressing both immediate symptoms and underlying causes. Their integrated approach combines evidence-based treatments with innovative therapies to provide lasting relief rather than temporary fixes.

Specialized Treatment Areas

Modern Pain & Spine specializes in both preventive and regenerative pain management for a wide range of conditions including:

  • Neck and back pain

  • Knee and hip pain

  • Joint pain

  • Hand and wrist pain

Advanced Treatment Options

The practice offers cutting-edge therapies that go beyond conventional pain management approaches. Their comprehensive treatment plans may include minimally invasive procedures, regenerative medicine techniques, and preventive strategies that help patients avoid future pain episodes while addressing current discomfort.

Experience the difference of personalized pain management at Modern Pain & Spine. Contact them at (505) 800-7246 or visit their website at www.modernpainspine.com to schedule your consultation today.

column3:
New Mexico Pain Center serves Albuquerque, NM and surrounding communities with specialized interventional pain management services. Our dedicated team of pain specialists combines years of clinical expertise with compassionate care to address chronic and acute pain conditions. We understand how debilitating persistent pain can be, which is why we're committed to developing personalized treatment plans that target the source of your discomfort rather than simply masking symptoms.

At New Mexico Pain Center, we use cutting edge therapy and the most advanced interventional pain techniques to help reduce and in some cases eliminate your pain. Our comprehensive approach integrates innovative medical technologies with evidence-based practices to provide effective relief for patients suffering from various pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and complex regional pain syndrome.

Our Specialized Services

Our interventional procedures include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and other minimally invasive techniques designed to provide lasting relief. Each treatment plan is customized to address your specific pain profile and medical history, ensuring the most effective approach for your unique situation.

Patient-Centered Care

We pride ourselves on creating a supportive environment where patients feel heard and valued. Our team takes the time to thoroughly evaluate your condition, explain treatment options, and answer all your questions, empowering you to make informed decisions about your pain management journey.

Contact Information

Visit our state-of-the-art facility at 3600 Coors Blvd NW STE. A200, Albuquerque, NM 87120, United States. To schedule a consultation, call us at +1 505-264-9961 or learn more about our services at www.albuquerquepaincenter.com.
