column2: Dr. Douglas Allen - NY Pain Medicine
column3:
NY Pain Medicine serves New York, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Douglas Allen. Our multidisciplinary approach combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with holistic therapies to address chronic pain conditions at their source. Located in the heart of Manhattan, our practice has established itself as a trusted resource for patients seeking lasting relief from debilitating pain without excessive reliance on medication.

Dr. Douglas Allen — our lead doctor — is dual board certified in physical medicine, rehabilitation, and interventional pain management, so he's more than qualified to coordinate your care among the office's various specialists. His extensive training allows him to develop personalized treatment plans that address the unique needs of each patient. Additionally, Dr. Allen is a certified medical marijuana provider and opiate addiction specialist, offering alternative pain management solutions for patients concerned about traditional pain medications.

Comprehensive Services

At NY Pain Medicine, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our integrated approach includes:

  • Physical Therapy: Customized rehabilitation programs to improve mobility and function

  • Medical Massage: Therapeutic techniques to reduce muscle tension and promote healing

  • Acupuncture: Ancient healing practices to stimulate natural pain relief

These services are complimentary to your primary medical treatment, creating a holistic healing environment.

Patient-Centered Care

We understand that chronic pain affects every aspect of your life. Our compassionate team works diligently to provide not just medical treatment but also education and support throughout your healing journey. Our Madison Avenue location offers a comfortable, professional environment where patients can receive the highest quality care.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, please contact us:

Website: nypainmedicine.com

Phone: +1 212-245-7900

Address: 425 Madison Ave Suite 302, New York, NY 10017, United States

column40:
Dr.Allen and his team are consummate and knowledgeable in the treatment of pain. Dr. Allen takes a holistic approach to treatments and minimizes the use of opioids and other medication. The staff is always warm and welcoming. As someone who has suffered from chronic pain for over thirty years, and has had my share of inadequate pain treatment, I can fully recommend Dr. Allen and NEW York Pain Medicine.|I've been a pain control patient with several different doctors since 2001. While I've been happy enough with all of those doctors, after working with Dr. Allen for the last few months I actually feel like I'm getting something more out of my treatment. He asks questions and those questions have helped me to think differently about how to control my chronic pain (from Crohn's disease and multiple abdominal surgeries). He pays attention, and I don't feel like just another file on his desk. He's even helped me with other pains I've been experiencing for years but never talked about, I assumed they were the price of aging. He put me in touch with Tania, New York Pain Medicine & Physical Therapy's in-house Physical Therapist. Now, those aches and pains are being treated, without the need for more medications, on top of my chronic issues! Tania has been brilliant, I'm walking with less pain these days, and had no idea this was even a possibility. In a short few months I have learned more about how my body mechanics work and how I react to pain medication than I have learned over 20 years in and out of the hospital. Finding a new doctor is difficult and reception for new patients isn't always pleasant. However, Caroline (whom seems to run the whole show behind the scenes) has made that experience not only pleasant, she's kind, welcoming and helpful. I recently met Melesia who is new behind the desk and the same can be said of her. Even if I'm feeling terrible before my appointments I always leave smiling, thanks to the whole team Dr. Allen has built. I only wish it didn't take me 22 years to find this place!|I was referred to Dr Allen for severe back pain. I ended up needing disc surgery but I highly recommend him and Allison, his PT. He is knowledgeable and kind. Allison does one on one therapy in a private room. She is great. A small office so perfect during COVID.|Dr allen is very caring and kind . Takes his time to explain things as well . I have seen a few drs for pain management and he is the only one who has listened and made me feel comfortable which is important. He has also helped me manage my health and is always there when i have a question which is very rare. I recommended him to some of my own patients because i am a provider as well and everyone has had the same positive experience. He also has a great team for PT ,acupuncture, and front desk.|Dr. Allen has been extremely helpful to me in managing chronic back pain and deciding on treatment options. From my first visit he has helped me to understand the nature of my injury, potential options for treatment, and the pros and cons of each method. It is clear to me that Dr. Allen sees patient education as being of primary importance so that the patient can, along with the doctor, make informed decisions about treatment. His advice and feedback regarding potential treatment is generally conservative, which I appreciate. I would recommend Dr. Allen without hesitation to someone suffering from acute or chronic back or neck pain.|Dr. Allen has been my pain management doc for a little over four years and I couldn't recommend him more. He's friendly and attentive and has always managed my care professionally. If you want someone who is going to talk to you for two minutes and throw pills at you, he's not your guy. If you want someone who will actually work with you to help you and get you feeling better, there is no one better.|I was beyond impressed with my experience at this office.  Dr. Douglas Allen and The Physical therapist Aleks Setcha are all I could have hoped for with pain management.  I received the best advice and treatment during every visit. Dr. Allen is extremely knowledgeable and positive.
My pain has clearly improved with Aleks  who is so dedicated and intelligent. I can get around much more than before, changing my life for the better.I am truly grateful for both of them  I would definitely recommend this practice to anyone that values their health and wants an empowering experience.|I had an excellent visit with Dr. Allen for my back pain. He's a good doctor who doesn't talk down to you and has empathy for your problem. Plus he loves heavy metal which gives him instant credibility with me! I will continue to see Dr. Allen because he is thoughtful and helped me with my problem.

Expert Credentials and Approach

column38: Jessica Hanley|James Hatt|LourdesM Santiago|Warren Liebesman|prhenry3|Rita Salfeld|Petra Baum|Barbara Currier
column40:
I arrived nervous, but Dr. Kulick put me right at ease. In addition to being an expert in the field, he is a nice man. I felt very comfortable with him. i felt that he really listened, and that he understood and cared. I did a lot of research before deciding who to see for my treatment; I also consulted several other doctors before making my decision. Now, after having had my first appointment, I feel that i made the right decision with deciding to go to Dr. Kulick. His associate, Heather, is highly informed and lovely as well. This is a first-rate place to go for help.|Dr. Alex Kulick has been my Primary Care Physician for 21 years. He is one of the best diagnosticians practicing medicine as a curative profession.  He listens, he asks pertinent questions, he does not waffle, he respects you and the issues that brought you to him that day. He is kind. He is gentle. He gives each patient the time they require. And, most importantly, he has solutions. He is conservative about surgery, unless all other options have been exhausted. He has a responsive and friendly front office team.|Dr. Alexander Kulick is an amazing diagnostician. His experience as head of the ER at a major New York City hospital has given him the ability to get at the root cause of your concerns by actively listening to both verbal and nonverbal cues from you to arrive at a recommendation.
I was being treated for a car accident and was told by my orthopedic surgeon I would need to live with the pain in my neck and lower back for the rest of my life, after three treatments with Dr. Kulick I've been pain-free for the last 15 years.|I first saw Dr Kulick for a very painful sciatica condition. Several top surgeons said I needed to have spine surgery.

Dr. Kulick examined me and, using his utrasound machine and manual palpation, decided the problem was localized to my back and legs -- no spinal involvement. He applied injections (under ultrasound) at key points -- about 20 in all. This had the IMMEDIATE effect of relieving my sciatica by roughly 90%. A few more visits completed the treatment.

Dr. Kulick is a true miracle worker. He listens to you attentively, is curious, gracious, and warmhearted. And genuinely competent, having trained in emergency and internal medicine, acupuncture, and several other modalities.

Since that first visit, about 10 years ago, I have used him for pretty much all of my primary care needs. He is more than capable of diagnosing and treating a wide range of conditions (not just pain-related), having worked in an emergency care setting for close to two decades. When necessary he will send your blood for lab analysis and will personally follow up with you if something is amiss.

I unhesitatingly recommend Dr. Kulick. He is almost always on time for appointments, and you will never feel rushed by him once you are in his office. He is careful to space out his appointments so you will get seen within minutes of arrival. This is despite the fact that he has a loyal following of hundreds of patients. People come from around the world to see him.

A word about the office staff. They really go out of their way to be accommodating and to make you feel welcome -- this especially includes his office manager and longtime assistant Heather. The office itself, occupying the ground floor of a townhouse on East 61st Street, is totally cozy, with an assortment of comfortable armchairs.|Dr. Kulick is a savior, of sorts.

He saved me from chronic nerve pain stemming from my C6/C7 herniated disc, that I endured for a few years on and off.  Before meeting with Dr. Kulick, I met with many other health care practitioners and tried cortisone shots into my neck, physical therapy, acupuncture, massage, CBD (both ingested and topical), positive thinking, learning more about Dr John Sarno's work and practicing some of his methods, etc.

Dr. Kulick was able to, after two treatments, completely eradicate my pain.  Leading up to meeting with him, my last round of nerve pain made it very difficult to function.  Not an easy time to say the least.  I was beginning to lose hope and started to look into a potential neck surgery and, finally, after years of trying to avoid surgery as an idea, even met with a cervical spine surgeon.  I decided to give Dr. Kulick a shot and I'm extremely grateful I did.  Due to his work and expertise, I pain-free and have not needed surgery.  I am fully functional again and feel like I've gained my life back.

Additionally, he is a rare breed of a person.  Very caring, very kind, funny, respectful, listens well, and is extremely competent and intelligent in pain management.  Great knowledge and practical experience in truly caring for and helping people.  A beautiful person and  I am very grateful I got to meet him.

Lastly, his team member Heather is very communicative, professional, caring, and makes you feel very welcome.  She is a great person also and a true pleasure to speak with.|Dr. Kulick is a very personable physician who employs a novel style of treatment: he focuses on the precise part of the nervous system which causes the problem and cures it in the least invasive way.  He and his staff provide very good follow-up.|Dr. Kulick has been amazing at treating my pain for many years. I see him every time I'm back in New York, and recommend him to all of my friends and family. Thank You Dr. Kulick!|I have received immediate relief from extreme pain. Dr, Kulick is highly skilled,compassionate and dedicated to all his patients. His staff is outstanding.

Sciatica Treatment Doctors & Specialists in New York City provides exceptional care for patients suffering from sciatica pain under the expert guidance of Dr. Melepura. As a board-certified physician by the American Board of Anesthesiology, Dr. Melepura has established himself as one of the best pain management specialists in Manhattan, offering highly personalized and comprehensive treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs. This Ivy League trained specialist brings advanced expertise to treating sciatica, a condition characterized by pain radiating along the sciatic nerve path from the lower back through the hips and down each leg. At our state-of-the-art pain management clinic located in Midtown Manhattan, patients receive access to the most effective and innovative sciatica relief treatments available in New York City. Dr. Melepura's approach combines thorough diagnostic assessments with targeted interventions designed to address not just symptoms but underlying causes of sciatic pain. The clinic specializes in both acute sciatica episodes and chronic conditions that have proven resistant to standard treatments elsewhere.

Comprehensive Treatment Approaches

Our practice offers a multidisciplinary approach to sciatica management, incorporating various modalities including medication management, therapeutic injections, physical therapy recommendations, and minimally invasive procedures when appropriate. Dr. Melepura's extensive training in pain medicine enables him to develop customized treatment protocols that maximize pain relief while minimizing medication dependence and improving functional outcomes for patients from all walks of life.

Visit Our Manhattan Location

Located at 36 W 44th St #914a, New York, NY 10036, our clinic welcomes patients seeking relief from debilitating sciatica pain. To schedule a consultation with Dr. Melepura, one of New York's top-rated sciatica specialists, call +1 212-408-1645 or visit our website at www.sportspainmanagementnyc.com/sciatica/ for more information about our services and treatment options.

Pain Doctor NY in New York, NY offers comprehensive pain management solutions for patients suffering from chronic and acute pain conditions. Specializing in neck and back pain treatment, our medical team brings decades of combined experience to provide relief through innovative, evidence-based approaches. We understand that pain affects every aspect of your life, which is why our practice is dedicated to restoring your quality of life through personalized care plans that address the root cause of your discomfort.

At Pain Doctor NY, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our physicians take time to thoroughly evaluate each patient's medical history, lifestyle factors, and pain patterns before developing a treatment strategy. This holistic perspective allows us to identify underlying issues that may be contributing to your pain and address them effectively. Whether you're suffering from herniated discs, sciatica, arthritis, or post-surgical pain, our team works diligently to find solutions that minimize medication dependence and maximize functional improvement.

Customized Treatment Plans

No two pain experiences are identical, which is why we never offer one-size-fits-all solutions. Our doctors meticulously review each case to determine the optimal course of action, considering both conventional and innovative treatment modalities. Your personalized treatment plan may include interventional procedures, physical therapy, medication management, regenerative medicine, or a combination of approaches designed specifically for your condition and recovery goals.

Expert Care for Neck and Back Pain

Our specialty lies in treating complex neck and back pain conditions that have often proven resistant to standard treatments. Using advanced diagnostic techniques and state-of-the-art equipment, we can precisely identify pain generators and target them with minimally invasive procedures that promote healing while minimizing recovery time.

Visit our practice at 20 E 46th St, 9th floor, New York, NY 10017 to experience our patient-centered approach to pain management. For appointments or consultations, call us at +1 212-300-8282 or learn more about our services at www.paindoctorny.com.

He will give you meds to make sure you're managing pain okay. He is so well versed in his knowledge and is eager to share it. He is so smart and his bedside manner is wonderful. He never rushes you and is ALWAYS available for you by email. He will work with other providers in your circle to give you the best care. He makes you laugh during procedures and makes you feel truly heard. I highly recommend him for pain management!|I am not one to generally write reviews but if you or a loved one have pain, this is the one doctor you will wish you met years earlier.

I can't say enough good things about Dr. Siefferman and every person I've encountered at his practice, Manhattan Pain Medicine. He is knowledgeable and thorough, has a wonderful bedside manner that can calm anxiety in one conversation, and has an extensive range of effective treatment options. He has taken my daughter, who had been suffering from chronic, unbearable pain, and a deterioration of her physical well-being, and begun to turn it around. There are multiple issues at play but with his broad knowledge, he was able to apply a holistic perspective that other doctors hadn't, which enabled him to begin teasing apart the various issues at play. This understanding, along with several treatment options, gave us a renewed sense of hope.

Dr. Siefferman is astute, aware, and has a gentle way of sharing challenging information so it can be received without feeling judged. His compassion and concern for every aspect of a patient and their families' well-being is palpable and this commitment feels shared by every person in his office. From intake with Omer, who comforted my anxiety and worked with me to relieve some of my financial concerns to the administrative assistant who schedules appointments, we feel welcomed and supported.

I am eternally grateful for the referral to Dr. Siefferman's practice, Manhattan Pain Medicine, and the wonderful doctors we met there.  I can't recommend this practice highly enough. Dr. Siefferman and Manhattan Pain Medicine have been true lifesavers, not only to my daughter who is no longer in chronic overwhelming pain but to the family who can breathe a sigh of relief.

column2: Pain Management Specialists of New York
column3:
Pain Management Specialists of New York serves patients throughout the Bronx, NY and surrounding areas with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of board-certified physicians combines advanced medical techniques with compassionate care to help patients overcome chronic pain conditions. Since our founding, we have been committed to improving quality of life through personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain rather than just masking symptoms.

At Pain Management Specialists of New York, we offer a wide range of interventional and non-invasive treatments for various pain conditions. Our expertise includes treatment for back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, cancer-related pain, and post-surgical pain. We utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools to accurately identify pain sources and develop targeted treatment strategies that may include medication management, minimally invasive procedures, physical therapy, and complementary approaches.

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in treating the whole person, not just the pain. Our multidisciplinary team works closely with each patient to create individualized care plans that consider medical history, lifestyle factors, and personal goals. This comprehensive approach helps patients achieve long-lasting relief and improved functionality in their daily lives. We pride ourselves on building trusting relationships with our patients, ensuring they feel heard, respected, and actively involved in their treatment decisions.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management experts, please contact us at +1 862-244-1909. Our clinic is conveniently located at 2932 Wilkinson Ave, Bronx, NY 10461, United States. For more information about our services or to request an appointment online, visit our website at www.paininny.com.

At NYC Pain MD, we address a wide spectrum of pain conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathy, and sports injuries. column2: Pain Management Clinic Brooklyn - Trusted Expertise of Dr. Jason Hernandez M.D
column3:
Nostrand Pain Therapy serves Brooklyn, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions under the trusted expertise of Dr. Jason Hernandez, M.D. As a premier pain management clinic in Brooklyn, we specialize in non-surgical approaches to chronic pain and injury recovery, helping patients regain mobility and improve their quality of life. Dr. Hernandez brings his extensive background in Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation, fellowship training in Sports Medicine, and master's degree in Clinical Exercise Physiology to create personalized treatment plans that address the root causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms.

At Nostrand Pain Therapy, we bridge the gap between conservative care and surgery, offering advanced treatment options that minimize the need for medications or invasive procedures. Our approach focuses on restoring natural movement patterns, reducing inflammation, and strengthening supporting structures to provide long-lasting relief. Dr. Hernandez's philosophy that "a body in motion stays in motion" guides our treatment protocols, emphasizing functional improvement alongside pain reduction.

Our Unique Approach

What sets our clinic apart is Dr. Hernandez's personal understanding of physical demands and recovery. As an active practitioner of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and fitness enthusiast, he brings firsthand knowledge of injury prevention and rehabilitation to each patient interaction. This perspective allows him to develop realistic recovery plans that accommodate patients' lifestyle goals and activity levels, whether they're athletes, working professionals, or seniors seeking to maintain independence.

Comprehensive Care Options

Our treatment modalities include specialized physical therapy, targeted exercise prescription, advanced diagnostic assessments, and innovative pain management techniques. Each treatment plan is customized to address individual needs, with regular adjustments based on progress and response. We take pride in educating our patients about their conditions and empowering them with self-management strategies for continued improvement.

Visit us at nostrandpaintherapy.com or call +1 718-715-4484 to schedule your consultation. Our clinic is conveniently located at 2577 Nostrand Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11210, where we welcome patients from throughout Brooklyn and surrounding communities.
column11: I am a physician specializing in Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation with fellowship training in Sports Medicine and a master's degree in Clinical Exercise Physiology. My focus is on helping patients overcome chronic pain and recover from injuries through advanced, non-surgical, and medication-free treatment options. By bridging the gap between conservative care and surgery, I strive to restore movement, reduce pain, and enhance quality of life, embracing the belief that a body in motion stays in motion. With a personal passion for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and fitness, I understand the demands of an active lifestyle and am dedicated to helping my patients stay strong, healthy, and in motion.

Dr. Randa Jaafar brings her extensive medical expertise to Manhattan's financial district, where she has established a respected private practice dedicated to helping patients overcome chronic pain conditions. As a Wayne State University graduate with additional specialized training through a prestigious fellowship at Cornell University Medical College, Dr. Jaafar combines academic excellence with practical clinical experience to deliver personalized care to each patient.

Dr. Jaafar's practice focuses on innovative approaches to pain management, with particular emphasis on ultrasound-based procedures that provide precise and effective pain relief. This advanced technology allows her to target specific pain sources with minimal invasiveness, offering patients alternatives to traditional pain management methods that may have unwanted side effects or limited efficacy.

column2: Regenerative Pain & Sports Medicine Center of NY/NJ
column3:
Regenerative Pain & Sports Medicine Center of NY/NJ serves patients throughout New York and New Jersey with advanced pain management solutions. Led by Dr. Koppel, a board-certified interventional pain specialist with over 20 years of experience, the center specializes in minimally invasive treatments for a comprehensive range of pain conditions. Their integrated approach combines both regenerative and conventional therapies to provide optimal results tailored to each patient's unique needs.

The center offers cutting-edge regenerative therapies including Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP), Regenerative Cell Therapy, and Exosomes. These advanced treatments harness the body's natural healing mechanisms to regenerate tissue in damaged joints and spinal structures. By reducing inflammation, promoting healthy tissue growth, and improving functionality, these therapies provide effective alternatives to more invasive procedures.

Expert Medical Leadership

Dr. Koppel completed his prestigious fellowship training at The New York Hospital and The Hospital for Special Surgery, institutions renowned for excellence in orthopedic and pain management care. His extensive clinical experience has helped thousands of patients find relief from chronic pain conditions and improve their quality of life through personalized treatment plans.

Comprehensive Pain Management

Whether treating sports injuries, arthritis, spinal conditions, or other chronic pain disorders, the Regenerative Pain & Sports Medicine Center takes a holistic approach to patient care. Their Manhattan location at 119 W 57th St #717a provides a convenient setting for consultations and treatments. Patients seeking innovative pain solutions can learn more by visiting www.regenpainnynj.com or calling +1 646-398-2089 to schedule an appointment.
column11:
Dr Koppel is a board certified interventional pain specialist with over 20 years of experience in minimally invasive treatments for all sorts of pain conditions. Both regenerative and conventional therapies are offered to offer the best option and optimize the result. Regenerative therapies offered include Platelet Rich Plasma, Regenerative Cell Therapy, and Exosomes. These are utilized to treat both joint and spine conditions. They use the bodies own healing mechanisms to regenerate tissue in the joint or spine to reduce inflammation, add normal tissue, and improve functioning.

Dr Koppel did his fellowship training at The New York Hospital and The Hospital for Special Surgery. Thousands of patients have improved with his treat

Pain Management Doctors Essex County serves residents throughout Essex County, New Jersey with comprehensive pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our dedicated team of specialists understands that pain can be debilitating, affecting every aspect of your daily life and preventing you from enjoying the activities you love. With multiple convenient locations across New Jersey, we provide accessible, expert care for patients suffering from both acute and chronic pain conditions.

Pain can disrupt your life at any age for a variety of reasons. Our doctors can help you get through a traumatic time, whether you're a runner who can no longer run due to a runner's knee or a senior who has recurring hip pain after a fall. They will also teach you how to avoid injuries in the future. Our approach combines cutting-edge diagnostic techniques with personalized treatment plans designed to not only alleviate pain but address its underlying causes.

Specialized Care for All Patients

Our pain specialists treat everyone, from athletes with acute, painful injuries to aging adults with chronic conditions. We recognize that each patient's experience with pain is unique, which is why we take the time to conduct thorough evaluations and develop customized treatment strategies. column40:
Do yourself a favor and find a different pain management doctor. This organization is a joke. I am not just a disgruntled patient. There is no follow up from the doctors. I was told that a doctor would follow up with me after my tests and it's been weeks. I've had multiple tests ordered by my doctor and I have not received a follow up. If I could leave 0 stars I would!

Find a different doctor, don't let the name of this organization make you think it's going to be good.

You are literally just another number, there is no continuity. Every-time you call you will be starting from step 1.|As usual, a medical professional assumed I don't feel pain the same as other humans because I'm black. I was sent for an mri even though I had one. I returned & the physician assistant told me again that she won't refer me because she didn't think I was in the amount of pain I claimed. I asked how she came by this determination. She told me she could understand the pain if I had arthritis in my spine. That's when I knew she never looked at my mri. She finally reffered me but I needed another mri. The next morning the office manager called me, excited, to inform me my claim for an mri was denieeeeed. I called the pre approval company & they informed me my claim was not denied. The doctors office didn't sent over my records after numerous requests.if they didn't receive my records by 12 noon, my claim would be denied. It was 8:45am. By 12 noon the doctor still did not send my records & the preapproval company faxed a denial to the doctor. After 3 pm, the doctors office finally sent my records knowing they received the denial. I was able to get a human being, who was also black & suffered from sciatica,  to put through an appeal. They approved me in a few hours. I was able to get my mri. I complained to the chair of the department but she informed me she spoke to those involved & what else did she want me to do. Medical racism at its finest. I went out of network since they went to great lengths to deny me treatment. Unfortunately, my new doctor retired & I haven't been able to get pain injections in months. Medical racism affects & ends lives. Do better.|By far, the best pediatricians and nurses hands down! Great customer service! Clean facilities! Helpful nurses! and Knowledgeable doctors. Dr. Jane Rosini and Nurse Yvette are so helpful and they make you feel comfortable as first time parents. Never was a question too silly nor was there any request too unreasonable. They make your child feel welcomed and at ease. I am thrilled to have such a great pediatric team!|Going out of my way to make sure I tell folks, find another pain management doctor.

Don't let the name of this place fool you, there are plenty doctors in the world that know how to follow up with patients. You are just another number going to this place.|I did not like the nurse that has accent. The front desk and the doctors are great!! I brought my kids here several times and the nurse tune of voice I did not like at all still. She sounds bossy and judging. Meanwhile, the doctors are great.|Very nice office. I didn't wait more than 5 minutes at every step of the process: check-in, nurse, doctor, check-out. Everyone was very helpful. The doctor (Dr Kim) spent a lot of time with me and answered all my questions very specifically.  I'm very pleased with their service and will consider coming to them for my annual.|I like the fact that several departments are in one building. So far all the doctors and nurses we've seen are warm, they smile or are welcoming, nice. Doctors work together to assert the best treatment.|I liked the expediency of the staff for the clients. As of today I'm happy with their service.

Dmitriy Dvoskin, M.D. serves New York, NY with exceptional pain management services across Brooklyn, Queens, and Manhattan. As a distinguished member of one of NYC's best-rated teams of pain specialists, Dr. Dvoskin brings extensive training and expertise to help patients find relief from chronic and acute pain conditions. His patient-centered approach combines cutting-edge interventional techniques with comprehensive treatment plans tailored to each individual's unique needs.

Dr. Dmitriy Dvoskin's journey to becoming a premier pain relief specialist began with his undergraduate studies at Cornell University. He earned his medical degree from St. George's University School of Medicine in 2012, establishing a strong foundation in medical science. His training continued with a residency at SUNY Upstate Medical Center, where he specialized in Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, developing expertise in non-surgical approaches to pain and functional improvement.

Furthering his specialization, Dr. Dvoskin relocated to Atlanta, Georgia to complete a prestigious fellowship in Interventional Pain Medicine at Emory University. This advanced training equipped him with specialized skills in precise diagnostic techniques and minimally invasive pain management procedures.

Specialized Pain Management Services

As an integral part of one of New York City's highest-rated pain management teams, Dr. Dvoskin offers comprehensive care for patients suffering from various pain conditions. His approach integrates evidence-based interventional procedures with holistic pain management strategies, helping patients achieve improved function and quality of life.

Contact Information

Patients seeking expert pain relief can schedule a consultation with Dr. Dvoskin at the practice's Manhattan location:

Address: 240 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, United States

Phone: +1 212-612-2222

Website: www.painmanagementnyc.com

With convenient locations throughout NYC, Dr. Dvoskin and his colleagues provide accessible, specialized pain management services to residents across Brooklyn, Queens, and Manhattan.

Stay away from dodgy two faced Doc Patel. Don't believe the hype and her high profile appearance because she won't listen to your real causes for pain, dismissed your pertinent past medical procedures, test results, scan history, and medical records. Her staff will also lie about giving you numbness meds before steroid injection procedure is beyond immoral and unethical.
Clinic is a shamble not for pain management at all.|Dr. Alexis is very nice and compassionate. I've been to the Manhattan office and Staten island office. I prefer the Manhattan office. Everyone is nice and friendly there. The Staten island office (Victory Blvd) was not as friendly at least the front desk and the appointment person. However the staff for procedures were nice. I've been seeing Dr. Alexis for a few months and he has been very attentive and understand. He discusses procedure carefully and asks for my opinion. I recently was introduced to Dr. Chapman and he was attentive and informative as well. I would recommend both Dr. Alexis and Dr. Chapman. However locations I would stick to the Manhattan unless absolutely necessary to travel to Staten island (Victory Blvd). Can't say anything of the other locations though.

1/6/18. Better visit than the one I experienced on 11/11/17. I did spend about 2 hours at the office but I wasn't waiting for all of the 2 hrs. I was in and out in two hours. Let's hope the procedure helps.|One of the most efficiently and effective practices i have ever dealt with. I still have a long way to go but feel i am in the right place. Dr. Patel is not only caring and considerate but she actually listens to my concerns without feeling rushed. I would recommend her to any person i could. Thank you Dr Patel and especially your staff who always makes me feel like i am not bothering them and that they truly care. It is such a pleasure|My experience at Dr. Chapman's office has always been a pleasure. The atmosphere is totally professional and his staff exhibits a genuine caring attitude unsurpassed by any other doctors office I've ever encountered.  It takes a deep trust to allow someone to stick a needle into your spine and Dr. Chapman has earned that trust repeatedly.  As far as the unflattering reviews I have read, I am completely shocked that any patients would have a complaint. Dr
Chapman , in my experience, has always taken time to speak and address any concerns I may have no matter how big or small. Furthermore, Dr. Chapman doesn't speak down to you as some other physicians have a habit of doing. I was there today, every staff member, every nurse greeted me with a smile, asked if I was comfortable and kept me in the loop every step of the way
To Dr. Chapman and all of you wonderful RNs don't ever change. You're great the way you are. To the PA's and ladies who make my appointments and answer my emails in a flash I want to give you a shout out too, you're the best and my family and I feel you're worth your weight in gold. So, to all out there if I could give one piece of advise it would be  to put your faith in Dr. Chapman's hands.|Dr. Chapman and his staff were professional and personable. column2: The Spine & Pain Institute of New York
column3:
The Spine & Pain Institute of New York serves Staten Island, NY and surrounding communities with specialized care for acute and chronic pain management. Our dedicated medical team focuses on providing accurate diagnoses and developing personalized treatment plans that prioritize minimally invasive approaches. Since our founding, we have built a reputation for excellence by combining advanced pain management techniques with compassionate patient care, helping thousands of New York residents find relief from debilitating pain conditions and improve their quality of life.

At The Spine and Pain Institute of New York, we offer a complete spectrum of pain management solutions tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our approach integrates nonsurgical, interventional, and surgical options when necessary, always seeking the least invasive method that will effectively address the source of pain. Our specialists are experienced in treating various conditions including back pain, neck pain, joint disorders, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndromes.

Patient-Centered Philosophy

We believe informed patients make better decisions about their health. Our patient-centered approach involves thorough education about all available treatment options, potential outcomes, and recovery expectations. Our compassionate staff guides patients through every step of the diagnostic and treatment process, ensuring they feel supported and understood throughout their pain management journey.

Our Facility

Located at 1534 Victory Blvd in Staten Island, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology. We've created a comfortable, welcoming environment where patients can receive the highest standard of care in a setting designed to reduce anxiety and promote healing.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, visit spinepainny.com or call us at (718) 667-3577. Our team is committed to helping you reduce pain, restore function, and improve your long-term quality of life.
column11:
The Spine and Pain Institute of New York is dedicated to the diagnosis, treatment and management of acute and chronic pain. We strive to provide our patients with an accurate diagnosis to relieve pain utilizing the least invasive treatment methods.

Our patient-centered philosophy involves educating patients about their treatment options; whether it is nonsurgical, interventional or surgical. Our staff members are compassionate, caring and considerate throughout the diagnostic and treatment process. It is our goal to return patient function while improving long-term quality of life.

column40:
This place has been a godsend for me. I've had 4 back surgeries total in 4 years. I was referred by my neurosurgeon in 2020 after having 2 surgeries in a two month time period. Both Dr Alexi and Dr Yang are very attentive and do not rush through your appointments. They're very knowledgeable in what they do and give you all of your options when it comes to care. I have never had a negative experience with the doctors or office staff. Julian the MA is  the bomb! He seems like he really likes his job and it shows in his people skills and professionalism. I owe a lot to the Spine and Pain Institute. I feel like they gave me my life back!|Hi, I can't THANK Dr. Otterbeck and his staff for relieving me of my back pain.
He and his staff are so caring and professional.  If I didn't know I was on Staten Island and next to Royal Crown I would have thought I was at NYU.
I have had chronic back pain for many years and have seen other doctors who gave me shots in my back. It wasn't until I saw Dr. Otterbeck that my pain has subsided. I was taking Hydrocodone once a day and now I just take ibuprofen once in a while.  I have all confidence with him and his staff and tell everyone about THE PAIN AND SPINE INSTITUTE.
Thank you again to him and his staff,
Christine emigholz|I am not so sure if I want to go back to Dr Latrice Akuamoah . I used to go to 3311 pain management but something happens that they close down silly I made an appointment with Spine and Pain Institute I'm in bed I'm in bad shape so talk to the doctor and let her know what was going on and I told you where I was on as far as medicine goes and she said that the only way she would treat me if I should give me injections now I've never had an injection in the spine before it's something that I need to think about before I let anybody stick the needle in my spine some people can do it some people can't do it I felt very pressured by her because she would not help me with my pain all let me think about it for at least a week and then you can give me some medicine before I think about making my decision while I have her treat me I felt judged she's decided to judge me I didn't feel comfortable with her I feel as a doctor it's very important for the doctor to the patient to have to be comfortable with them at this point I feel very lost and hopefully I can find a doctor that will help me feel comfortable with them instead of judgment.|Dr Latrice Akuamoah is an excellent Pain Management Physician. I go to her at the 1 Hollow Lane, New Hyde Park, NY location. She is really amazing at her profession. I highly recommend going to Dr. Akuamoah if you have spine, lower back, neck, knee and other arthritic issues.!!|I have been going to the office on Hylan Blvd for over two years after being referred there by the Staten Island Hospital.  My doctor is Robert Outterbeck.  After multiple "procedure's" I still remain in as much pain as when I went into the emergency room over two years ago.  I was never even asked if I needed anything for pain. Now he's telling me of a procedure called "The Mild Procedure". Before every procedure they require a medical release form from your doctors office.  MAKE SURE you do this in person since their office staff seems to be unable to get these forms via fax for whatever reasons.  In addition be prepared to go thru several hoops depending on which doctors clearance they want.  I hand delivered a completed form from my heart doctor giving clearance, that wasn't good enough.  Several days later they wanted one from my primary care doctor, then one from my kidney specialist.  Once again they were sent faxes that they said thy never received.  I again hand delivered s letter from my kidney doctor to their office on Sept, 12, 2023 at 10.20 am.  Later that day I received a phone call that they had to speak to the doctor personally but that he wasn't having hours today.
This office will test the patients of Jesus Christ Almighty.  Good luck dealing with these people.|Dr Alexis is by far one of the best doctors I have come across! He shows compassion for his patients and will find any way to help you find pain relief! After a bad experience with a pain management dr years ago I finally went to Dr Alexis and im so glad I did! I highly recommend him to anyone who is in pain and wants relief! -Victoria Billalba|I had an outstanding experience with Dr. Bart Liabaud. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Bart Liabaud to anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled healthcare professional. My experience was nothing short of excellent, and I am grateful for the high level of care I received.|I am a very satisfied patient who has witnessed first hand what an amazing job Dr.UeL J Alexis does! I got an injection procedure done by him, I have to say that I am fascinated with my results. Dr. Alexis is amazing, during my consultation he made me feel very comfortable, he was very professional, well groomed and Educated., He answer all of my questions to my satisfaction. By the end of the procedure I felt Great.. All the staff was friendly and helpful. I am Very Thankful.     Vincent J......

column3:
The Ainsworth Institute of Pain Management serves New York, NY and surrounding areas as a premier destination for comprehensive pain management solutions. Founded by Dr. Corey Hunter, this specialized medical practice has established itself as a leader in treating chronic pain conditions using innovative, minimally invasive techniques. The institute's patient-centered approach combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to address complex pain issues that have often been resistant to conventional treatments.

At The Ainsworth Institute, patients benefit from a multidisciplinary approach to pain management. Dr. Hunter and his team offer advanced diagnostic evaluations and personalized treatment plans tailored to each individual's specific condition. The practice specializes in treating various chronic pain conditions, including back pain, neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, and complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS).

State-of-the-Art Treatments

The institute provides access to the latest interventional pain procedures, including nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and regenerative medicine options. These minimally invasive techniques aim to provide long-lasting relief while minimizing recovery time and reducing dependence on pain medications.

Convenient Manhattan Location

Located at 115 E 57th St #1210, New York, NY 10022, The Ainsworth Institute offers a comfortable, modern facility in the heart of Manhattan. The central location makes specialized pain care accessible to patients throughout the New York metropolitan area.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Corey Hunter, MD, patients can call +1 212-203-2813 or visit the institute's comprehensive website at www.ainsworthinstitute.com. The website features detailed information about available treatments, patient resources, and convenient online appointment scheduling options.

column40:
Dr. Hunter has tried more things to help me than all my previous pain management doctors combined.  He's compassionate, and I truly feel he cares about me when I see him.  I'm very thankful to have him as my doctor and highly recommend anyone with chronic pain see him for an appointment.  Where other pain management specialists have given up and run out of ideas he has ample additional treatments.     He is the only ketamine therapy I have found anywhere that takes insurance (saving me thousands).  It's very worth my 6 hours round trip to see him.  Katie his aprn is just as compassionate as he is.|Dr Hunter his staff are all amazing. I went to his office I such distress and I can say 9 months later my quality of life have improved so much..I'm humbly grateful for all the services that they provide..
Kathryn the NP is so kind and empathic ..she listens and cares
I truly recommend Dr Hunter...his staff are professional and on point with all the patients needs..|This review has been a very long time coming. In 2017, I was a 26 year old suffering from pelvic pain. I had dysparenuria and provoked+ unprovoked vestibulodynia. I found Dr. Hunter by chance when I was a ICU travel nurse in NYC. Dr. Hunter performed a radiofrequency ablation to the ganglion of impar and gave me my life back. I now come back to NYC every couple of years to get the procedure for pain management. I went from thinking I would never be able to have sexual intercourse again to being happily married and planning on starting a family. I hope my review will help someone else out there looking for pain relief. I am now a Nurse Practitioner and can fully appreciate Dr. Hunter's high level of skill. Thank you Dr. Hunter!!|My experience with Dr. Hunter is an excellent experience. He has helped my pain on my lower back so much I am so thankful that I have met and came across Dr. Hunter|No long waits....staff is friendly and courteous. However procedure is warmer than id like it to be bc I have anxiety and that didn't help iykyk. But overall great experience. Staff always follows up for after visit care.|Dr Corey Hunter is absolutely the best!  I have rare nerve damage in my left ear caused by Shingles - his ability to keep me pain free with a customized nerve ablation procedure has been a life saver for me.  No other doctors could quite figure it out and I suffered for several years prior to finding Dr. Hunter.  His knowledge and expertise cannot compare to other pain management doctors.  He is absolutely the Best of the Best!  I highly recommend him to anyone for pain management.  Dr. Hunter continues to grow in his profession seeking the latest of the most effective and modern procedures available today for any type of pain- whether it be in your ear, your neck, your knee, your back etc...|Dr Corey Hunter is hands down the best doctor I've ever had. I was diagnosed with Pudendal neuralgia a year ago, and I have had very little success in finding any sort of help. I was dealing with intense chronic pain every day, lost my job, and my quality of life was poor. Dr Hunter was recommended to me by another one of his patients, so I made the trip up to NYC. He started with the least invasive treatment, which I can appreciate. These things take time to find what will work for you as an individual. I've been seeing him for some time now, and after the most recent visit, I'm doing a trial for a spinal cord stimulator. Got that done yesterday, and I've been able to sit again without assistance. Not only is Dr Hunter extraordinarily knowledgeable, he keeps up on the latest medical technology. Dr Hunter TRULY cares about his patients and will go above and beyond. Dr Hunter is giving me my life back and I wish there were more words to express my gratitude. If you experience chronic pain, please consider Dr Hunter as your pain management specialist. I could've avoided a lot of pain had I came sooner.|Everyone's very friendly very comfortable. Going to see Dr. Hunter. The staff is wonderful.

column48:
Hello. I am 70 years old and suffer with scoliosis which causes me a lot of pain. Would vertiflex superior procedure help with my pain? 
Thank you
column49: If scoliosis itself is the pain generator and the actual cause of the pain, then the short answer is no.  If the pain is from spinal stenosis that has gone unrecognized or undiagnosed then it would be an option so long as the scoliosis is not excessive.

column3:
Dr. Kimberly Sackheim serves New York, NY with exceptional concierge pain management services. Located in the prestigious Upper East Side, Dr. Sackheim offers personalized VIP care for patients suffering from various pain conditions. Her comprehensive approach combines medical expertise with compassionate care, ensuring each patient receives individualized treatment plans designed to address their specific needs.

Dr. Sackheim's practice focuses on treating a wide spectrum of pain conditions, including:

  • Chronic headaches and migraines

  • Temporomandibular joint (TMJ) and jaw pain

  • Spine and joint pain

  • Pelvic pain disorders

A Holistic Approach to Pain Relief

What sets Dr. Sackheim apart is her holistic methodology that addresses not just symptoms but underlying causes. This comprehensive approach leads to better outcomes, improved functionality, and enhanced quality of life for her patients. Each treatment plan is carefully crafted to integrate various modalities that work together to provide lasting relief.

Concierge Medical Experience

Patients appreciate Dr. Sackheim's beautiful office at 8 E 83rd St #1a, which provides a serene and comfortable environment for consultations and treatments. Her concierge model ensures she dedicates ample time to each patient, a stark contrast to the rushed appointments common in traditional medical settings. For those unable to visit the office, Dr. Sackheim offers convenient home visits and phone consultations upon request.

With years of specialized expertise and a genuine commitment to patient well-being, Dr. Sackheim has established herself as a trusted pain management physician in New York City. To schedule an appointment or learn more about available services, visit www.nyc-headache.com or call +1 646-808-3220.

column2: NY Pain and Spine (Pain Management with Dr. Debiec)
column3:
NY Pain and Spine serves New York, NY with comprehensive pain management solutions under the expert guidance of Dr. Debiec. Located in the heart of Manhattan, our practice combines cutting-edge treatments with compassionate care to address chronic pain conditions that impact quality of life. We understand that pain is not just a physical sensation but affects emotional wellbeing and daily functioning, which is why we take a holistic approach to pain management.

At NY Pain and Spine, we offer a wide range of interventional procedures and non-surgical treatments tailored to each patient's unique needs. Our services include epidural steroid injections, facet joint blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and medication management. Dr. Debiec specializes in treating conditions such as back pain, neck pain, sciatica, herniated discs, arthritis, and complex regional pain syndrome.

State-of-the-Art Facility

Our modern facility at 271 Lexington Ave features advanced diagnostic and treatment equipment in a comfortable, patient-centered environment. We prioritize accessibility and convenience for our patients, offering flexible scheduling options and minimal wait times. The central Manhattan location makes our practice easily reachable by public transportation and provides nearby parking options for those who drive.

Patient-Centered Approach

What sets NY Pain and Spine apart is our commitment to personalized care. Dr. Debiec takes time to thoroughly evaluate each patient, listen to their concerns, and develop customized treatment plans that address the root cause of pain rather than just masking symptoms. We emphasize patient education, ensuring you understand your condition and treatment options to make informed decisions about your care.

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Debiec, call us at +1 212-837-8010 or visit our website at www.nypainandspine.com. Our friendly staff is ready to assist you on your journey toward a pain-free life.

column3:
C.S. Leung Rehabilitation Medicine PLLC in New York, NY offers comprehensive rehabilitation services focused on non-surgical pain management solutions. Led by experienced specialists, our practice combines evidence-based treatments with personalized care plans to address acute and chronic pain conditions. We serve patients throughout Manhattan and the greater New York metropolitan area from our conveniently located Centre Street office.

At C.S. Leung Rehabilitation Medicine, we believe in treating the whole person, not just the symptoms. Our approach integrates various modalities including physical therapy, therapeutic exercises, medication management, and innovative non-invasive techniques. We specialize in treating conditions such as back pain, neck pain, joint disorders, sports injuries, and post-surgical rehabilitation needs.

Our Facility and Location

Our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology to ensure accurate assessments and effective care. Located at 139 Centre St, Suite 618, New York, NY 10013, we're easily accessible by public transportation and situated in the vibrant area between Chinatown and Little Italy.

Patient-Centered Care

We pride ourselves on creating individualized treatment plans that address each patient's unique needs and goals. Our multilingual staff ensures clear communication and cultural sensitivity for our diverse patient population. New patients are welcome, and we work with various insurance providers to facilitate accessible care.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, visit our website at www.csleungrehab.com or call us directly at +1 212-431-4307. Take the first step toward effective, non-surgical pain management with C.S. Leung Rehabilitation Medicine PLLC.

column40:
I took my husband to see Dr Leung, from a recommendation of my friend from work who also went to him. She said Dr Leung made her knee feel " like a million bucks after a week".
Well my husband's knee  does feel like a million bucks after a few days post arthrocentesis. Well done, Dr Leung. I would recommend you to anyone. The best there is.|I have had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Leung for more than 7 years. He has treated me in the past for everything from foot to back to knee pain.  He is always thorough and honest with his care.  Although my insurance (GHI) does not cover Acupuncture, he has always been reasonable with his fees.  I am grateful to have found a Doctor who is as talented and affordable as Dr. Leung.|I've had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Leung for a number of years now.  While some of the office policies may seem archaic, I have grown accustomed to them. This office does not take credit card. Only cash or check. It may seem like a bother to some but his rates are more than reasonable. I also know to call ahead of time if I'm running late or I will lose my place on the schedule. I usually don't have to wait more than 10 minutes for my scheduled appointments. I am very happy with the quality of services that they have provided me.|Dr. Leung and his staff are very professional. Office is welcoming, clean and organized. I called and was able to secure an appointment the same day at 1pm. I was greeted warmly by the office staff and was taken in immediately. (Normally at a doctors office I have to wait 30mins before getting into a room and then wait there). I saw Dr. Leung (Jonathan) about my ankle. I had a terrible sprain after playing bball and thought it might possibly be broken. Dr. Leung was great. He has a very calm and reassuring demeanor. He explained everything in detail even taking out the model ankle to provide an explanation of how my ankle and its ligaments can be affected. He made me feel better with his diagnosis, pretty much telling me it was most likely a sprain instead of a break. He provided some recommendations on how to take care of my ankle and even gave me a ace bandage to wrap my foot in. I'd highly recommend Dr. Leung and his office! A+|My husband came to visit Dr. Leung for his wrist pain problems. We have been visiting Dr. Leung for a while, he has always been patient and listened attentively to my husband's concerns and questions. My husband's's condition gets better after the visits.
